programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Killer Lion Stakeout
programme.desc: In the heart of Botswana, Austin has a very easy time finding and photographing lions, but what he really wants is to see them take down prey. He tracks them day and night to capture the perfect moment.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Hippo Face-off
programme.desc: Out of all the animals in Africa, the most dangerous is surprisingly the Hippopotamus. With huge jaws and canines that can reach 2 feet in length, this adventure will be the most dangerous yet.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Australian Alps
programme.desc: It may come as a surprise to non-Australians that the island continent renowned for its flat plains and searing deserts has snow-capped mountains at all.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Island of the Devil
programme.desc: Just 460,000 people live in Tasmania, an island off the southeast coast of mainland Australia. While its human population is small, the majestic state is rich in natural wonders and is known for its large tracts of pristine wilderness.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Red Desert
programme.desc: In this episode of Wild Places, we join botanist Peter Latz, who believes the biggest influence on the Australian arid landscape has been fire. Years ago, Peter wondered how different this country would have looked like without the influence of it.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Coast of the Whalesharks
programme.desc: On the remote coastline of Australia’s northwest, there are great natural wonders to be found. Above the sea on this sunbaked coast, there is very little; only a sparse landscape shaped by the arid conditions. But here, the miracle reveals itself…

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Rainforest
programme.desc: Daintree National Park is a magical meeting of rainforest and reef, lying at the heart of the world heritage listed wet tropics of Queensland.

programme.title: Snake Boss: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Julia confronts her fear on heights while trying to wrangle a massive carpet python. Meanwhile, Johnny Must try to catch two of them. Later Julia has a close call with the worlds second deadliest snake.

programme.title: Snake Boss: A Sorry Tail
programme.desc: Julia saves a karate school from a highly venomous visitor. Meanwhile, Johnny Bagpipes leaves his lady flying solo as he prepares to fly to Rome.

programme.title: Snake Boss: Stuck in the Middle with You
programme.sub-title: Stuck in the Middle with You
programme.desc: Julia teams up with a terrier to track down a suspected deadly intruder. Meanwhile, she rescues Bob from a tetchy python, and comes up with a great marketing idea.

programme.title: Snake Boss: Bird Appétit
programme.desc: It is a snake snack-o-rama. Johnny and Julia rescue a pet budgie before its too late. Johnny wrangles another python. And the both of them welcome a new member to the snake catching team.

programme.title: Snake Boss: It's Not Easy Being Green
programme.desc: Julia faces off against an unwelcome house guest in the form of an inquisitive serpent. Meanwhile, the new member of the team, Bonny, goes to doggy boot camp.

programme.title: Snake Boss: The Fear Factor
programme.desc: It's all about the fear factor this time, as Julia deals with a potted threat first, before catching a tiny house dweller, and scaling a rooftop to rescue a big snake.

programme.title: Snake Boss: Life and Death
programme.desc: Julia comes to the aid of a dehydrated python who needs to be taken to the RSPCA, and there's a remarkable confrontation between a Keelback and a highly poisonous cane toad.

programme.title: Snake Boss: Two Boys and a Shoe Box
programme.sub-title: Two Boys and a Shoe Box
programme.desc: Julia will get a love-bite from her favorite snake, Bonny the dog continues her snake detection training, and then there's a deadly wrangle with a juvenile eastern brown.

programme.title: Snake Boss: All in a Hard Day's Work
programme.sub-title: All in a Hard Day's Work
programme.desc: Training is in full flow for Bonny the dog on her quest to sniff out snakes, but Julia is called poolside to fish out one cool snake, before facing an extremely close call.

programme.title: Snake Boss: What a Catch!
programme.desc: Julia will be cooped up with a massive eastern brown, while Bonny gets her first taste of snake hunting, and Johnny ultimately makes his biggest catch yet.

channel.desc: Science lovers, Nature and History buffs: this is your channel! Voyager Documentaries takes you into Earth’s wildest corners, the forbidding realms of deep space, and the dramatic turning points of history.

programme.title: Heartbreakers

programme.title: Bachelorette

channel.desc: Movie lovers' one-stop shop for all things motion pictures. Sit back and escape into edgy indies, illuminating documentaries, chilling thrillers, raucous comedies, and touching dramas.

programme.title: On the Case: A Window to Murder

channel.desc: Watch classic episodes of Unsolved Mysteries on this eerie channel, Who knows? Perhaps YOU can help solve a mystery...

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 93
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can sacrificially jumping on a grenade save others' lives? Does self-hypnosis work? Can a combination of Diet Coke and Mentos make one's stomach explode?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 94
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a baseball be hit hard enough to remove its covering? Does sliding into a base get a person there faster? Can balls be hit further with a corked bat?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 95
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a person's eyes pop out while sneezing with eyes open? Can shifting to reverse stop a runaway car? Can three cigarette butts fired from a black-powder rifle kill a person?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 96
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible to climb a building with a motorized grappling hook? Will getting punched by someone wearing a ring leave a ring-shaped imprint?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 97
programme.desc: Myths tested: Are bulls really aggravated by the color red? Can ammunition stored in the oven be lethal? Do bulls in a china shop really cause complete destruction?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 98
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a ninja deflect a bullet with his palm? Can a person breathe from a car tire underwater? Will an RFID chip explode in an MRI scanner?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 99
programme.desc: Myths tested: Will a flaming trail of gasoline from a moving vehicle catch up to its tank and cause it to explode? Can a person be burned by a defibrillator if they are wearing a nipple ring?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 100
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a water heater explode and shoot through the roof of a house? If a person is being dragged by a horse, can the friction caused by the movement make the jeans catch on fire?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 101
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is shooting fish in a barrel really as easy as the proverb says? What is the most effective cure for pain caused by hot chili peppers? Are elephants really afraid of mice?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 102
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible to use a rowboat as a submarine? Can one escape if buried in the sand? What kind of projectiles would pirates use in a cannon if they run out of cannonballs?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 103
programme.desc: Myths tested: Did the Confederates really build a lethal steam-powered machine gun? Is it possible to fool a modern polygraph test?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 104
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a person with no flight training land a jet while being assisted by the traffic controllers over the radio? Is it possible to talk while falling at terminal velocity?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 105
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a bullet from a 9mm handgun ignite a propane tank? Can a speed boat jump off of a ramp, land in the water and continue to operate safely?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 106
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a lead balloon fly? Is it possible to surf a wave caused by an explosion?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 107
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can an airplane take off while on a conveyor belt? Can cockroaches, fruit flies and flour beetles survive extreme levels of radiation?

channel.desc: MythBusters explodes onto the screen, bringing with it two Hollywood special effects experts Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage & attempt to debunk urban legends. Expect science, experiments, explosions & disasters!

programme.title: The FBI Files: A Family Torn
programme.desc: The parents of 11 yr. old Brittany Martinez knew their daughter was no runaway. Something had happened to her, something terrible. When they failed to find Brittany in their quiet Illinois neighborhood, they called the police.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Master Plan
programme.desc: Willow Springs, Illinois, seemed like any other quiet Midwestern community. But it was really one of the most corrupt places in the nation. This tiny village, nestled just outside of Chicago, was in the hip pocket of organized crime.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a tragic murder led agents into the frightening world of domestic terrorism. Law enforcement vowed to dismantle the violent faction that claimed responsibility.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Unabomber
programme.desc: For nearly two decades a mathematical genius with delusions of single-handedly destroying industrial society, planted or mailed powerful bombs to unsuspecting innocent victims.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Small Town Terror
programme.desc: In a small Ohio community, an elderly woman and a teenaged boy disappeared. Because they vanished within hours of each other, police believed the cases were linked. But they didn't know how.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Murdering Cowboy
programme.desc: The sun set on the Wild West long ago, but some people refused to notice. Claude Dallas was one of them. A wily trapper, Dallas typified the rugged individualism that forged this country. He went too far when he killed two game wardens in 1981.

programme.title: The FBI Files: First and Kennedy Street Crew
programme.desc: In the early 1990's, Washington, D.C., became the murder capital of the nation. Few were left untouched by gang violence, which was ignited by the drug trade. By 1994, that violence would strike at the very heart of law enforcement.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Global Pursuit
programme.desc: In Langley, Virginia, a terrorist fired into rush hour traffic. The victims seemed randomly selected, but the motive appeared to be political, targeting employees of the Central Intelligence Agency.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Held For Ransom
programme.desc: Wealth has its rewards, but it also brings its dangers. Kidnapping is one of them. No ordeal is more horrifying for a family than to have a child taken.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Threat
programme.desc: A suspected drug dealer would stop at nothing to keep local and federal authorities from building a case against him. When his organization started targeting the government itself, federal agencies went on high alert.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Killing Spree
programme.desc: In 1984, in South Florida, a rapist and murderer was on the loose. The killer was a ruthless and terrifying predator, the newest member of an infamous group known as serial killers.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Blood Brothers
programme.desc: When the small community of Noel, Missouri discovered their bank was robbed, they're shocked. When the bank president turned up missing, they're outraged. And when clues began to surface the facts were more terrible than anyone could have guessed.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The World Trade Center Bombing
programme.desc: Terrorist bombings are what happen in other countries. Not here in the United States. And yet, in 1993, it happened in New York City.

channel.desc: From true-crime factual series to binge-worthy procedurals, this channel will bring together everything that makes crime so fascinating to viewers.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Dingy Net Grab, Walk The Plank, Turkey Feast, Under Boat Flag Grab
programme.sub-title: Dingy Net Grab, Walk The Plank, Turkey Feast, Under Boat Flag Grab
programme.desc: Contestants will face wild stunts in and out of water as well as a nasty Thanksgiving dinner: Fear Factor style.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Sinking Room Escape, Santa's Worst Nightmare, Pipe Ramp Roof Slide
programme.sub-title: Sinking Room Escape, Santa's Worst Nightmare, Pipe Ramp Roof Slide
programme.desc: Contestants will be bound to a chair suspended over the water. Then, dressed in a dog bite protection suit, contestants must climb out of a chimney and face Santa's worst Christmas ever in this special holiday episode.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Tarzan Semi To Semi, Fear Factor Donut Shop, Falling Beam Maze
programme.sub-title: Tarzan Semi To Semi, Fear Factor Donut Shop, Falling Beam Maze
programme.desc: Contestants stand on top of moving trucks, then play a game to determine how many disgusting donuts they will have to eat.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Helicopter Couples Hang, Tuna Transfer
programme.desc: In one couples' stunt, the male contestants will be hung by their ankles under helicopters. In another, each team will be in their own massive trough filled with fish guts, squid, and fish scales.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Double Eat & Yank, Gross Catapult
programme.desc: In one couples' stunt, the contestants will stand at a podium on the roof of a 5 story building. The first contestant loads a piece of cow stomach onto a catapult, which will then launch the stomach down to their partner.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Blind Driving Race To Truck,Double Tunnel Flush
programme.sub-title: Blind Driving Race To Truck,Double Tunnel Flush
programme.desc: A male contestant's head is placed through a hole cut into the bottom of a slightly angled sewer pipe with his arms shackled around the outside of the pipe, among other exciting stunts.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Weighted Ski Boot Rescue, Block Head
programme.sub-title: Weighted Ski Boot Rescue, Block Head
programme.desc: Laying face down on the floor, contestants' heads will be placed in separate medieval looking helmets, filled with snakes and rats. In another stunt, one of the contestants will be seated on a platform above water wearing weighted boots.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Fear Factor Triathlon, Electric Maze
programme.desc: Contestants will each be standing on the back of a flatbed truck driving down the edge of a pier. Contestant must guide their blindfolded partner through a maze of electrical tripwires.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Train Lean and Grab, Gross Gorge
programme.sub-title: Train Lean and Grab, Gross Gorge
programme.desc: In one couples' stunt, each contestant will stand on a beam suspended in the air off the sides of a train box car. Then, in a banquet room, couples will feed each other as much disgusting food as they can.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Boat Helicopter Truck Car Jump,Bullfrog Coffin
programme.sub-title: Boat Helicopter Truck Car Jump,Bullfrog Coffin
programme.desc: Both contestants in the finals will ride on the back of an Ultraboat as a helicopter settles in overhead. The male contestant will be placed in a bamboo cage filled with large bullfrogs, which is then lowered into a pit.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Helicopter Rope Transfer,Tumbler Cage,Gross Obstacle Course,Up & Over Car Ramp
programme.sub-title: Helicopter Rope Transfer,Tumbler Cage,Gross Obstacle Course,Up & Over Car Ramp
programme.desc: A rope will be suspended between two helicopters. Contestants will be standing in a tall cage. Contestants must discover a key to a box of worms', which will be transferred onto a scale.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Submerged Car Rotisserie, Fear Factor Sushi Bar, Wall Sweeper
programme.sub-title: Submerged Car Rotisserie, Fear Factor Sushi Bar, Wall Sweeper
programme.desc: Contestant is locked by their waist to the drivers seat and wrist to the steering wheel. Contestants determine the quantity and variety of Fear Factor Sushi they will have to eat. A six-inch wide beam will be sticking out perpendicular from a roof top.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Helicopter Dual Drop, Yo Yo Tank, Cattle Trench, Semi To Tanker Truck
programme.sub-title: Helicopter Dual Drop, Yo Yo Tank, Cattle Trench, Semi To Tanker Truck
programme.desc: Contestants will be seated in a helicopter and hang directly under the skids. One of the partners will be dangling by their ankle.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Houdini Hang w/ Car Slide & Pyro, Fear Factor Cocktail Bar, Rope Traverse and Toss
programme.sub-title: Houdini Hang w/ Car Slide & Pyro, Fear Factor Cocktail Bar, Rope Traverse and Toss
programme.desc: Fear Factor goes to Vegas! One stunt begins with a contestant hanging in mid-air with their wrists and ankles bound. In another stunt, contestants consume sickening cocktails.

channel.desc: Imagine a world where your greatest fears become reality. In each pulse-racing "Fear Factor" episode, recruited contestants battle in extreme stunts. These stunts are designed to challenge the contestants both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: A Tale of Two Pilots
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joe's doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Ice Jam
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load he's ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac. City girl Christine moves to Yellowknife to give the unglamorous rampie life a shot.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: A Very Buffalo Christmas
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north. But a series of problems with the Electra leave the company in a jam.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Crash Landing
programme.desc: Captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake. The ice strip landing goes fine, but when the plane takes off from the strip, the right landing gear gets stuck in the wheel well.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: For Sale By Owner
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready. But a landing gear emergency puts him and chief pilot Justin in serious danger.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Over Seas
programme.desc: Buffalo has to get a CL-215 water bomber to buyers in Korea. So Justin and Cory fly the plane to Vancouver Harbour, where it will be hoisted onto a cargo ship sailing across the Pacific Ocean to its destinatin, a method of delivery no one has ever tried.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Water Wings
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalo's water bomber plane to buyers there but are frustrated by the buyers' poor planning. Tempers flare when they try to get the plane off the ship and delivered to its final destination

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Meltdown
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Ray's retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition. So Buffalo brings in Electra pilot Brian Harrison to finish the contract.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: North Atlantic Convoy
programme.desc: Greenland's Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the world's most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey. Christine pushes to become a DC-3 co-pilot,

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Sunk
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago. It's a personal quest for Joe; he flew that plane at the beginning of his career.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Turkey or Bust
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey. Metal rock band Iron Maiden's lead singer Bruce Dickinson flies Buffalo's DC-3 from Edmonton to Yellowknife.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Cold Start
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne. A landing gear collapse on the runway sends the entire crew scrambling.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Shootout
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Snowplane
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Gear Lock
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Aussie Ace
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

channel.desc: Ice Pilots is about an eccentric airline and its motley crew that fly vintage planes on impossible arctic missions. Buffalo Airways attracts young pilots seeking Arctic adventure and the chance to fly big, old, piston powered aircrafts from a bygone era.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Against All Odds
programme.desc: With Jack out of commission, all eyes turn to Crow as he swoops in to duel Jakob! Does Crow have what it takes to take down Team New World's best duelist, or will Crow suffer the same cruel fate that sent his teammate crashing into defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: For Synchro's Sake
programme.desc: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance, Yusei Fudo from Team 5D's looks to rev it up against Team New World's Jakob in the final round of the World Racing Grand Prix!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Fight for the Future
programme.desc: After witnessing Jakob, Primo and Lester fuse together to form the all-powerful Aporia, Yusei must now figure out a way to defeat this formidable foe before he destroys New Domino City!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Victory or Doom
programme.desc: In the exciting conclusion to the World Racing Grand Prix, Yusei Fudo, facing his toughest opponent ever, must rev it up one last time if he hopes to defeat Aporia and save New Domino City from being destroyed!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Link into the VRAINS
programme.desc: When a nefarious group of hackers threatens to destroy the cyber world, one duelist is determined to stop them – Playmaker!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Seize the Wind!
programme.desc: The Knights of Hanoi have set their sights on stealing Playmaker’s AI – but he won’t give it up without a fight!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Contact
programme.desc: Yusaku’s AI holds countless secrets, and Yusaku is determined to uncover every one!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Pain and Gain
programme.desc: The Gore - LINK VRAINS’ biggest and boldest bruiser - is looking to pin Playmaker for the three count!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Down for the Count
programme.desc: Gore’s looking to suplex Playmaker into submission, but Playmaker’s not about to tap out!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: True Blue
programme.desc: Blue Angel hopes to give her fans something to scream about by defeating Playmaker, but after receiving a dangerous card from the Knights of Hanoi, her fans might be screaming for all the wrong reasons!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: Playmaker’s battle takes a dark and dangerous turn when a malicious virus infects Blue Angel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: A Storm is Coming
programme.desc: To cure Blue Angel, Playmaker must put Ai on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Malicious Mayhem
programme.desc: Playmaker takes on Varis and learns there’s more to Ai than meets the eye!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Varis and Playmaker raise the stakes when they put the brakes on their Speed Duel and battle it out in Master Duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Neutralized
programme.desc: Varis’ relentless onslaught continues as he pummels Playmaker into digital dust!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Link the Circuit
programme.desc: Playmaker’s duel with Varis reveals a link connecting his past to the present!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Playback
programme.desc: Frog and Pigeon plan an exclusive expose on Playmaker after Ghost Gal supplies them with the goods on Link VRAINS’ newest hero!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: An Invitation
programme.desc: Ghost Gal’s gained backdoor access to Sol Tech’s database and Playmaker’s ready to duel her for it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Camouflaged Chaos
programme.desc: Playmaker hacks into Sol Tech’s database in search of answers, but he finds trouble instead when he runs into a pair of destructive AIs!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Hack Attack
programme.desc: Blue Angel swoops in from the blue to save Playmaker from two AIs designed to destroy!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Blue’s Back!
programme.desc: Blue Angel continues her duel against an AI whose prime directives are: duel, decimate, delete!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Dueling for Answers
programme.desc: Playmaker battles Zaizen to unlock Sol Tech’s databank and the secrets to his past!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: The Lost Incident
programme.desc: The chilling details of the past are finally revealed as Playmaker continues his battle with Zaizen.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: A Piece of the Puzzle
programme.desc: Zaizen has the upper hand, but Playmaker’s looking to make one last play to take him down!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Story Time!
programme.desc: Ai updates Roboppi’s processors on the who, what, where, and why of LINK VRAINS!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: The Deleted
programme.desc: Duelists are mysteriously being logged into LINK VRAINS against their will, and it’s up to Yusaku to find out why!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: A Grim Tale
programme.desc: When a Ph.D. in DNA challenges Gore to a duel, the prognosis is positively grim!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: To Gore Or Not To Gore
programme.sub-title: To Gore Or Not To Gore
programme.desc: Can Gore turn his duel around before the doctor of DNA deletes him!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Suture the Circuit
programme.desc: Blue Angel takes on the mastermind who developed the virus that deletes duelists!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Diagnosis: Deletion
programme.desc: Blue Angel’s looking to Speed Duel her way to victory, but the diabolical doctor she’s battling is set on prescribing a dose of defeat!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: The Brave Battler
programme.desc: With LINK VRAINS under attack, it’s up to the flashiest duelist ever to save the day – Shima!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Bugging Out
programme.desc: The fate of LINK VRAINS hangs in the balance as Playmaker faces off against one of Hanoi’s top lieutenants!

channel.desc: Giant monsters! Powerful magic! And ancient Egyptian legends! The Yu-Gi-Oh! Channel is your destination for action-packed adventure series that hold all the cards. It’s your move!

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: In this down-to-earth dramedy, a widowed advice columnist and single father (Steve Carell) falls in love with a French beauty (Juliette Binoche) only to discover she is dating his brother.

programme.title: Keep The Aspidistra Flying
programme.desc: When successful advertiser, Gordon Comstock (Richard E. Grant), abruptly walks away from his career to pursue his dream of being a poet, his path is much more difficult than expected and soon financial problems begin to pile up.

programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.

programme.title: Gloves Off
programme.desc: Following his boxing trainer’s sudden death during his championship fight, Doug has inherited a crumbling debt-ridden gym, packed full of a mixed bag of crazy would-be pugilists.

programme.title: Mighty Aphrodite
programme.desc: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute. Starring: Woody Allen, Mira Sorvino, Pamela Blair, Denise Faye, Marian Filali, Helena Bonham Carter

programme.title: Nobel Son
programme.desc: On the eve of Barkley Michaelson's father receiving the Nobel Prize, Barkley is kidnapped and the requested ransom is the $2,000,000 in Nobel Prize money.

programme.title: But I'm a Cheerleader: But I'm a Cheerleader
programme.desc: A cheerleading-obsessed teenager is sent to a strict summer camp when her parents suspect her of being a lesbian.

programme.title: The Year of Getting to Know Us
programme.desc: Christopher Rocket's road to happiness has taken him down a bumpy path and during a trip home to Florida, Christopher is finally forced to come to terms with a past he'd rather forget and a future he's doing his best to avoid.

channel.desc: For the most hilarious, most quotable, most excellent movies that will keep you in stitches 24/7, watch Pluto TV Comedy Movies. With a library of lunacy and a litany of ludicrousness, this is the place when you are looking to LOL.

programme.title: The Romantics
programme.desc: Oscar winner Anna Paquin and Katie Holmes prove nothing complicates love like friendship in this zeitgeist love story.

programme.title: 30 Days until I'm Famous
programme.desc: A Latina working in Los Angeles as a messenger is randomly discovered and fashioned into a pop music star.

programme.title: All She Wishes
programme.desc: When sardonic high school senior Sophie O'Dea inherits her neurotic grandmother's car, an old automobile named Star, she is told the car has magical powers.

programme.title: A Random Encounter
programme.desc: What seems to be a chance encounter one day at a coffee shop leads to a full-fledged romance, but the couple must fight for their relationship to survive the craziness that is show business. Starring: Meghan Markle, Sean Young, Michael Rady

programme.title: Love Potion #9
programme.desc: Paul, a geek biochemist with no luck at all with women, is persuaded by his friends to visit a gypsy. She gives him "Love Potion #9", an elixir which can potentially force anyone of the opposite sex to instantly fall in love with him.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: When Jack and Amanda head off on a glamping trip to "reignite their spark", their blissful romantic getaway is rudely hijacked and they are left in more trouble than before!

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Emma has made a career out of her sensible, and responsible approach to relationships. She has a radio talk show, and a loving relationship with her fiancé, Richard. Then Emma finds out that she is already married to a man she’s never met before

programme.title: Love Under The Stars
programme.desc: When a 30-something woman living in an infinite state of youth is finally forced out into the real world, she befriends a young girl and a widower that will teach her that it is okay to grow up.

programme.title: 4 Wedding Planners
programme.desc: When Lily goes home to Hawaii, she wants to help save her family's wedding planning business, even when her ex-boyfriend shows up as a new client.

channel.desc: Celebrate love with Pluto TV Romance, with wall to wall Rom Com's, tear jerkers, and epic love stories which will make you laugh, cry and feel all fuzzy inside.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Gwrych Castle: Secrets of the Unknown
programme.sub-title: Gwrych Castle: Secrets of the Unknown
programme.desc: In the thrilling conclusion, Bex and Sean return to Gwrych Castle for intense paranormal investigations. Eerie chambers, mysterious apparitions, and chilling whispers await as they seek conclusive otherworldly proof.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Phantoms of Formby: Starfish Bunker Unveiled
programme.sub-title: Phantoms of Formby: Starfish Bunker Unveiled
programme.desc: Join "Ghost Dimension" at Merseyside's Formby Starfish Bunker. Unveil its wartime secrets, encountering eerie whispers, phantom footsteps, and soldier apparitions. Can they capture undeniable proof of the paranormal?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Sands Lake Secrets: Paranormal Mysteries
programme.desc: Explore paranormal phenomena at Sands Lake – from mysterious voices to ghostly encounters. The secrets of this haunting location are unveiled.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Sands Lake Spirits: Haunted Legends
programme.desc: In part two of our Sands Lake investigation, we dive deeper into the unexplained, capturing voices from the beyond and unlocking the lake's mysteries.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Shadows' Whispers: Barn Haunting
programme.desc: Join us as we uncover eerie voices, paranormal encounters, and unsolved mysteries within a barn with a chilling history.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Dark Echoes: Haunted Barn Unveiled
programme.desc: Dive into the unexplained as we explore a barn filled with uncharted spirits, whispers from the other side, and chilling encounters.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Haunting Echoes: Clarke Zoo's Secrets
programme.desc: Join us on a chilling investigation as we unravel the spectral enigmas within Clarke Zoo Gardens. Eerie encounters and eerie secrets await.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Beyond the Veil: Zoo's Ghostly Enigma
programme.sub-title: Beyond the Veil: Zoo's Ghostly Enigma
programme.desc: In the heart of Clarke Zoo, paranormal activity reigns. We journey deeper, uncovering spine-tingling apparitions and ghostly revelations.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Factory Whispers: Unraveling Unknown
programme.desc: In 'Whispers in the Factory,' our team delves into a historic site, where eerie voices and enigmatic questions haunt every corner. Uncover the mysteries of restless spirits as we journey through a chilling landscape of the unknown.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: The Curse Of The Pendle Witches - Part 1
programme.sub-title: The Curse Of The Pendle Witches - Part 1
programme.desc: Sean heads deep into the Pendle Hills in search of the Pendle Witches that went to trial in 1612 and were hung for witchcraft. The investigation takes an unexpected twist with a stop at the New Inn, Pendles most haunted pub.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: The Curse Of The Pendle Witches - Part 2
programme.sub-title: The Curse Of The Pendle Witches - Part 2
programme.desc: Sean continues his investigation of Pendle Hill and ventures even deeper into the hills. The night takes an unexpected turn with a dramatic ending, which he believes was caused by the witches.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Shadow Menace Haunting Morley Market - Part 1
programme.sub-title: Shadow Menace Haunting Morley Market - Part 1
programme.desc: Sean heads to the town of Morley to investigate the infamous Morley Market. A place once bustling with people from years gone by, it is now haunted by shadow figures, and they appear to want to make themselves known.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Shadow Menace Haunting Morley Market - Part 2
programme.sub-title: Shadow Menace Haunting Morley Market - Part 2
programme.desc: Sean continues the investigation at Morley Market and appears to be followed by a spirit person that wants to touch him and distract him from investigating certain parts of the main hall. Will he uncover who this spirit is?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Horror at Sandhole Cottage - Part 1
programme.desc: Sean returns to his former, haunted home. No tenant has ever been able to stay the full term. Sean wants to seek out the spirits once and for all, to finally find out what is haunting his former home.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Horror at Sandhole Cottage - Part 2
programme.desc: Sean continues his investigation of Sandhole Cottage and appears to be in direct contact with the spirits that haunted any tenants that came to live there. Will he finally get them to rest?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Opening The Book at Leeds Library - Part 1
programme.sub-title: Opening The Book at Leeds Library - Part 1
programme.desc: Sean delves deep and opens a new chapter for the Ghost Dimension Flying Solo series as he investigates Leeds Library, to uncover what is haunting and frightening the staff that work here.

channel.desc: A 24/7 channel that takes Ghost investigations to a whole new level. Using the latest technical instruments to collect and record evidence as well as incorporating good old fashioned ghost hunting techniques.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit homes in Crewe, Kent and Islington.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 28
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a 3 bedroom property in Mid-Glamorgan, a house in London and an old telephone exchange in Devon.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander view a cottage in Kent and three-bedroom terrace in Derby.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 1
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a house in Lincolnshire which must be pretty solid, a piece of land in Swindon with a good opportunity for someone and a grand property in Ipswich.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 10
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a chapel in Nottinghamshire where all the pews are gone but there is one survivor, a semi in Swindon that hasn't been touched in years and building on this Woodland in Leeds could prove a challenge.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 5
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a house in Nottinghamshire that is just waiting for its potential to be tapped, a north west London flat that'll need more than a steamer to sort out the décor, and finally a cottage in Cornwall is not what it seems from the outside.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Somerset, Wokingham and Stoke-on-Trent.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 13
programme.desc: Lucy and Martin visit a terraced property in leafy surroundings in North Manchester, a lovely character cottage with original features in Greenwich, and a three storey Victorian house in Harrogate.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 22
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Wigan that has a case of wash day blues, a flat in Reading and in Kent a house, that if it was a car it would be a convertible.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 21
programme.desc: Martin & Lucy visit a confined ground floor flat in Wiltshire, a cottage in Kent and a plot of land in Yorkshire.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 20
programme.desc: Lucy and Martin travel to Ashford to see a top heavy house which looks like the architect may have had the plans the wrong way up! There's a semi in Derbyshire, but anyone tempted may have to bid twice if they also want the development land at the back.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 29
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a character flat in London, a period house in Dover and a two bedroom terrace in South Wales with mouthwatering potential.

channel.desc: This British daytime TV institution is now in it 22nd season on BBC1 and show's no sign of losing any of it's curb appeal.Wannabe property developers chance their arm in the auction room buying properties to let.

programme.title: Jabberwocky
programme.desc: A young peasant, with no interest in adventure or fortune, is mistaken as the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.

programme.title: House On Haunted Hill
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.title: Small Time Crooks
programme.desc: A loser of a crook and his wife strike it rich when a botched bank job's cover business becomes a spectacular success. Starring: Woody Allen, Tracey Ullman, Hugh Grant, Michael Rapaport, Tony Darrow, Laurine Towler

programme.title: Killing Dad
programme.desc: One of the all-time great British black comedies! A man goes looking for his long lost dad – only to meet a voracious older woman who is, apparently, the sex bomb of Southend.

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.

programme.title: Inseminoid
programme.desc: Cult horror director Norman J Warren helms this once-banned sci-fi nasty about a space archaeologist who goes missing, only to return pregnant – but with what? Cue the gore!

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: A small rural town finds itself in the grip of an infection which send its hosts into a violent, homicidal frenzy.

programme.title: Satan's Slave
programme.desc: The beautiful and young Catherine is trapped in a remote country mansion with her uncle and sadistic cousin, having nightmares of witches, torture and satanic covens performing unspeakable rituals.

programme.title: La Grande Bouffe
programme.desc: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

channel.desc: From the “so bad it’s good” to the “so weird it’s great,” Pluto TV Cult Films is like having your own personal drive-in movie theater playing the wildest, funniest, and most-beloved cult classics ever made.

programme.title: Hunter: Fatal Obsession Part 1
programme.desc: A former girlfriend complicates Hunter's investigation of a string of campus murders while Molenski becomes the target of a cop-killer.

programme.title: Hunter: Fatal Obsession Part 2
programme.desc: When Molenski is killed, a serial murder expert agrees to postpone her leave of absence in order to help Hunter track the killer who may be tied to previous murders.

programme.title: Hunter: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: Hunter unwittingly helps a businessman find and kill a fleeing executive set to take the blame for the company's graft.

programme.title: Hunter: The Reporter
programme.desc: Hunter's new partner, Chris Novak, is pleased when an old friend and reporter comes to do a story on police work, until the reporter's enthusiasm impedes an armed robbery investigation.

programme.title: Hunter: Room Service
programme.desc: Old passions and jealousies flare when Hunter is forced to work with Novak's ex-husband to solve a series of airport robberies. Novak tries to find an escaped prisoner she once arrested.

programme.title: Hunter: Shadows of the Past
programme.desc: When Chris Novak's estranged father returns to her life, it's not to rekindle their relationship but to find and kill a man who can expose his involvement in a drug ring.

programme.title: Hunter: The Grab
programme.desc: Chris' daughter is kidnapped to prevent the girl's father from providing Hunter and Chris with vital information on a killer and a counterfeit ring.

programme.title: Hunter: All That Glitters
programme.desc: Hunter searches for the killer of several coin dealers while Novak is concerned about the arrest of a teenaged mugger who victimized her neighbor.

programme.title: Hunter: Cries of Silence
programme.desc: As Hunter investigates the murder of a foreign dignitary's assistant, Novak searches for a runaway teenager linked to the killings.

programme.title: Hunter: Ex Marks the Spot
programme.desc: A series of cleaning store robberies exposes the chain's owner as the decoy for a money laundering conspiracy and causes suspicion in his dangerous partners.

programme.title: Hunter: Little Man with a Big Reputation
programme.sub-title: Little Man with a Big Reputation
programme.desc: Devane becomes entangled in the life of an ex-convict who disappears shortly before his wedding.

programme.title: Hunter: Pilot
programme.desc: Hunter answers a murder call and suspects a serial killer, while McCall works on the King Hayes case. With Brian Dennehy.

programme.title: Hunter: Hard Contract
programme.desc: McCall's ex-partner, a former police officer, has gone bad. In an attempt to save him from putting himself behind bars, McCall and Hunter go after him and try to stop him.

programme.title: Hunter: The Hot Grounder
programme.desc: Commissioner Larry Crenshaw's wife is blown up one morning while moving the commissioner's car.

channel.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Euronews offers a unique perspective on world events. It empowers people to make up their own mind by delivering factual analysis and a diversity of viewpoints. Because all views matter, Euronews is "All Views".

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 2
programme.desc: Fifth Gear presenter Jonny Smith is granted access-all-areas to Kia's top secret test facility in the Californian desert where he investigates the lengths manufacturers go to in the quest for ever greater reliability.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 3
programme.desc: Jason Plato is joined by former F1 driver Karun Chandhok as they pit a Honda Civic Type-R, a Seat Leon Cupra-R, a Renault Megane RS and a Audi S3 against one another to see who will be crowned king of the hot-hatches in an all-new Deathmatch

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 4
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Jonny Smith battle the elements to find out if a caravan or a camper van is the ultimate way to experience the great outdoors. Elsewhere in the show, the team hit the local supermarket to find out about the new Dacia Duste

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 5
programme.desc: Jonny Smith and Vicki Butler-Henderson review two mighty 4x4's in one of the shows muddiest Dog Fights. Elsewhere, the team hit the road in the all-new Alpine A110 to find out what's changed since the first incarnation hit our streets back in 1961.r

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jason Plato is joined by ex-Formula One driver Karun Chandhok to battle it out on the track in two of the most sort-after super sports cars; Porsche 911 GT3 RS vs Nissan GT-R Nismo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 7
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Karun Chandhok test four bare essential sports cars to find out which is the ultimate way to get some track day thrills for around £50,000. The Fifth Gear team test Ford's latest hot hatch, the Fiesta ST.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 8
programme.desc: In this episode Tiff Needell and Jason Plato take the new Ford Mustang and Chevrolet Camaro on track to find out if the Americans are now producing performance cars us Brits should be taking notice of.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: The Super Saloons & Super Coupe Collection
programme.desc: Fifth Gear presents some of the best super saloons and super coupes - that have been featured on the show over the last twenty years.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: The Ultimate Crash Test
programme.desc: Fifth Gear showcases a collection of the show's highly complex and high-octane crash tests from the show's twenty-year history.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: The Ultimate Supercars
programme.desc: Jason Plato looks at some of the ultimate attention grabbers that have been tested on Fifth Gear over the past two decades

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson returns to Anglesey for more shootouts; Tom Ford visits Spain to drive the new Land Cruiser; Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford visits billionaire Bernie Ecclestone's sprawling garage to explore his rare collection before he auctions off more than 50 of these unique models.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom and Jonny enter the grueling Exeter Trial, a 24-hour off-road driving event that has been held for 100 years, in an old Volkswagen Beetle.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff gets to drive the Aston Martin DBS, the latest James Bond car; Jonny Smith embarks on a 600-mile transcontinental trip to test out the world's first diesel Grand Tourer.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith hunts down three cars that fall within budget for parents on their first year of motoring.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson attends a shootout between two chic superminis: the BMW Mini One and the Fiat 500.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato meets Paul Vickery, captain of the England rugby team; Tom Ford journeys to the Arctic to test the Volvo XC70 in extreme conditions; Tiff Needell tests out the Lexus IS-F.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato joins Britain's best downhill skier, Chemmy Alcott, to drive a Group N rally car; Tom Ford drives the Citroen C5 in Lisbon; Tiff takes a look at the latest Subaru Impreza.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny tries to find some fine coupes for less than £1,500.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki takes two of Ford's fastest and most iconic hot hatches to Anglesey; Tom Ford volunteers to aid mountain rescue teams equipped with Hummer H3s.

channel.desc: Resident presenters and most knowledgeable drivers on TV, Tiff Needell, Vicki Butler-Henderson and Johnny Smith, provide the inside track on all things motoring.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Judi Buenoano secretly murdered lovers to claim on insurance policies whilst nurse Genene Jones secretly killed at least 46 infants left in her care between 1980 and 1982.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: We want to believe that all women would give their lives to protect their children. But there are horrifying cases when a mother will turn against her natural instinct and kill her own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Love to Death
programme.desc: Love and money are a beautiful marriage, for the lucky ones they create a life of happiness and ease. Unless the love is of money, the bride is a killer, and the groom their victim.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Sometimes, when a man and a woman unite, a terrible urge for destruction can awaken in them both. Happy couples become deadly teams, intent on one goal: murder.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: While their sisters chose a life of sensible, suburban motherhood, these deadly women chose a life of crime. They lived with the thrills, the danger and the deadly consequences of being outlaws.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: While marriage is meant to be for life, it often ends in divorce. These wives took their marriages vow seriously: "till death do us part."

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Nurse Beverley Allitt overdosed multiple infants, Stella Nickell poisoned medicine capsules in stores and Kathleen Follbigg killed four of her own children.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Psychopathic killers lurk in society, mostly acting alone. Sometimes fate brings them into contact with another person who shares their cold power to kill.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: These women would stop at nothing to get their hands on the cash they needed. From husbands to strangers to other people’s babies, they spilt blood for money.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: The path towards revenge can sometimes lead to murder. It can be quick, fiery and violent. It can also be a dish served cold, the product of a calm, calculated plot.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Lover's Revenge
programme.desc: These women burn madly with anger so deep they'll kill to satisfy it. What makes them turn on the ones they love? Find out as we explore the reasons for a lover's revenge.

programme.title: Deadly Women: A Daughter's Revenge
programme.desc: Every day, teenage girls are being scolded by their parents, only to respond with tears and slammed bedroom doors. Some daughters won’t take "no" for an answer, and these girls become deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Lethal Love
programme.desc: Love is a powerful emotion, one that sits in the core of our soul and fills our lives with hope. But when love turns sour, the results can be deadly. In an act of revenge, these deadly women unite with one common goal, to kill.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Sometimes the innocence of childhood is swept away by dark thoughts and violent currents. Deep and disturbing psychological impulses will drive a child to kill another child.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Revenge is one of the oldest motives for murder, but these cases are much more than an “eye for an eye.”

channel.desc: Why do women kill? Deadly Women investigates true crime stories & reveals the horrific murders these women commit & the psyche behind their cold-blooded crimes, through revenge, fatal affairs, greed or just pure rage.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Unabomber
programme.desc: For nearly two decades a mathematical genius with delusions of single-handedly destroying industrial society, planted or mailed powerful bombs to unsuspecting innocent victims.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Paradise
programme.desc: It should have been Shangri-La, but when bad blood developed, piracy took over and the only law was the law of the jungle.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Melissa Brannen: Missing
programme.desc: In 1989, residents of a close-knit apartment community in Virginia gathered for a holiday celebration. For Tammy Brannen and five-year-old daughter Melissa, Christmas was always a special time. Then, without warning, the little girl was gone.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Bank robbery is a brazen yet simple crime. A mask, a gun, a note passed to a teller. But bank burglary is different. It takes skill to disable an alarm, to penetrate a locked vault.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Murdering Cowboy
programme.desc: The sun set on the Wild West long ago, but some people refused to notice. Claude Dallas was one of them. A wily trapper, Dallas typified the rugged individualism that forged this country. He went too far when he killed two game wardens in 1981.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A daring kidnapping and a bizarre ransom note baffled Mississippi authorities. The victim was the wife of a wealthy businessman. A list of 12 names and a few drops of blood were the only clues to her fate.

programme.title: The FBI Files: A Stranger in Town
programme.desc: She appeared on the highway in the spring, a young woman, her life cut short, her past and her identity a mystery. Only by finding out who she was could we ever hope to find her killer.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Driven to Kill
programme.desc: A serial rapist targeted women. His dark urges raged out of control and led him to murder. He followed a path so random it was impossible to trace, and all that tied him to his crimes were his access to the highways and a bizarre sexual fetish.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Takeover
programme.desc: Two armed bank robbers hit a Seattle bank taking over 150,000 dollars. Before they can escape police confront them and the pair splits up. As authorities search block by block they learn one was a career criminal with a long history of violence.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Killing Zone
programme.desc: In the 1990's the war on drugs was in full swing. The front lines were often America's inner cities where gangs use violence and murder to rule their empires.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Dishonored
programme.desc: Shirley Russell was determined enough to reach the rank of Captain in the United States Marine Corps. When this officer turned up missing, her colleagues refused to believe she had gone AWOL. It was unclear whether Captain Shirley Russell was alive.

programme.title: The FBI Files: When Seconds Count
programme.desc: On July 2nd 1994, a 12-year-old girl was abducted from her home in northern California. The FBI knows to act fast, search wide, enlist volunteers. But as the hours slipped by, agents also realized their chances for recovering her alive grew slim.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Predator
programme.desc: In the early 1990's, Washington, D.C., became the murder capital of the nation. Few were left untouched by gang violence, which was ignited by the drug trade. By 1994, that violence would strike at the very heart of law enforcement.

channel.desc: Produced with the full cooperation of the Federal Bureau of Investigation. Through dramatic reenactments and interviews with agents and scientists' viewers witness the actual process of some of the FBI's most famous investigations.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded: CONSTRUCTION
programme.desc: Bridges and tunnels have transformed the way we live, making the inaccessible easy to reach, and turning time consuming journeys into convenient commutes, but when things go wrong they can go very wrong indeed.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded: HURRICANES
programme.desc: Hurricanes, Typhoons and Cyclones all the same thing with different names – what they also have in common is their destructive power! Hurricanes are large, swirling storms and winds from a hurricane can damage buildings or trees.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded: TORNADO
programme.desc: A tornado is a violently rotating column of air extending from the base of a thunderstorm down to the ground. Tornadoes are capable of completely destroying well-made structures, uprooting trees, and hurling objects through the air like deadly missiles.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded: AIR, LAND AND SEA
programme.desc: Planes, trains and ships, our mass transit systems, have had a profound effect on mankind, making the world smaller and more connected.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Floods

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: El Niño
programme.desc: It is estimated that between 1997 and 1998, “El Niño” took the lives of 24,000 people and created a startling $34 billion (US) in economic damages worldwide. In this episode we explain what “El Niño” is.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Hurricanes
programme.desc: With a combination of torrential rain, powerful winds, and devastating storm surges, Hurricanes are among Mother Nature’s most calamitous natural disasters.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Floods
programme.desc: Water may seem harmless, but in enormous quantities, it can be an astonishingly destructive force. Apart from famine, floods have resulted in more deaths worldwide than any other natural disaster.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Pandemics
programme.desc: With an ever more mobile world population, potentially growing in size to 11 billion people by the next century, public health experts agree that the possibility of a cataclysmic disease is more likely now than ever before.

programme.title: Naked Science: Death Of The Earth
programme.desc: The earth is 4.5 billion years old and it is slowly dying. Tectonic activity is slowly cooling the planet – the continents will eventually move together to form a new supercontinent called Pangea Ultima.

channel.desc: From the depths of the ocean to the distant cosmos, be inspired by crazy experiments, unbelievable science facts, and talks from famous scientists on Pluto TV Science.

programme.title: The New Frontier: The Sun

programme.title: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT

programme.desc: The forces of nature, operating at large and small scales create a universe of symmetry and form.

programme.title: Hubble's Canvas: Vanishing Point

programme.title: Hubble's Canvas: Eye of the Beholder

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Amazon: One Jungle, Many Worlds
programme.desc: The Amazon is the largest rainforest in the world, and the richest ecosystem on earth. This film uncovers what makes the Amazon such a powerhouse of evolution; how it has come to home a third of all species on the planet.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth
programme.sub-title: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: Patagonia is a place of extremes  of vast ice fields and snow-capped mountains; of windswept deserts, and violent oceans. Survival here means being tough enough to cope with brutal winters, and canny enough to exploit brief seasons of plenty.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.sub-title: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.desc: Venezuela is famous for its lost worlds, its forbidding mountains, huge swamps, and impenetrable jungles, all seemingly cut off in space and time. Yet each is linked, by the mighty river: the Orinoco, the rumoured route to El Dorado, city of gold.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Pantanal: Brazil's Wild Heart
programme.desc: Every year the Pantanal is drowned by immense floods, and then suffer severe drought. Yet, while people struggle, the Pantanal hosts some of the greatest gatherings of animals on the planet.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: The Andes: World in the Clouds
programme.sub-title: The Andes: World in the Clouds
programme.desc: The longest chain of mountains in the world, the Andes run the length of western South America and dictate the climate for the whole continent. They include some of the highest peaks outside the Himalayas.

programme.title: Wildest Middle East

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Arctic Ocean: The Frozen Sea
programme.desc: The film follows a year in the High Arctic, where life is exceptionally entwined with the seasons. Journey to the Arctic where in winter, the sun doesn't rise for months on end, but in the summer thaws out in an explosion of life.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia

programme.title: The New Detectives: Patterns Of Guilt

programme.title: The New Detectives: Unlikely Sources

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected she’d run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Blood Money
programme.desc: Psychics Kelvin Cruickshank (NZ) and Deb Webber (Aus) investigate the unsolved murder of Lower Hutt pensioner 91 year old George Engelbrecht. In 1979, a burglar broke into George's home and beat the old man to death in his bed.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: In this episode of Sensing Murder we learn about the murder of Angela Blackmoore, a 21 year old woman with a 2 year old child. The child was not harmed and the killer has not been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: When The Trail Goes Cold
programme.desc: This episodes involves the disappearance of 62-year-old Kaye Stewart, a woman who went missing while on a short walk on June 13th, 2005.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: Jim Donnelly was a hard-working family man living a quiet life in suburban Auckland. For 20 years he’d worked as a scientist at the Glenbrook Steel Mill, south of Auckland. On the 21st of June 2004, he simply vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where There's Smoke
programme.desc: In 2006, 19-year-old Blake Stott died in a mysterious car fire. Blake had seemingly pulled into a South Otago lay-by to have a sleep, when his late-model, un-modified car burst into flames.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Bump in the Night
programme.desc: In 1980, six-year-old Alicia O'Reilly was raped and murdered in her bed, while her sister slept less than a metre away, and her mother sleeping across the hallway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost Soul
programme.desc: In 1985, 25-year-old Luana 'La Verne' Williams disappeared from her Tauranga home. Eight years later her disappearance was upgraged to a murder enquiry. Her body has never been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of 53-year-old, Cynthia Greenwood-Smith, to unravel the lies and discover the grim truth surrounding her disappearance from her Gold Coast home in 2001.

channel.desc: Sensing Murder, a documentary drama series for real unsolved murder. In this series, psychic detectives are challenged to put their powers to the test, delving into the lives of deceased victims and uncover secrets that surround their tragic deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Buried Alive: Luckman and Reid
programme.desc: On the night of 4 May 1982, 13-year-old Terry Ryan rushed into his family home in Marsden, a suburb of Brisbane, and told his mother an astonishing story.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Thrill Kill: The Janine Balding Murder
programme.sub-title: Thrill Kill: The Janine Balding Murder
programme.desc: On a September night in 1986, two police officers climbed through a barbed-wire fence beside the F4 freeway at Minchinbury in Sydney’s west.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.sub-title: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.desc: A young Sydney man was found guilty of strangling his ex-girlfriend and stuffing the teenager's body in a cricket bag.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Mystery of the Homestead Murders
programme.desc: The quick mind of a country telephone exchange supervisor led to a horrific discovery at a NSW country homestead in 1978.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.sub-title: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.desc: Rodney Francis Cameron was dubbed ‘The Lonely Hearts Killer’ after he used a radio match-making program in 1990 to lure an unsuspecting woman to her death. Incredibly, he had only just been released from prison for two other killings in 1974.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Predator: Leonard John Fraser

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.sub-title: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
