programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.sub-title: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.sub-title: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.sub-title: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

channel.desc: Crime Investigation Australia, the ultimate destination for true crime, uncovers its country’s most horrific crimes that shocked the nation. Watch chilling re-enactments & interviews and witness how police & forensic investigators solve the case.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls move on to Staten Island, where they live with an Italian-American family and do an internship at an advertising agency, where they clash with their straitlaced supervisor.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole arrive in Pennsylvania, where they stay with a family whose cat injures Nicole's dog, while their internship involves working at an airport.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole reach New Jersey, where they attempt to help their host family quit smoking and become spooked by their internship at a funeral home.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Back in Pennsylvania, Paris and Nicole must cope with a plastic surgery internship which is less than glamorous, and bond with their fun loving host family.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole's next stop is Baltimore, Maryland, where they work at a local news station and try to fulfill the rock dreams of their host family's eldest son.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stop in Delaware, where they help their new host family with a space problem, while their internship is at a lively daycare center.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole continue their travels through Maryland, living with a host family who Paris offers to cook for, and working at a bakery.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: As their latest internship with a psychic is only a short distance away, Paris and Nicole remain at the Foot family home, where they attempt to match make.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Back in New Jersey, Paris and Nicole work at an elderly living center, where they give the seniors a day to remember, before teaching their host family about the cruelty of hunting.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stay with a mother and son in Miami whose unusual pets prove useful for their ad agency internship, which involves creating a campaign for a new breakfast sandwich.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Havoc ensues when Paris and Nicole begin an internship with the Atlantic City Fire Department, while they task themselves with finding the daughter of their host family a new friend.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls intern at a manufacturing firm where their work proves dull, however they manage to have fun with their host family.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stay with a family in Tennessee, where they play matchmakers once more, while their internship is with a wedding planner.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Before they leave for New York, Paris and Nicole stay with the family of a former beauty queen, who convinces Paris to take part in a pageant, while their internship is at a dentist's office.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole take the place of a stay-at-home mom who has a young daughter, and also happens to be nine months pregnant!

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole trade in their designer dresses for traditional Pakistani attire when they take over the responsibilities of a Pakistani housewife.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole fill in for a housewife who feels her marriage is lacking a spark.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole spend the day tending to the needs and whims of four rambunctious kids.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole plan competing weddings for a lesbian couple.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole must take care of a toddler, as well as throw a party for his second birthday.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole take a break from household chores and go on a family vacation.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are paired with a hard-to-please husband.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole visit an artistic family with varied talents.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris can’t stand to spend another day as a housewife and hires an impersonator to take her place, giving Nicole an opportunity to exact her revenge.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris Hilton and Nicole Richie say goodbye to their jet-setting lifestyle in Los Angeles, and move in with the Ledings, a family in Altus, Arkansas.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are hired to work at a dairy farm operated by Albert’s no-nonsense friend, but after tiring of the hard work and smell, they head for a nearby hot tub… and end up getting fired.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are hired to work at a fast-food restaurant, but they’re bored and frustrated by the demands of the job, and soon rebel by pulling pranks during each of their assignments; when the Ledings reprimand them, the girls just go out dancing.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole agree to be honorary co-chairs of the Springtime Gala, but instead of working at the gala, they engage in their usual shocking behavior; the Ledings are embarrassed, and everyone in town is gossiping about Paris and Nicole.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls go to work for a cattle auctioneer, but when they’re sent to buy cattle feed, they charge several other items without permission; the auctioneer comes after them for the money, and the girl try to lie their way out of the debt.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole finally get a job they enjoy: working at a gas station, where there are plenty of guys to flirt with; but a confrontation erupts when Albert and Janet tell the girls to stay away from the small town boys, and the girls disobey them.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole reminisce about their month in Altus, make amends, and say goodbye to the people they’ve come to know before returning to Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Leeza Gibbons hosts a look back at Paris’ and Nicole’s stay in Altus, Arkansas, as the girls reunite with the Leding family in front of a studio audience.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole depart from Miami Beach toward their first destination, the Batten Family Ranch.

channel.desc: The challenge, whether surviving 30 days with a family on a farm, accepting various internships or travelling across country by bus, it’s no phones, no credit cards, no money. Paris Hilton & Nicole Richie give everything up for “The Simple Life.”

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Slippery Stairs and Wipeout Crash Cream
programme.sub-title: Slippery Stairs and Wipeout Crash Cream
programme.desc: This week contestants on Wipeout Australia are bought undone by a seemingly simple obstacle on the Qualifier, the Slippery Stairs. It's all in the name really, an innocent set of stairs, covered in Wipeout Crash cream.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: World's Strongest Dwarf, David Clarke and Gentle Giant, Tim Watts
programme.sub-title: World's Strongest Dwarf, David Clarke and Gentle Giant, Tim Watts
programme.desc: It's Sitcom Central on Wipeout Australia with the Odd Couple, starring World's Strongest Dwarf, David Clarke and Gentle Giant, Tim Watts. The Big Balls deliver some spectacular moments with an Italian chef being sliced and diced.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Bon Bon's Belly Dancing
programme.desc: Mesmerized by Bon Bon's Belly Dancing, we catch up with our favourite Big Balls in the Qualifier. They dish out punishment to Australia's very own female Jim Carrey and send Big Cat tamer Robbie into the pond.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Demolition Dave and more
programme.desc: Wipeout Australia debunks the myth that only young, fit and funky people should go on game shows. This week we are forced to take notice of Demolition Dave, a 49 year old South Australia man who smashes the qualifier.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Inconceivable Field Goal Swing Attempts
programme.desc: From singing Pastors to Wookies, this week is jammed pack with Characters, who battle it out on the Qualifier with amusing attempts at the inconceivable Field Goal Swing.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: 20 Greatest Hits
programme.desc: On this special episode, hosts James Brayshaw and Josh Lawson highlight the top 20 spills, face plants and wipeouts from the past season.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Premiere
programme.desc: Beams and Jets, Donut Swing, Big Balls, a Potato Sack, and Barrel Crossing are just some of the over-the-top obstacles included in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: The Bachelor
programme.desc: 20 ordinary Canadians will compete in the world's largest, most extreme obstacle course designed to provide the most spills, thrills and fantastic fumbles ever seen on television.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Athletes
programme.desc: Log Roll, Wall Swing, The Ring, Tippy Tables and Cylinder Run are among the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Beauties vs. Geeks

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Photobomber
programme.desc: Slippery Stairs, Block Swing, The Crusher, Log Roll, and Barrel Crossing are some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: East vs. West
programme.desc: 20 crazy contestants will face the Donut Run, Donut swing, The Tails and Tippy Tables in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Wipeout Workout
programme.desc: Topple towers, Cookie Cutter, The Tails, Teeter Totters and Crazy Beams are among the over-the-top obstacles on this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Hot Cop and The Fuzz
programme.desc: Buoys, Field Goal Swing, Big Donuts and Tippy Tables are some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Heroes
programme.desc: The Towers and Donuts, The Pole Vault, Dogeball, The Barrel Crossing and Double Beams are some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Food Fight
programme.desc: Beam and Jets, Field Goal Swing, The Toothbrush Bristles, Tippy Tables and Dock Maze are among some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Knitting Ninja
programme.desc: Dirty Balls, The Wall Swing, The Crusher, Crazy Beams and Big Donuts are among some of the over-the-top obstacles included in this week's episode.

channel.desc: Crashes, smashes and hilarious mud splashes are on the cards as twenty contestants take on one of television's largest and most extreme obstacle courses.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.

channel.desc: Undercover Boss takes real life big corporation CEOs out of their comfort zone, to work undercover within their own companies amongst their unsuspecting workforce. Will they be satisfied with what they uncover?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Corpses
programme.sub-title: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Corpses
programme.desc: The house, formerly owned by the \\"Father of American Surgery,\\" harbors a dark secret deep beneath its floors. Now restless spirits inhabit the home in which they were once the subjects of experiments and research.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Family of Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Mt. Pleasant, South Carolina to help the USS Yorktown's crew figure out if the paranormal activity they are experiencing points to their fallen heroes.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Ghost of a Marine
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads toMount Joy, Pennsylvania to help out the Great-Great Granddaughter of Alois Bube, the founder of Bube's Brewery.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Titanic Terror
programme.desc: TAPS gets on board the Titanic Exhibit at the Georgia Aquarium in Atlanta to investigate paranormal claims that have traveled around the world with the artifacts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: French Quarter Massacre
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads out to New Orleans, Louisiana to investigate their first case without Grant: The Jimani Lounge Massacre.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Betsy Ross House
programme.desc: A family living in a Revolutionary War era house in Pennsylvania fears for their child and urgently calls on the TAPS team for help.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Spirits of Jersey
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,the TAPS team visits the Absecon Lighthouse in Atlantic City, NJ. This lighthouse has activity reported ranging from untraceable footsteps and doors opening spontaneously, to coughing coming from the keeper's quarters.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Spirits of the Night
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS visits the home of the Scully family, who are so terrified they are ready to pack up and move.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Alcatraz
programme.desc: For the 100thepisode of Ghost Hunters, the team is allowed private access to Alcatraz Island, a dream come true for paranormal teams.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Lemp Mansion
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the TAPS team is invited to Lemp Mansion in St. Louis, Missouri. There have been tragic deaths at this mansion with the patriarch and three of his children taking their own lives.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: America's First Zoo
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to the oldest zoo in the country, The Philadelphia Zoo, which boastsa reported Native American burial ground that lies beneath the grounds.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Essex County Penitentiary
programme.desc: The TAPS team is joined by Destination Truthhost Josh Gates as the team returns to Essex County, New Jersey to investigate a notorious penitentiary with a horrifying past.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

channel.desc: A team of real-life Ghost Hunters investigate paranormal encounters & try to help people confront whatever these possible supernatural phenomena could be.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: A-Body in the Graveyard
programme.desc: Rarely seen among Mopar muscle the Chrysler A-Bodies have some die-hard fans!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Trey-Magnifique
programme.desc: The 1971 Road Runner 440-6BBL 4-speed is in assembly and ready for its drivetrain!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: 3 Amigos 2 Road Runners 1 Sunroof
programme.desc: Three pilots pals want three custom built Mopars–but they want them all done at the same time!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: The Ice-Trey 200
programme.desc: To celebrate the 200th episode of Graveyard Carz Mark and the Ghoulz visit a private automotive museum!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Phoenix Rising
programme.desc: Graveyard Carz was born of struggle challenge and the dream of resurrecting an impossible car–the legendary Phantom 'Cuda!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: The Road Running Home
programme.desc: Good news from Mark's daughter Allyssa! She's pregnant with her fourth child and this time Mark will have a grandson! Unfortunately Mark needs to find a replacement to help with his pet project "The Autopsy Report".

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Flight of the Super Bee
programme.desc: Mark and the Ghouls race to finish a one owner 1970 Super Bee that belongs to a decorated retired Marine. But as Mark and Justin forge ahead on this one owner car a SNAFU on Will's side of the shop may cause a total mission failure.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Another Dreamz Machine
programme.desc: Mark and Justin begin assembly on the ultra rare 1971 Mr. Norm's Dodge Demon. Then the team shifts gears to focus on a Graveyard Dreamz 1969 Charger tribute car that's made to order.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Jonesing for a Road Runner
programme.desc: When high profile local car dealer Don Jones Jr. wants to bring back the car of his youth where does he go? Anywhere he wants! But when your high school dream car is a 1969 Road Runner your dream shop is Graveyard Carz.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Memento Mori
programme.desc: Graveyard Carz has restored its fair share of 1971 'Cudas so what makes this 1971 Hemi Shaker 'Cuda so different? Don't worry we won't ruin the surprise. This is the first time in Graveyard Carz broadcasts that the car will be revealed backwards!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Orange You Glad It's K2?
programme.desc: The Ghouls team up and knuckle down to power through an epic SEMA build! A tribute to a 1970 Dodge T/A Challenger in a color that Will has never painted: Go Mango! AKA Vitamin C for all the Plymouth fans.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: The 'Cuda has a Challenger
programme.desc: After years of lockdown the Ghoulz are back at SEMA! But first they need to finish the tribute 1970 Dodge T/A Challenger. This gorgeous custom build is outfitted in the Graveyard's inimitable OEM style.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Is That a Freckle?
programme.desc: Fresh from the flight and still exhausted from the SEMA show in Las Vegas Mark and the Ghoulz get back to the grind. Will eagerly prepares to paint his very first 1970 AAR 'Cuda.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: The Thunder from Down Under
programme.desc: When the local junkyard closes its doors Mark and Dougie have to rescue an old friend from the earliest days of Graveyard Carz. But their journey appears to be cursed by a sudden increase in thunder and lightning.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: This is a Crack Up!
programme.desc: The team takes on the biggest engine challenge of their lives! A numbers matching 383 for a 1971 'Cuda that has multiple massive freeze cracks in the block. Mark puts a local shop to the test as they attempt to save an engine.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: A Reynolds 'Cuda Reunion
programme.desc: When Tony D'Agostino makes another trip to the west coast Mark Worman takes the opportunity to revisit the Brothers Car Collection in Salem Oregon to do a deep dive on a 1971 Hemi 'Cuda that shares history with the Sandwich Man himself.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Motor has a need for speed! On this channel, we celebrate everything that moves fast and has power. From classic cars to renovating old planes. We will show you how it is done.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Royal Court Theatre - Bacup
programme.desc: The world famous ghost hunting team return for a new series and start in a small theatre with a big problem…ghosts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all but forgotten piece of British history.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drakelow Tunnels
programme.desc: p 8: Drakelow Tunnels - Kidderminster: With over 4 miles of haunted tunnels the team have one night to investigate this labyrinth of horror.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The National Emergency Services Gallery
programme.desc: A terrifying place full of history and paranormal activity. The team are tested as the try to find the spirits that refuse to leave this famous location.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Galleries of Justice
programme.desc: The legendary ghost hunters continue in Nottingham and a place where people could be jailed, sentenced and executed without even leaving the building.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 1
programme.desc: The first of a two-part investigation with celebrity guests, world famous band ‘Bullet for My Valentine’.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 of this spin-chilling episode. Nursing their wounds from the last episode the team and their celebrity guests ‘Bullet For My Valentine’ carry on.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Saltmarshe Hall Part 1
programme.desc: Saltmarshe Hall is a mysterious, haunted house of complete contrasts. Beneath the property lies a network of corridors and cellar rooms and the abandoned North Wing has sat empty for over 70 years,

programme.title: Most Haunted: Saltmarshe Hall Part 2
programme.desc: Saltmarshe Hall is a mysterious, haunted house of complete contrasts. Beneath the property lies a network of corridors and cellar rooms and the abandoned North Wing has sat empty for over 70 years,

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ye Olde Kings Head
programme.desc: The Great British pub may be on the decline but in some paranormal activity seems to be on the rise and the Ye Olde Kings Head is one of the most haunted.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Tivoli Venue
programme.desc: A well-known venue for accomplished as well as up and coming bands The Tivoli Venue boasts many a ghost. In this episode one of the team gets a warning from the other side that reduces them to tears and something seems to be stalking the team.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tatton Hall
programme.desc: Something about Tatton Old Hall keeps bringing the Most Haunted team back. Something happens that stops two of the team entering, a poltergeist causes confusion and the team get a clear voice from beyond the veil.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1 of this terrifying place concentrates above ground. The team are alarmed at the results from a new piece of equipment and Yvette meets her match.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The Most Haunted team explore the underground of Fort Paull. With its foundations and footprint dating back 100’s of years the team are faced with some terrifying ordeals.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annison Funeral Parlour
programme.desc: Coffins, murder and a malevolent spirit plague the team as they investigate this one-time funeral home. With one member isolated alone another in a coffin the team catch a poltergeist in action

channel.desc: Pluto TV goes beyond the normal range of human experience in a 24/7 channel dedicated to all things Paranormal.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.sub-title: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rusty Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Crime Don't Pay
programme.desc: Today the crew is hunting for Holly, a car thief. She's one of Tim's bonds and the entire Dog crew knows that means trouble - or at least a long and difficult chase.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Twisted Love
programme.desc: Dog is tracking down Cecilia, who's wanted for car theft, but she's nowhere to be found. Her girlfriend and co-signer has gone missing too. Just when the trail goes cold, a friend leads the team to the cosigner's empty apartment.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado and they face a special challenge - getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Luv Still
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.

channel.desc: Go on the prowl with real-life bounty hunter Duane "Dog" Chapman, his wife Beth, and their family as they chase down fugitives in the Hawaiian islands. The hunt is on, and Dog always gets his man on this exclusive 24/7 channel.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

channel.desc: Duck Dynasty has its very own 24/7 channel! Expect plenty of outlandish behaviour, feuds, comedy & of course…ducks, all in this rags-to-riches reality series.

programme.title: Backroad Bounty: Kids And Counter Birds
programme.desc: Bam Bam and Marty come across one of the biggest hunts in their careers – a warehouse full of bounty.

programme.title: Backroad Bounty: Bountiful Bests
programme.desc: Marty and Bam Bam visit a quintessential farm that is over 100 years old and is packed with inherited antiques.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Weather or Not
programme.desc: Peter battles the elements to build a retirement home for childhood sweethearts, while Bryan Jr. constructs an entryway for his own sweetheart - wife Tabby.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Hometown Hero
programme.desc: Beat creates a cozy cabin in Germany, while Peter and Sr. win a Guinness World Record with their jaw-dropping one-of-a-kind log car, and Joel takes on a difficult build made even tougher with a rookie slinging logs.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Heaven’s Gate
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. feels the heat to recreate the cozy log home a British Columbia couple lost to a fire. Meanwhile, Peter hopes for a ticket to heaven by building a covered entrway for the local church.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Under the Gun
programme.desc: While Beat constructs a luxury fishing lodge in northern British Columbia, Bryan Jr. is covered into giving the local gun shop a much-needed facelift.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Cowboy Confidential
programme.desc: Beat and Andre are lassoed into building an elaborate carved archway for the Williams Lake Stampede. Meanwhile, Joel wrangles a rookie crew to construct a vacation home in the wilds of Wisconsin.

programme.title: Timber Kings: History Lessen
programme.desc: Bryan Sr. and Joel brave the British Columbia backwoods to save a historic game warden's cabin, while Beat cooks up an outdoor log kitchen for his lakeside cottage.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Where There’s Smoke
programme.desc: The heat is on Bryan Jr. to build a deluxe, log smoker for the family fishing resort. Meanwhile, Beat constructs the ultimate summer home in Ontario's lush countryside.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Froylan Job
programme.desc: A hoarder with a secret tries to pull a fast one on Matt and Froy, and Sonia takes sides in a dramatic lover's quarrel. Froy finally gets a shot at recovering the Lamborghini, but will his ingenious plan come crashing down around him?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: First, a mischievous magician gets Ronnie and Carlos to stick together when they interrupt his show to grab his car. Next, Froy and Ronnie have to put their hands on a seriously stupid sugar daddy and the recently upgraded debtor's chest.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Now Serving Mrs. Pizarro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy discuss what they will do with their severance pay once the company is sold, but have to put the discussion on hold while they repo a hovercraft golf cart from a snooty golfer.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: A professional stunt driver slips through Froy and Sonia's grasp, sending them on a violent high-speed chase. Matt offends a pretty RO who seeks womanly revenge, and Froy and Carlos go undercover at a lowrider show.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one-hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team is scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after everyday repos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hidden Cars and Higher Powers
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy get some help from a friendly gardener that leads them to discover a car hidden in the backyard. Next, Matt and Froy go on another repo to repossess from a preacher that believes it would be blasphemy to repo his car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Raising the Roof
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy deal with an unbalanced debtor who threatens to take down the entire company, while Matt and Ronnie take on children's book vendors who are up to no good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Deep Dish Disaster
programme.desc: Lou plans an elaborate sting operation to infiltrate a cult, but everything goes awry when the new guys aren't prepared and Matt is left picking up the pieces.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Froy's Bait and Lou's Cake
programme.desc: Lou and Matt inadvertently become pawns in an elaborate and misguided lesson perpetrated by a cheating husband upon his mistress. Then, Matt and Lou attempt to take a vehicle away from a debtor who is so drunk he doesn't remember agreeing

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Showdown
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for a typical vehicle repossession.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride, Matt and Lyndah attempt to repo..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Viva Las Vegas!
programme.desc: An Elvis impersonator gets Matt and Ronnie all shook up, and a ventriloquist's dummy has a nasty attitude that gets on Sonia's bad side. When Froy goes missing, Lou has to pick up the slack in a repo that goes terribly wrong.

channel.desc: From keeping law and order in Alaska to travelling some of the deadliest routes in the world, follow some extraordinary people as they take on the toughest jobs in the world, so you don’t have to. Pluto TV Tough Jobs - home of the extreme workday!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicia’s text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy About You
programme.desc: Mali is five years younger than his girlfriend Zay and they are total opposites. He still wants to party, and she is ready to settle down.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In and Out
programme.desc: Willard says he’s getting tired of this roller coaster ride of a relationship with Cynthia and he’s had just about as much as he can take with her lies and deception.

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Young Love
programme.desc: Anissa and Ma’lik have been together for 9 years and they have endured a lot of heartache due to Ma’lik’s cheating and dishonesty. Ma’lik says he’s not the same man he used to be and he’s trying to keep his family together..

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesn’t get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Nana Bread
programme.desc: Markia says Herb's overactive sex drive is ruining their relationship because he wants it daily. When Herb doesn't get his way, he throws major tantrums. Can Herb learn to take breathers or has this 11 year relationship taking its toll?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sona’s life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drank Sinatra
programme.desc: Kayla's excessive drinking along with the cheating is a deal breaker from Bryan. Bryan can no longer tolerate Kayla's alcohol-fueled tantrums. She says he is controlling and doesn't put her and her child first. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Age Ain't Nothin but a Number
programme.sub-title: Age Ain't Nothin but a Number
programme.desc: Kelley feels Keionte's childish behavior has her considering burning their marriage license. He claims that once they married, Mommie Dearest was born and no longer wants to be her business partner! Can they figure it out before it's too late?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Ex
programme.desc: Andwela and Nicole came together after cheating on their spouses. Nicole feels like their marriage has been severely damaged due to his disloyalty and him trash talking her to his ex. Can this couple figure it out?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Steven’s jealousy is leading Alqueisha “Quey” Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Takashia says Brendon doesn’t approve of her friends, doesn’t trust her and is controlling. Brendon says he can’t trust Takashia because she is a nonstop attention seeker and never passes up an opportunity to flirt with men.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Players Club
programme.desc: When this couple met on the internet, they instantly hit it off. Though, when Ray found out Raina was creating sexy videos for pay, he wasn’t so keen. He believes that she is meeting up with her followers and having relations for more money.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 1
programme.desc: Jacoby Garrett is fighting to save his marriage of 15 years. Meanwhile his wife, Kim Garrett has her belongings packed and is waiting on the moving truck.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 2
programme.desc: Jacoby says his wife has stolen money to feed her gambling addiction. Kim says that his mother is a huge thorn in her side. In 15 years, Kim says she is still scratching her head as to why Jacoby’s mother bad mouths her to everyone.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.sub-title: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.title: Divorce Court: House Car
programme.desc: Latoya Ward and Davarius Greaves are back for round two! Latoya wants Davarius to become a stay at home dad because he can’t keep a job. Davarius says Latoya sabotages any work he can get and goes out of her way to create hostile environments.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tardy for the Party
programme.desc: Dashia says William is a cheater and spends most of his money on alcohol instead of paying the bills. William says Dashia is sneaky, belittles him, has trust issues and allows her family to interfere in their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

channel.desc: Divorced! Wronged! Hunted! On Judge Nosey, find the most intense real-life courtroom drama on TV with the likes of Divorce Court and Eye for An Eye, all here 24/7.

programme.desc: Nick and Suzanne go head to head in the kitchen when Nick says cooking is \\"easy\\" and Suzanne challenges him to a family cooking competition.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Regift Episode
