programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Last Word
programme.desc: Sabrina gets entangled in a situation that could have serious consequences for her. (S4, ep21)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Make Him Great
programme.desc: Danni attempts to get answers from Logan regarding his suspicious behaviour. (S4, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: A Brick Wall
programme.desc: Danni finds herself in a compromising predicament and receives unsolicited help from El Fuego. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Still Water Runs Deep
programme.desc: Andi finds herself in the middle of a tragedy that involves Zac and Fatima. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Pleasantries
programme.desc: Preston gives Karen pause when he shows up at her salon with a friend. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Night Game
programme.desc: Karen attempts to stop Andi from falling back into her old ways when it comes to relationships. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Life, Soul, And Heart
programme.desc: Zac may find himself in serious problems as a mysterious woman appears and Karen confesses a huge secret. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Hard To Get
programme.desc: Andi comes to the realization that the gifts from Gary might not be worth the stipulations that they come with. (S4, ep6)

channel.desc: Kick back and enjoy the best of Black Hollywood through all your favorite urban series! Featuring reality shows and box office hit dramas, this channel is guaranteed to have everything you’ve been waiting for in one place.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Night Terrors
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hell's Gate
programme.desc: Ever since Wes and his family moved into their new home in York, PA they've been struggling with a dark force that's made everyday a living hell. Wes feels his mental and physical health is in jeopardy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lost Souls
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/medium Michelle Belanger investigate a Pennsylvania home; where a mother named Kathy and her son Michael have both felt the presence of a young boy and hear voices calling, "Mom?" but no one is there.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire
programme.desc: PRS investigates a case involving single mom, Dawn, and her 5-year-old daughter, both of whom are tormented by the appearance of a hag they call "lady vampire."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.sub-title: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: If I Should Die...
programme.desc: Proven paranormal investigator Ken Arrington leads a new class of characters as they try to help a family cope with what appears to be a demonic spirit in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Southern Discomfort At Sweetwater Mansion
programme.desc: PRS heads to the Deep South to investigate a haunted Antebellum Mansion in disrepair. The caretaker and volunteers at the property have many a tale to tell of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Ladder
programme.desc: A large family in Shrewsbury, MA, has been living with a spirit for the last 40 years. To most of the siblings, the entity is menacing and evil, but Sandy seems to have a different connection.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem
programme.desc: A young woman named Kristy has been haunted in her own bedroom since she can remember. Now it's up to Ryan and the crew to help Kristy before she's overwhelmed by the entity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Sex Dungeon
programme.desc: Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and Chad Calek join PRS for this unusual case of a sprawling mansion on Greyhaven Island near Detroit. Ken, the owner, hears voices and banging and it has him feeling both watched and cursed; a prisoner in his own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes
programme.desc: PRS travels to rural Pennsylvania to investigate a haunting that began after a new couple moved into an old family farm.?Over the next three days, hidden tragedies are uncovered and latent psychic abilities are revealed.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

channel.desc: Watch as Ryan and his team investigate disturbances and try to work out what these alleged paranormal phenomena really could be!

programme.title: Most Haunted: Haden Hill House Part 1
programme.desc: An old house in England’s West Midlands gives the Most Haunted team a night they will never forget.

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Leopard Inn Pt 3
programme.desc: In the final part of their investigation into the abandoned old hotel above the Leopard Inn, Yvette and her team are tested again to their very limits.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large country house. Without exception every member of the team experience something unexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all but forgotten piece of British history.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Royal Court Theatre - Bacup
programme.desc: The world famous ghost hunting team return for a new series and start in a small theatre with a big problem…ghosts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and her team take on their biggest challenge yet in a prison where many have lost their lives and some seem to have remained.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Armely Mills Cottage
programme.desc: The cottage on the site of Armley Mills is said to be full of paranormal activity so Karl decides to enter, alone and witnesses something that is eager to grab his attention.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Black Country Living Museum
programme.desc: The team have a whole village to investigate with results that amazed the all. With a playful spirit communicating through the Ouija board and the EVP machine at the same time the team seem to have their first two-way conversation with the dead.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Abbey House Museum
programme.desc: Yvette introduces a brand new Most Haunted team member, Watson, a bulldog. This location starts to give up its mysteries as soon as the team arrive and they have go film differently to accommodate a particularly aggressive poltergeist.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Fleece Inn
programme.desc: This old pup in the heart of West Yorkshire is said to be one of the Most Haunted places in England.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Karl in the main prison block, Stuart checks out the isolation unit, with dramatic results.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: York Castle Museum
programme.desc: The history of York Castle Museum is almost endless as are the paranormal stories attached to it. Karl enters the street and cells with dramatic effect.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Borwick Hall P2
programme.desc: Our investigation into Borwick Hall continues as Stuart investigates the middle floors.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Doncaster Air Museum Pt2
programme.desc: The main hanger of Doncaster Air Museum is a vast building and houses flying aircraft of every kind. Stuart ventures alone and soon realises something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Middleton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette and her team are called to a grade II listed building that spans over 900 years in an attempt to uncover the mysterious paranormal activity that is said to occur there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Beaumanor Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures, alone, to the upper floors of this large mansion and id stalked by something that wants to be heard.

channel.desc: Join Yvette Fielding and the team investigate paranormal happenings at some of the world's most haunted locations, all on their very own 24/7 Most Haunted channel!

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: With Love, The Claus
programme.desc: At Christmastime, Jonathan and Mark try to get a divorced couple to work together for their son's sake. Meanwhile, the holiday may be in jeopardy when a department store Santa is arrested.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Mother's Love
programme.desc: Four brothers go on the run to escape a court order that would split them up.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Country Doctor
programme.desc: A country doctor refuses to slow down and seems to be working himself to death.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Time in a Bottle
programme.desc: A district attorney clashes with a lawyer who agrees to defend a friend charged with stealing.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Back to Oakland
programme.desc: Mark returns to Oakland to become a police officer again, and is reunited with his old partner. However, he discovers his old beat has become a storm of racial hatred.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: We Have Forever - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: We Have Forever - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Correspondent
programme.desc: A war correspondent finds himself imprisoned and facing execution. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Mark show him what's he's missed during his life by putting work ahead of family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Aloha
programme.desc: A Hawaiian singer learns to overcome self-pity after being disabled in a truck accident.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1
programme.sub-title: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a teenage cancer patient named Lee who wants to save the dolphins.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 2
programme.desc: Lee's cancer is now in remission. She gets back to work on her save-the-dolphins campaign.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Heaven Nose, Mister Smith
programme.desc: Jonathan must stop an angel who's back on Earth with the intention of breaking up his son's marriage.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: A chauvinistic coach doesn't want a female wide receiver on his junior-high football team.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Whose Trash Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Mark's friend is running for public office, and he's a very honest man. But things get out of hand when an opponent tries to win by going after his son.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Hello and Farewell - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan helps Commander Michaels to deal with flashbacks of Vietnam; he also tries to convince her to go to therapy. Mark deals with his fear of flying.

channel.desc: Binge watch Highway To Heaven, the classic 80s fantasy drama, starring Michael Landon, an angel sent back to Earth to help people in need, right here on it’s very own channel!

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: The family are making arrangements to leave Leopard's Den, all except Du Plessis who is steadfastly refusing to accept that he has lost his home. He won't use his share of the money from the sale of the land to buy somewhere else.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: The family have been squatting at Leopard's Den as they prepare to make their last stand to prevent the bulldozers from destroying their home. Du Plessis and Fatani bring elephants and a giraffe to dissuade the construction crew from moving in.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: After the devastating loss of Leopard's Den, the family are split across continents. Caroline, Liv and a heavily pregnant Alice are in the UK, while Danny and Du Plessis have remained in South Africa.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny returns to South Africa with Caroline, Liv and Charlotte. They are all excited to be back and are looking forward to seeing their new home, Clearwater Farm.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Danny has been preparing his pitch for an Endangered Species Project. JLW, a pharmaceutical company, are looking to fund an environmental project and the family hope that this grant money will enable them to buy Leopard's Den and Mara.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Ed release two cheetah brothers together, a symbol of their new partnership, but not all of the family are happy about this new start. Caroline is still furious at what she sees as Danny's betrayal of Du Plessis.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: The family are still estranged following Caroline's decision to move back to the decrepit Clearwater house with Du Plessis. Rosie is determined to reunite everyone, and plans a civilised dinner as a step towards reconciliation.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis is determined to prove his friend's innocence by any means he can. Du Plessis' first attempt backfires disastrously when he harangues a police officer and ends up in a cell next to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: With Danny away, and Du Plessis undertaking an ignominious stretch of community service, Ed is left in charge of running the Endangered Species Project.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Danny and Ed are anxiously preparing for a review with JLW, the pharmaceutical company that fund their Endangered Species Project. They are desperate for it to go smoothly, and as a result are driving the rest of the family mad.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Following the loss of their funding, the family are in dire financial straits. Danny and Ed attempt to get an extension on their mortgage but are refused. Fiona spurs Ed on, telling him that the man she used to know would have a plan for survival.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Strange things are happening at Leopard's Den. The family awake to find frogs everywhere, seemingly having rained down overnight; the giraffe refuses to budge from the front gate and the cheetah is off its food.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Scabby Monkey
programme.desc: Contending with overweight cats and their over protective owners was not what Danny Trevanion had in mind when he became a vet. So when a scruffy, barely alive African monkey arrives at his practise Danny is fascinated by the challenge.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: Danny is having second thoughts about the wisdom of uprooting his new family and ploughing all their money into a business venture that they know next to nothing about.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Work To Do
programme.desc: A successful giraffe capture means everyone is in high spirits, until the arrival of Evan and Olivia's real father, Simon, throws the family into turmoil.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Meerly Evan
programme.desc: Evan lets the mischievous meerkats loose in Rosie's room to cause havoc. Rosie is devastated when they destroy an irreplaceable photograph of her mother and rages at Evan. She decides once and for all to go back to Bristol.

channel.desc: Wild at Heart, the feel good British family drama series, which sees Bristol Vet (Stephen Tompkinson) and his family emigrating to start a game park in South Africa. Watch it now 24/7!

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: After School Special
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes when a beloved teacher is poisoned in her classroom. As doctors fight to save Barbara Lewis’ life, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team delve into her personal affairs.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Tighten the Screws
programme.desc: When young Iraq War veteran Curtis Ashley ends up dead, Lt. Joe Kenda has to solve the slaying of a seemingly innocent victim using his keen awareness of the criminal mind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Run for your Life
programme.desc: A slain body of a marathon runner is found just hours before a big race. With the help of a trusted K-9 officer, Kenda sets off to find the killer himself before he strikes again.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bring My Baby Home
programme.desc: A four-week-old girl is kidnapped, leaving her mother in anguish and police scrambling to find her. Joe Kenda and Robert Sapp fear she’s been sold on the black market… or worse.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood Sisters
programme.desc: The bullet-ridden bodies of two sisters are found in a suburban house that’s littered with mysterious clues. Joe Kenda learns that the two unassuming young mothers shared an explosive secret.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Time Bomb
programme.desc: In 1978, Lt. Joe Kenda is new to the CSPD, and gets more than he bargains for when a local bank is the target of a massive explosion.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: When police find 24-year-old Patrick Ray with a gunshot to the temple, the scene has all the telltale signs of suicide. But Lt. Joe Kenda's instinct says otherwise.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Settle the Score
programme.desc: When Johnny Crawford is killed in his easy chair, police are perplexed to learn he may have been shot over a musical instrument. It soon becomes clear the young man wasn’t killed for his own sins.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Metal on Metal
programme.desc: A athlete is gunned down just weeks before starting college, leaving family heartbroken and detectives stumped. The man seems an unlikely target, until Lt. Joe Kenda pries into his personal life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Tighten the Screws
programme.desc: When young Iraq War veteran Curtis Ashley ends up dead, Lt. Joe Kenda has to solve the slaying of a seemingly innocent victim using his keen awareness of the criminal mind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Outlaw
programme.desc: When a gunfight erupts at a local biker bar and claims the lives of two men, Lt. Joe Kenda must delve deep into the world of an infamous biker gang.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My Tortured Soul
programme.desc: A woman’s lifeless body is dumped on a lonely mountain pass. Leads are scarce, until a seemingly unrelated murder brings Kenda within arm’s reach of her killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Married To The Job
programme.desc: Sgt. Joe Kenda and his officers are facing off against a barricaded gunman when he gets an emergency call from his wife.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Dead Man Walking
programme.desc: George Ferribee, a loving son led astray by addiction, is found executed. When Lt. Joe Kenda learns the victim had recently been kidnapped, he assumes the crimes are related.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: End of Days
programme.desc: The discovery of a family home littered with corpses tasks Kenda with unspooling the paranoid obsessions of a diseased mind, and forces him to confront his greatest fear.

channel.desc: Joe Kenda has solved 387 homicide investigations, with a 92% solve rate. Each episode of Homicide Hunter uses Kenda’s first person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stores of his most disturbing and challenging murder cases.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Scrawny & Lola
programme.desc: Scrawny, one of nine Yorkies, is Allen’s favorite, but attacks anyone that comes near. Lola, a Dalmatian, barks at everything. Find out how Cesar reestablishes control in both homes.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Tori, Cassie & Skyler, and Tallulah, Bella, Boris, & Groucho, and Howie
programme.sub-title: Tori, Cassie & Skyler, and Tallulah, Bella, Boris, & Groucho, and Howie
programme.desc: An adopted miniature schnauzer compulsively spins in circles, four French bulldogs revolt against their owner, and an abused lab/chow/shepherd mix needs help accepting love.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Hank & Paris
programme.desc: Marsha Alexander’s rescued Mastiff has ruined the furniture and intimidates anyone walking by his gate. Paris, a long hair Chihuahua, looks fashionable, but barks and snaps at strangers.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Major Jones, Josie, and Scrappy
programme.desc: Catchup with the hurricane Katrina rescue dogs. Is a reunion with their owners in store for any of them? A German Shephard learns to walk on a leash. A lab won’t walk on hardwood floors.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Luna and K9 Sniffers
programme.desc: A lab mix, has an extreme fear of dog parks, walks and noises at home. Meet a pack of dogs that spends its days keeping the port of Miami free of drugs, and explosives.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bubba & Garrett
programme.desc: Heidi Wasserman inherited Bubba, a spoiled Maltese that demands to be taken everywhere and nips at anyone who tries to leave. Garrett, a German Shepherd, chases his tail, obsessively.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Hudson & Orchid, and LA Animal Control
programme.sub-title: Hudson & Orchid, and LA Animal Control
programme.desc: Two Great Danes battle for control. Cesar helps the city of Los Angeles' Animal Control department with its aggressive new pet ownership program by riding along with one of its officers.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Stanley, Shoven and Leo
programme.desc: Stanley, a surly Chihuahua mix, has a problem with attacking joggers. Two Pomeranians are known for their shrill barks. Shelter rescue Leo, performs a tight rope act when hearing a cough.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Beagle Mania, Rescue Me… Rescue You
programme.sub-title: Beagle Mania, Rescue Me… Rescue You
programme.desc: At six years old, beagle Gizmo has become very aggressive. Jennifer Lee Pryor runs Pryor’s Planet, a rescue organization to honor her late husband, comedian Richard Pryor.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Charlotte, Elvis and Jack
programme.desc: Actress Eileen Davidson's Wheaten terrier puppy Charlotte, plays too rough with her son. Two other dogs react to household triggers, the garbage disposal and shiny floors.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bebe and Lola
programme.desc: English bulldog Bebe has turned against her pack mate, as well as the household furnishings. Comedian Howie Mandel and his wife, Terry, have their hands full with 2 year old Chihuahua Lola.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Diego and Berkeley
programme.desc: An Argentinean hunting dog develops aggression towards other dogs. A rescued 2-year old terrier/corgi mix has a fear of traveling, specifically, the zippers of his doggie carrier.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Amber, Snoopy, & Schroeder
programme.desc: A couple who can’t seem to control their high-strung Golden Retriever mix; Snoopy, a belligerent Bearded Collie; and Schroeder, an adopted a Lhasa Apso/Cavalier King Charles Spaniel mix with a bad case of separation anxiety.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: India, Jagger, and Axl
programme.desc: A Manchester Terrier attacks family members, bikes, skateboards, and visiting guests. Jagger needs to learn how to take a walk without wreaking havoc. Cesar tries to rehabilitate an ocean-phobic dog.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Ellie & J.J. and Oscar
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, star of Expedition Wild, and wife, actress Missi Pyle, seek help with their dog’s aggression toward other dogs. A rescued stray needs help conquering his fear of children.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: The Dark Side of Chipper
programme.desc: Chipper, a 2-month old Ridgeback/Boxer mix has become progressively more aggressive and has attacked 5 dogs. Two Whippets, Rudy and Monte, are causing issues at their owner’s place of business.

channel.desc: Cesar Millan is one of the most renowned and sought-after experts working in the field of dog training. This is not just a series about dog training, it’s people training for dogs. Each episode tackles real-life problems faced by dog owners everywhere.

programme.title: Baywatch: Nightmare Bay, Part 1
programme.desc: Mitch rescues an underwater photographer that appears to have been attacked by a Sea Creature in an underwater cave, resulting in a media frenzy. Shauni rescues a young girl in the ocean then has to rescue her family from drowning.

programme.title: Baywatch: Nightmare Bay, Part 2
programme.desc: When a fishing trawler mysteriously sinks, the “Creature in the Bay” is thought responsible! Mitch, Devon and Captain Thorpe set out to prove there is more than meets the eye behind this Creature's mysterious attacks.

programme.title: Baywatch: The One Who Got Away
programme.desc: After Baywatch lifeguard Megan is attacked on the beach, she struggles to regain her confidence – unaware that her attacker, a fisherman, views her as the "One That Got Away." Meanwhile, Shauni suffers from lifeguard burnout.

programme.title: Baywatch: Money, Honey
programme.desc: After Mitch makes a heroic ocean rescue while working at her private beach party, a Hollywood producer offers Mitch the starring role in a movie. Meanwhile, Harvey and Shauni hold a wild bikini contest to raise money for an aquatic rescue group.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Fabulous Buchannon Boys
programme.desc: Mitch receives an unexpected visit from his free-spirited brother, whose troubled son entices Hobie to surf the pylons of a treacherous condemned pier. Meanwhile, a local vendor nearly causes a riot when his bikinis disintegrate in the water.

programme.title: Baywatch: Point of Attack
programme.desc: After helping break up a gang fight on the beach, Eddie gets the idea of having some gang members join the lifeguard W.A.T.E.R. program designed to help troubled youths.

programme.title: Baywatch: Sandcastles
programme.desc: Baywatch lifeguards gain insight into the plight of the homeless when Hobie befriends a girl who's living on the streets. Eddie is attacked by a former mental patient known as “Hector the Collector.”

programme.title: Baywatch: Thin or Die
programme.desc: Eddie goes on a blind date with Nicole, who turns out to be morbidly overweight, which leads to complications and an unlikely friendship. But Nicole's diet pills prove life threatening... Meanwhile, Mitch’s life is comically disrupted by a stray dog.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Trophy, Part 1
programme.desc: Eddie is arrested for statutory rape after a teenage girl lies about seducing him in his tower. Meanwhile, Eric Turner, bitter about the paralyzing accident he suffered as a lifeguard, returns to Baywatch to reconcile his relationship with Megan.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Trophy, Part 2
programme.desc: Eddie is suspended from Baywatch over the statutory rape charge. He feels abandoned when no one believes his innocence pleas. Meanwhile, the reckless, paraplegic Turner, wanting to win Megan back, tries to impress her by hang-gliding off a cliff.

programme.title: Baywatch: If Looks Could Kill
programme.desc: Mitch falls for the beautiful woman he saved from drowning after she drove her car off a cliff, unaware that she's a cold-blooded murderer and con artist who was attempting to dispose of the murder victim of her latest scam when Mitch rescued her.

programme.title: Baywatch: Reunion
programme.desc: Mitch and his ex-wife Gayle reconnect at their twenty-year high school reunion with unforeseen results. Eddie discovers an abandoned baby under his tower with a note imploring him to take care of it for 24 hours.

programme.title: Baywatch: War of Nerves
programme.desc: Drug lord Mason Sato is released from prison and determined to seek revenge Mitch Buchannon, who helped send him away. When Sato kidnaps Hobie and Kaye, Mitch and Sato end up in a samurai-style fight to the death.

programme.title: Baywatch: Big Monday
programme.desc: Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch. Meanwhile, Kaye tries to persuade the parents of a deaf girl to send her to sign-language school.

programme.title: Baywatch: Sea of Flames
programme.desc: A drugged-out drifter torches Eddie's lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal, lab distributing a new drug. Mitch and Thorpe try to convince the city board to buy wave runners in order to optimize their ability to save lives.

programme.title: Baywatch: Now Sit Right Back and You'll Hear a Tale
programme.sub-title: Now Sit Right Back and You'll Hear a Tale
programme.desc: Eddie slips on sand and hits his head on the tower ramp. When he regains consciousness, Eddie finds himself on an island with Gilligan, Mary Ann and the rest of the castaways.

channel.desc: On a Los Angeles beach, a team of lifeguards led by Lieutenant Mitch Buchannon saves lives, deals with personal tragedies, fights crime, and participates in extraordinary adventures every day.

channel.desc: This cult anthology series presents stories that appear to defy logic, ghosts, the supernatural and the divine, and offers the viewer a chance to decide what is fact and what is fiction.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Headless Hat
programme.desc: While on holiday in France, there is a murder at the docks and Colonel March is asked by a friend of the French police to assist.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Bank Raid
programme.desc: Kidnappers abduct Peter's niece and hold her ransom for $50,000. To get her back safely, Dr. Brady is forced to steal the money from a bank vault.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Strange Partners
programme.desc: A wealthy man uses extortion and a trained attack dog to force Peter to kill his partner and make it look like a heart attack.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Odds Against Death
programme.desc: A gangster forces one of Peter's staff to developed a mathematical system to win at the roulette table.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Picnic With Death
programme.desc: Peter's existence as an invisible man becomes public knowledge, while Sally's friend needs help when her stepfather plots to kill her invalid mother.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Play to Kill
programme.desc: A celebrated actress runs down a hobo by accident and a witness blackmails her, threatening to expose her secret.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Rocket
programme.desc: A top-secret rocket is compromised when one of the scientists runs into gambling debts. Peter heads out on a desperate search for the missing rocket.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Point of Destruction
programme.desc: Four tragic air accidents seem to point to the failure of a fuel diffuser being tested, but Peter suspects sabotage is at play.

programme.title: The Immortal: Episode 6
programme.desc: A friend of Goodwin's is killed, leading Raphael to suspect demonic forces are behind a building.

programme.title: The Immortal: Episode 7
programme.desc: Sara discovers a TV production company is using its product to negatively influence viewers.

programme.title: The Immortal: Episode 8
programme.desc: Goodwin and Sara follow a shape-shifting demon which has a toxin.

programme.title: The Immortal: Episode 9
programme.desc: Raphael, Sara and Goodwin must stop a wedding before the bride falls prey to the cursed emerald in her ring.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: A lawyer who doesn't believe in ghosts is haunted after moving into a family mansion. Starring: Tim Daly, Tom Arnold, Zoe Saldana

programme.title: I Still See You
programme.desc: Bella Thorne stars in this enthralling and tense supernatural thriller. Ten years after an apocalyptic event left the world haunted by ghosts, Roni (Thorne: Midnight Sun) receives a threatening message from beyond the grave.

programme.title: An American Werewolf in Paris
programme.desc: An American man unwittingly gets involved with French werewolves who are able to transform at will.

programme.title: Terror
programme.desc: A witch too terrible for Hell to hold seeks bloody revenge down the centuries in Norman J. Warren's 1978 British slasher classic!

channel.desc: Horror fans rejoice, your channel is alive. It’s a never ending fright-fest on Pluto TV Horror. Don’t turn on the lights, don’t answer the door, and don’t change that channel.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Holiday
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Going Dutch
programme.desc: Margaret enters a contest and wins the grand prize: a cycling tour of Holland!

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Gary
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret thought they knew everything about their next door neighbours, until Joyce and Trevor introduce them to their grown son, Gary.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Trouble with Mummy
programme.desc: Bob is concerned when he hears that his mother's best friend Pearl has passed on.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Life Saver
programme.desc: Bob inadvertently saves the life of a suicidal man who then decides to become Bob's best friend.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Shopping
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret, concerned at the amount they are spending in take away food and expensive local food shops, decide on an expedition to the Super Save Shopatropolis in Croydon.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: New Lease on Life
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have near-death experience when Bob nearly crashes their car.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob Gets Wired
programme.desc: When Margaret forgets to pay for some sprinkles at the local cake shop, she is hauled in as a shoplifter.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Animal Behaviour
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret arrive home from another boring evening out with dreary friends, to find that their dogs behaviour has taken a turn for the worse?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Tale of Two Dentists
programme.desc: Bob's business is booming, and when Margaret chips a tooth Bob tells Margaret that he is unable to give her an appointment for sometime.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Discomfort of Strangers
programme.desc: Margaret fears that her relationship with Bob is getting stale after they have a petty argument.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Cuckoo in the Nest
programme.desc: When Bobs old friend Clive, (who is a real drunken slob), is dumped by his wife, Bob lets him stay for a few days despite Margaret's objections?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Gone to Seed
programme.desc: Bob decides to donate his sperm to a local sperm bank.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Margaret Gets a Job
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have made the big move to Canada.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Jury Duty
programme.desc: Margaret gets called to Jury Duty but Bob has planned a holiday for them and begs her to get herself excused.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Wedding
programme.desc: Cookie and Melvin invite Bob and Margaret to the wedding of their goddaughter, Tiffany.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Age Before Beauty
programme.desc: Margaret gets a new hairstyle but Bob doesn't even notice.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: No Trouble
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Over-Exposed
programme.desc: Margaret accidentally picks up her neighbour's photos at the pharmacy.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A New Life
programme.desc: At a creepy chiropodist social night, Bob and Margaret encounter a couple who are rapturous about the new planned community where they now live.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Til Death Do Us
programme.desc: Bob gets conned into buying a cemetery plot for Margaret as a surprise 15th wedding anniversary gift.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Friends for Dinner
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have been invited to Neil and Moira's for dinner, or so they think.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Strangers in a Strange Land
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret are mortified to discover that while they have been cooped up at Cookie and Melvin's house in Mississauga Ontario, their dogs have been left unattended by Penny, Bob's unreliable receptionist.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Problems
programme.desc: At her clinic one-day, Margaret sees an old school chum, and invites her and her husband Matt to dinner.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Mummy's Boy
programme.desc: Bobs mother is coming all the way from England to visit him.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Book Club
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret join a book club in the hopes of expanding their tiny social horizon.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Fly on the Wall
programme.desc: Feeling belittled by his family, Bob jumps at the chance to be the subject of a fly on the wall documentary.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Neighbours
programme.desc: In this story of neighbourhood social angst, Bob is having a complex burglar alarm installed by Graham, a sad, lonely man whose confidence is lifted immeasurably by this rare sale to Bob.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Party Politics
programme.desc: Margaret runs into a distant friend who asks her to have an Ann Summers-type party in her home.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob's Burglary
programme.desc: While Bob and Margaret are sleeping, the local criminals, Beany and Boney clear their house - TV, video, microwave and electric toothbrush all go.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Driving Bob
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have put it off for too long. They need to get their Canadian drivers' licenses.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Dental Convention
programme.desc: The time for the annual dental convention has come. Bob is not keen on going when he sees that a colleague from his student days, Bernard Wiggins, a "loud mouthed big shot", is a featured speaker.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Animation, full of fun, weird, action-packed and classic cartoons that everyone can enjoy!
