programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Lucille & Kidd Cole
programme.desc: Lucille led a simple life until she was asked to work for music producer Kidd Cole. Companies were never paid and one day Kidd couldn't be found. Will she get the answers she needs?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tracie & Sammie
programme.desc: Tracie Thoms had a connection with a fan named 'Sammie' after hearing about the passing of Sammie's friend. Sammie suddenly disappeared and now Tracie is left wondering who Sammie really is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: John & Kelsey
programme.desc: John is ready to leave Detroit but one thing holds him back: Kelsey. The two have never spoken outside of online chats but John is sure she's the one. Can he include Kelsey in his plans?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Solana & Elijah
programme.desc: Solana is in a relationship with Danny but can't stop thinking about her online love Elijah. His photos were used in so many profiles that she has to know is this the real Elijah?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miranda & Cameryn
programme.desc: After years of online chats Miranda discovered that Cameryn was not the man he claimed to be. She confronted him only to be given another suspicious profile. Is he someone else entirely?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jeff & Megan
programme.desc: After a string of bad luck with women, Jeff believes he has finally found his dream girl Megan. However, Megan is starting to sound off Catfish alarms.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Bianca & Brogan
programme.desc: When Brogan disappears from the Internet, then returns online after a year without question, Bianca wants to know what happened in the missing year.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miracle & Javonni
programme.desc: Smart, single mum Miracle fell for Javonni, a dreamy-eyed Instagrammer. With Max on hiatus, Nev teams up with TV personality Charlamagne to take Miracle on a hunt for the man of her dreams. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Courtney & Isaak
programme.desc: Courtney broke up with Isaak, who she met online. He's doing everything to get her back. Beauty queen Cassidy Wolf joins Nev to get Isaak to leave Courtney alone for good. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Harold & Armani
programme.desc: Harold found his match with a beautiful fellow jock named Armani. Although they live in the same area, they've never met. Nev is joined by Angel Haze to help Harold get his perfect girl. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Chloe meets \"Psycho Charlotte\" after a night out goes sour, and Holly's return is ruined when she's confronted with the true reason Kyle doesn't want to make their relationship official. (S10, ep7)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Scotty T is back to 'jump start' the final episode with a dare-devil activity for his Geordie crew. Meanwhile, tensions run high as Holly waits to hear Kyle's decision. Last in the series. (S10, ep8)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: The Geordies are back and buzzin' as big boss Anna sends them off to Greece! Holly and Kyle kick off, while Gaz and Charlotte find themselves in a very awkward situation. (S11, ep1)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Big boss Anna sends the guys to their new home in Crete. Chloe wants to know where she stands with Scott. Charlotte and Marnie have some explaining to do after their first night in Malia. (S11, ep2)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Gaz's pulling competition causes a bust up for Aaron and Scott. Charlotte tells Holly some home truths about Kyle while the toga party sees Chloe and Scott get closer than ever. (S11, ep3)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Chloe causes carnage at the boat party while Kyle comes to a big decision over Holly. Marnie sees Kyle at the club and the simmering tensions boil over and it all kicks off. (S11, ep4)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Gaz gives newly dumped Holly some tough love. Kyle enjoys his first lads' night until the girls turn up unannounced. Charlotte kicks off leaving the boys and girls torn apart. (S11, ep5)

channel.desc: Catch all of your favourite MTV reality shows together on one exclusive channel, MTV Pluto TV. Featuring Catfish, 16 & Pregnant, Teen Mom, Geordie Shore and more!

programme.title: World's Greatest: Water Adventures
programme.desc: We are captivated by oceans, rivers, and lakes - the power, the flow, the reflective stillness. And as we seek to get closer, we immerse ourselves in an expanding range of aquatic experiences.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the world’s most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Capital Cities
programme.desc: With visionaries, politicians, and activists, these metropolises are defined as the official seats of government. Dublin, Washington, and Taipei share broad avenues, museums, and monuments, but are as varied as the countries they represent.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Wetland Animals
programme.desc: Wetland Animals dives into the swamps, rivers, and flood plains of the Everglades, Botswana’s Okavango Delta, Kakadu National Park in Australia, and the Amazon to see deadly crocodiles, piranhas, hippopotamus, flamingo, manatee, and platypus.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Land Adventures
programme.desc: Most land adventures come with some risk - a chance to confront our deepest fears, resist the pull of the ordinary, and soar into the wild unknown.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Iconic Buildings
programme.desc: In construction, only a few buildings can be groundbreaking. Vastly different in shape, size, and function, these diverse buildings prove there is no recipe for greatness, just the fundamental ingredients of vision, bravery, and imagination.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanic Islands
programme.desc: They've been worshiped and feared over the millennia. But in the wake of drama and destruction, the elements give rise to cultures and nations so beautiful that we've come to know them as the world's greatest volcanic islands.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mega Cities
programme.desc: Mega Cities provide a bustling home to populations of over 10 million. Travel from the high-density living of Shanghai and Bangkok to the sprawling cities of Delhi and Mexico City, each the backdrop for dynamic cultures.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the world’s greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Arks
programme.desc: Cut off from continents, remote islands have become floating arks, attracting migrating species and forging new ones. Take a privileged glimpse into the secret lives of the rare and exotic species that inhabit these lost worlds.

channel.desc: The world is full of inspiring places. World’s Greatest goes on a breathtaking journey around the planet, revealing the best cities, natural wonders, animal encounters, journeys and adventures, monuments, and islands.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s New Best Friend/Freaky Tuesday
programme.desc: D.W. meets 13-year-old Hana, who is much older and totally cool! Is Hana D.W's new BFF? Then, Buster is convinced teachers have it easy. Can he put himself in Mr. Ratburn’s shoes to find out what it’s like to be a teacher?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Pet Business/D.W. The Copycat
programme.desc: How can Arthur prove to his parents that he's responsible enough to take care of his very own puppy? "Get a job," suggests D.W.!. Yet another personality change for D.W., who's decided that from now on, she'll be just like Arthur.

programme.title: Arthur: Rhyme For Your Life/For Whom The Bell Tolls
programme.sub-title: Rhyme For Your Life/For Whom The Bell Tolls
programme.desc: While struggling to write a poem for his mom, Binky falls asleep and gets trapped in Verseberg--where it's a crime not to rhyme! And D.W. has lost her voice! For Arthur it's a dream come true--until Mom asks Arthur to take care of D.W.

programme.title: Arthur: Desk Wars/Desperately Seeking Stanley
programme.desc: When Mr. Ratburn moves Brain and Arthur away from their usual desks, it sets off a chain reaction resulting in the most explosive desk war in third grade history! And, Arthur is 8-years old now—does he still need his teddy bear?

programme.title: Arthur: Sleep No More/Pet Peeved
programme.desc: Buster is convinced that Pizza Paula's all-you-can-eat contest is his destiny. But how can he possibly win such an important contest without any sleep? Binky volunteers to look after Francine's cat, Nemo, for the weekend.

programme.title: Arthur: Fernfern and the Secret of Moose Mountain/Thanks a Lot, Binky
programme.sub-title: Fernfern and the Secret of Moose Mountain/Thanks a Lot, Binky
programme.desc: Fern can't wait to climb Moose Mountain so that she can have adventures like Zutzut, the famous comic-book hero! Then, Binky decides to become "No More Mr. Nice Guy" after not getting thanked for saving Rattles from a dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Unravels/All the Rage
programme.desc: Grandma Thora teaches Arthur to knit and he's really into this new hobby. But…he's a kid! And a boy! Knitting is a grandma thing, right? And, Muffy wants to rock the fashion world, but creating a fad is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Arthur: The Making of Arthur/Dancing Fools
programme.desc: When Matt Damon puts out a call for homemade videos for his TV show, he sets off a frantic rush as Arthur and his gang film their lives. Mrs. Molina is a teaching a dance class for kids. Will Francine and George be the next Fred and Ginger?

programme.title: Arthur: The Good Sport/Crushed
programme.desc: When the Athlete of the Year Award doesn't go to Francine, she makes no effort to hide her hurt feelings from the recipient. Arthur can't believe his parents are hiring a babysitter--he's 8 years old, and babysitters are b-o-r-i-n-g!

programme.title: Arthur: Grandpa Dave's Memory Album/Buster's Carpool Catastrophe
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Dave's Memory Album/Buster's Carpool Catastrophe
programme.desc: Grandpa Dave is moving closer to the family, but something isn't quite right--he's forgetting all sorts of things. And Muffy, Arthur and Buster are carpooling to their cooking class. Can they stop fighting and have fun?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Rides The Bandwagon/Dad's Dessert Dilemma
programme.sub-title: Arthur Rides The Bandwagon/Dad's Dessert Dilemma
programme.desc: Woogles have their own names and personalities and they're so darned cute! And Arthur's gotta have one, especially now that everyone is collecting them. Arthur wouldn't mind if Dad's infamous dessert "experiments" remained a family secret.

programme.title: Arthur: Based on a True Story (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: There's a new kid in town: Ladonna Compson, the Louisiana native with the gift of gab. Ladonna charms Arthur and friends with her amazing "true" stories. But are her stories really fact…or fiction?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Time Trouble/Buster's Amish Mismatch
programme.desc: D.W. is tired of being bossed around all the time and demands to know why she couldn't have been born before Arthur! And during a trip to Amish country, Buster becomes enamored with the simple life and vows to forgo modern conveniences.

programme.title: Arthur: Lend Me Your Ear/The Butler Did It
programme.sub-title: Lend Me Your Ear/The Butler Did It
programme.desc: Arthur, Buster, and Brain are worried when Mr. Ratburn isn't acting like himself. He's always pleased to see them, so what’s made him change? When Mr. Crosswire gets a robot butler for Father's Day, Muffy fears Bailey may be replaced.

programme.title: D.W. and the Beastly Birthday
programme.desc: Time to put on your party hats and dancing shoes – D.W. is turning five! When her birthday doesn’t go as planned, D.W. runs away to the magical island of Ukubonga. This is one party you don’t want to miss!

programme.title: Arthur: All About D.W./Blockheads
programme.desc: When Emily gets the starring role in the preschool play, D.W. is beside herself with jealousy. She should be Little Red Riding Hood, not Tree #2! Then, D.W. and Emily are upset when they get stuck with the blocks at playtime.

programme.title: Arthur: I'm A Poet/The Scare-Your-Pants-Off Club
programme.desc: Challenged by Fern to enter a poetry contest, Arthur and his friends each write a poem to be judged by the famous poet Jack Prelutsky. Then, Arthur and his friends develop a consuming passion for the Scare-Your-Pants-Off books.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Family Vacation/Grandpa Dave's Old Country Farm
programme.sub-title: Arthur's Family Vacation/Grandpa Dave's Old Country Farm
programme.desc: What's got moldy bathrooms, lumpy beds and lots of rain? Arthur's family vacation. Then, Arthur and D.W. go to visit their grandfather, but the visit doesn't turn out as expected, because Grandpa Dave isn't your usual kind of grandfather.

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen Gets Her Goose Cooked/Best of The Nest
programme.sub-title: Sue Ellen Gets Her Goose Cooked/Best of The Nest
programme.desc: Sue Ellen is the champion of the popular Internet game, Virtualgoose.com, but she’s become obsessed! And now the gang has moved onto Best of the Nest. Will any of his friends be willing to forgo their computers for a real, live adventure?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., The Picky Eater/Buster And The Daredevils
programme.sub-title: D.W., The Picky Eater/Buster And The Daredevils
programme.desc: It's wrong to call D.W. a picky eater. The only things she won't eat are vegetables, fish, fruit, and meat. Then, Arthur and Buster meet two really cool kids and, naturally, are utterly dazzled. How far will Buster go to be cool?

programme.title: Arthur: The Squirrels/Fern and Persimmony Glitchet
programme.desc: After watching the classic horror movie, "The Squirrels," Arthur and his friends are scared to step out into the playground, and everywhere else! Fern's story about perfect Felicity Bonchance is thought perfectly boring by her friends.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Tooth/D.W. Gets Lost
programme.desc: It's bad enough to wear glasses all the time. But does Arthur have to be the last person in his class to lose his baby teeth? Then, if you think being lost in a humongous department store would scare a four-year-old, think again.

programme.title: Arthur: 1001 Dads/Prunella's Prediction
programme.desc: When Buster insists that he will miss the Father's Day picnic because he has other plans, Arthur is convinced that he's really sad and embarrassed about his parents’ divorce. And Prunella predicts a gift of flashpants, the hot new fashion.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Snow Mystery/Team Trouble
programme.desc: D.W. saves everything. But her most prized possession is a snowball from last winter. But now it’s disappeared! Then, Arthur, Francine, and Buster must do a report on ancient Rome--but can they work as a team to complete the assignment?

programme.title: Arthur: Fountain Abbey/Arthur Calls It
programme.desc: Muffy's devastated when she learns her great, great grandmother Mary Alice wasn't royalty, but a common maid. Pressure from his classmates has Arthur doubting his decision to call Buster out during a baseball game.

programme.title: Arthur: Mr. Ratburn's Secret Identity/Besties
programme.desc: Mysterious calls. Superhuman strength. Is Mr. Ratburn secretly a superhero? When Buster and Ladonna bond over a memorable trip to the movies, Arthur feels left out. Has Ladonna taken his place as Buster's best bud?

channel.desc: Based on the beloved books by Marc Brown, these are the adventures of Arthur, an 8-year-old aardvark, and his family and friends as they grow up and learn how to be good neighbours to one another.

programme.title: The Blitz
programme.desc: The Blitz looks at the build-up to the raids and detailed footage of the destruction that followed. It features interviews from those who lived through it and stories of sadness and bravery, at a time when Britain held strong and swore not to surrender.

programme.title: Stories from the Blitz
programme.desc: Stories from the Blitz features new interviews with those who were there and amazing archive footage of the devastation, and of human courage and sheer will to survive one of Britain's darkest periods in History.

programme.title: Blitz the Aftermath
programme.desc: With interviews and archive footage showing the sheer amount of devastation – from the loss of life to the immense damage caused to buildings across the country - The Aftermath looks at how the Blitz changed the face of Britain's cities and lives.

programme.title: Hitler Uncovering His Fatal Obsession: Barbarossa Unleased 1941
programme.desc: E1 begins with a brief examination of the rationale of hatred projected by Hitler onto the Soviet-Slavic-Jewish world. Then it leaps forward, to see Hitler initiate an invasion of the USSR.

programme.title: Hitler Uncovering His Fatal Obsession: Time is Blood 1942-5
programme.desc: Episode 2 begins after the desperate German winter of 1941. Yet 1942 began badly for the Soviets, with more vicious Nazi campaigning seeing millions more Russians captured and starved.

programme.title: Hitler and Stalin: A Secret Relationship: Mistrust and Mutual Fascination
programme.desc: We have long ignored the "intimate" relationship between Hitler and Stalin, this mixture of mistrust and mutual fascination.

programme.title: Hitler and Stalin: A Secret Relationship: Two Tyrants
programme.desc: With the German-Soviet pact, Stalin and Hitler put aside all political logic to let the Western democracies believe that such a rapprochement was impossible.

programme.title: Hitler's Propaganda Machine: Building The Brand
programme.desc: Hitler’s fascination with propaganda was born in the trenches of the First World War. There he saw it emerge as a potent tool of psychological warfare - one that he would harness to build the Nazi movement. Witness Hitler's early propaganda tactics.

programme.title: Hitler's Propaganda Machine: Power and Persuasion
programme.desc: This episode explores Hitler's approach to propaganda in power; where persuasion was achieved through propaganda and terror, all in service of one goal: the creation of a state under one shared ideology. A new German power fueled by propaganda.

programme.title: Hitler's Propaganda Machine: Why We Fight
programme.desc: This episode explores the way Hitler used propaganda to justify his warmongering, reframing it as defense of Germany’s people and borders. It investigates the role propaganda played for both Hitler and the Allies to mobilize their countries for war.

programme.title: The Dambusters: Episode 1
programme.desc: Aircrew have eight weeks to train for a top secret mission.

programme.title: The Dambusters: Episode 2
programme.desc: Barnes Wallis has to create an entirely new aiming device.

programme.title: The Dambusters: Episode 3
programme.desc: The raid on Germany's dams gets off to a rocky start.

channel.desc: Look behind the important battles, daring bombing raids, and devastating amounts of bloodshed that helped shape British history. Watch key events as you’ve never seen before in colourised archive footage providing new windows into the past.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miracle & Javonni
programme.desc: Smart, single mum Miracle fell for Javonni, a dreamy-eyed Instagrammer. With Max on hiatus, Nev teams up with TV personality Charlamagne to take Miracle on a hunt for the man of her dreams. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ramon & Paola
programme.desc: Ramon met Paola on Facebook and established an exclusive online relationship. But after many failed attempts to video chat, is she really who he thinks she is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Hundra & Emily
programme.desc: Hundra never planned on falling in love with a girl and is risking coming out on national TV to learn if her love is for real. Nev investigates to reveal a shocking Catfish. (S4, ep17)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Daisy & Marcus
programme.desc: Daisy met Marcus on Instagram and he instantly stole her heart. But Marcus won't speak to Daisy on the phone, let alone meet her in person, so Nev and Tyler try to arrange a face to face. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antoinette & Albert
programme.desc: A year after meeting 'T-lights' on Instagram, 'instaceleb' Antoinette is ready to meet him, but he always brushes off the idea. Is he really the online celebrity he claims to be?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Prophet & Trinity
programme.desc: While Prophet, of Grammy-nominated Nappy Roots, is making his rap career comeback, he connected online with Trinity. Prophet's ready to settle down, but is this beauty too good to be true? (S4, ep13)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alex & Matt
programme.desc: Alex has been chatting to Matt for a year and thinks he could be the one. But after several failed attempts to meet, Alex wants Julie and Oobah to track him down. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Cole, Abbie & The Fanpage
programme.desc: Cole and Abbie keep being sent anonymous creepy gifts to their home and their relationship is now at breaking point. Julie and Oobah head to Scotland to try and help save their marriage. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Aaliyah & Alicia
programme.desc: Aaliyah has been able to share her life struggles with Alicia. However, despite living only 70 blocks away, Alicia refuses to meet her as she hasn't come out to her friends and family yet. (S2, ep11)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jarrod & Abby
programme.desc: How do young people who've embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others they've never met in person before. The problem -- that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: For shy Devan, meeting Rylan was love at first click. Devan wants to believe that Rylan is marriage material but her suspicious behaviour is leaving him with doubts.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Nick & Melissa
programme.desc: Nick and Melissa fell in love at age 12 when they met on an online chat room. Now 18, Nick is ready to meet Melissa. But is Melissa the real deal or has Nick been entangled in lies? (S2, ep13)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Sydney and Ayissha were in an online romance for years before Sydney revealed she is not who she says. But Ayissha still loves her and seeks Nev and Max's help.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Stephanie & David
programme.desc: Catfish brings together couples who've interacted solely through screens. In this edition, Stephanie searches for the man she's been talking to in an unseen episode.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Felipe & Jasmine
programme.desc: Single father Felipe is ready to settle down with Jasmine. However, the two have been talking online for eight months and have never met. Max returns and joins Nev to investigate.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jasmine & Mike
programme.desc: Jasmine has been texting with Mike for two years and thinks he could be the perfect step-father for her son. Although they live only 15 minutes apart, the pair have yet to meet up in person. (S1, ep4)

channel.desc: Catfish: The TV Show" tackles the mystery and complexities of dating in a digital world. Nev Schulman and Max Joseph take viewers on a journey that goes inside the stories of young people as their online-only romantic relationships collide with real-life.

programme.title: The City: Mingling with the Commoners
programme.desc: Olivia invites Jay's band to perform at one of her charity events but her plan backfires when the band is disrespected on-stage, leaving Whitney and Olivia at odds. (s1, ep8)

programme.title: The City: Unexpected Roommates
programme.desc: Adam kicks Jay out of his apartment so Allie can move in & Jay asks Whitney if he can live with her. Erin's plan to juggle two guys backfires & leaves her alone on New Year's Eve. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The City: The Past Catches Up
programme.desc: When the gang goes to Miami for the weekend, Jay runs into his ex-girlfriend Danielle and Whitney wonders if the rumours about them might be true after all. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Fool Me Twice, Shame On Me
programme.sub-title: Fool Me Twice, Shame On Me
programme.desc: Whitney's crushed to learn that Jay's mysterious night out was spent with his ex-girlfriend, Danielle. Olivia steals the credit from Whitney when they style an ELLE cover shoot! (S1, ep11)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: The Hills: No More Mr. Nice Guy / Stress And The City
programme.sub-title: No More Mr. Nice Guy / Stress And The City
programme.desc: After kissing Brody in Vegas, Lauren wonders what their status is. Testing it out at dinner, she tells Brody that she hasn't been on a date in weeks. Will he be next on the menu? (S3, ep11)

programme.title: The Hills: Young Hollywood / Forgive and Forget
programme.desc: At her office, Heidi gets a big bouquet of roses from Spencer. It's Heidi's 21st, and Spencer's excited to celebrate the big day with "the best thing that ever happened to him". (S3, ep13)

programme.title: The Hills: With This Ring... / A Night At The Opera
programme.sub-title: With This Ring... / A Night At The Opera
programme.desc: Just as Heidi's apology didn't make the cut in the last episode, Spencer's hope to elope falls flat when he shares his latest bright idea with Heidi! Whitney goes on a date with a trainer.

programme.title: The City: Finale
programme.desc: Fresh from a breakup with Jay, Whitney questions if she made the right decision leaving LA. An opportunity opens up at work, but Olivia is after the same position. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: The City: Sleeping With The Frenemy
programme.desc: Olivia's working at ELLE Magazine, but meets her match in co-worker Erin Kaplan. Whitney returns to work for Kelly Cutrone, & an old friend's in town, looking to crash with her. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: The City: Working Girls
programme.desc: Whitney wonders if working with a friend is a good idea when Roxy steps out of line on day one. Olivia wins Joe Zee's approval on a new project at ELLE, but Erin isn't impressed. (S1, ep15)

programme.title: The City: Its All Who You Know
programme.desc: Whitney goes behind Kelly's back to show her fashion designs to Bergdorf Goodman. Olivia shocks Erin by using her fashion world connections to succeed at her biggest ELLE task. (S1, ep16)

programme.title: The City: Meet the Fackelmayers
programme.desc: Whitney meets some cute brothers. Olivia thrives at an ELLE Magazine cocktail party & Erin reminds her that the fashion business isn't just about who you know but what you know. (S1, ep17)

programme.title: The City: Hit It And Quit It
programme.desc: Whitney grows cautious about Freddie just as her ex, Jay, comes back into the picture. Roxy clashes with Olivia when People's Revolution and Elle join forces to put on a party. (S1, ep18)

programme.title: The City: Weekend at Freddie's
programme.desc: On a weekend trip to the Hamptons, Whitney finds out some surprising news about Freddie. Erin has to pick up the slack when Olivia drops the ball on a big interview assignment. (S1, ep19)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: From the First Fist Pump
programme.desc: An entertaining look back at the first three seasons of Jersey Shore - complete with all the comedy, drama, mischievous antics, and water cooler moments that keep people talking.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Going to Italia
programme.desc: The housemates pack up their hair extensions & Shore Store t-shirts & jet off for an Italian adventure. But the culture-shock that awaits is nothing compared to their shocking new hook-ups. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Like More than a Friend
programme.desc: Deena & Pauly consider the consequences should they hook up. The Situation tries to take his friendship with Snooki to the next level. Ron & Sammi try to be friends but old habits die hard. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Twinning
programme.desc: With twins in the mix, it's double trouble as bi-curious Deena pulls the robbery on both The Situation and Vinny. Plus, The Situation's 'secret hook-up' with Snooki is revealed. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Crime and Punishment
programme.desc: The boys harass Deena for stealing a girl from Vinny's bed. Ronnie & Sammi are back to their old ways, but this time The Situation is involved in their drama. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: And the Wall Won
programme.desc: After causing drama between Ronnie & Sammi for years, The Situation comes to blows with Ronnie. But with The Situation carried out on a stretcher, have things finally gone too far? (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Fist Pump, Pushups, Chapstick
programme.desc: Pauly D and Vinny put on a Guido-themed comedy show, while Ron and Sammi try to patch things up. Snooki is so distraught over her long-distance relationship that JWOWW and Sammi decide to intervene.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Meatball Mashup
programme.desc: S4, Ep 7. When the roommates take a trip to the Italian Shore, Snooki & Deena party so hard they wind up in bed together. Whilst back in Florence, Team Meatball has a run-in with the Italian police.

channel.desc: If you like relationship drama, fake tan, and extraordinarily white teeth then MTV Reality is the channel for you! From wild nights out on the Geordie Shore, to the glamour of the LA Hills, MTV Reality is the ultimate guilty pleasure!

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Transformation
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Derek Lloyd go to the Peruvian jungle to look for the Paracelsus scrolls which contain the formula for turning lead into gold.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Flag Day
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Larivee, California to find the Pioneer's Bear Flag.

programme.title: Renegade: South of 98
programme.desc: Reno searches for a fugitive gang member in a violent African-American neighborhood. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Hostage
programme.desc: When Reno locates Hound Adams, the man who can prove his innocence, the two become hostages threatened by a pair of psychotic robbers at a bar. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Rabbit Redux
programme.desc: Reno's romantic vacation with Leeza Bendetti is disrupted when their mountain cabin is targeted by a gang of vengeful drug suppliers. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: The Posse
programme.desc: Reno, Bobby and Cheyenne protect a fugitive bank robber falsely accused of murdering a sheriff's wife. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Once Burned, Twice Chey
programme.desc: Influenced by her romantic attraction to a former teacher accused of murdering his wife, Cheyenne asks Reno and Bobby to help prove his innocence. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Sheriff Reno
programme.desc: Despite the risk of exposing his true identity, Reno accepts a temporary job as the sheriff of a small town besieged by a pair of vengeful brothers. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Murderer's Row
programme.desc: Reno and Bobby compete against the best bounty hunters in the country when a wealthy entrepreneur offers a million dollars for the return of a microprocessor stolen by a traitorous executive. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: The Shooter
programme.desc: A CIA agent gets caught up in political intrigue after he gets brought in to solve the murder of a Cuban ambassador.

programme.title: Reprisal
programme.desc: A veteran looks to raise money for his son's healthcare by teaming up with another vet to track down criminals.

programme.title: Mercenary: Absolution
programme.desc: John is a man who does bad things to bad people. Chi is his partner – the only man ever allowed to leave the Triads. When John and Chi accept a job in Eastern Europe, they unearth a Human Trafficking ring run by The Boss, and an explosive battle results.

programme.title: Kill Zone
programme.desc: The shadow of war follows a troubled Iraq War vet as he is forced to pursue one of his own into the Pacific Northwest wilderness to finally confront a war crime that has haunted them both.

channel.desc: It’s time to go into overdrive by jumping off buildings, flying a burning plane, driving in a car chase and saving the world. Pluto TV Action brings you blockbusters, stars, and a strong dose of high-octane excitement.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The War in Chicago
programme.desc: The street violence, gang activity and drug trafficking in Chicago.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Relentless
programme.desc: A woman wages a psychological war against the person she believes killed her daughter.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Bad Bet
programme.desc: A bookie comes under suspicion when his wife is killed.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Preacher's Passion
programme.desc: A preacher searches for answers about his girlfriend's death.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Walking Free
programme.desc: The story of David Camm, who was convicted in two murder trials -- each eventually overturned -- and was found not guilty in his third trial for the murder of his wife and two children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Spies, Lies and Secrets
programme.desc: A report about the death of Shane Todd, a brilliant, high-tech engineer at a Singapore company who, according to his parents, was murdered because he was unwilling to share secrets that could harm the United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fateful Connection
programme.desc: A report on the investigation led by a determined detective to solve a 30-year-old cold case involving two young women who went missing in Florida, in 1982.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Blue River Murder
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 2010 death of Stephanie Roller, a Colorado mother of three who allegedly went for a walk during a blizzard and was later found dead in a nearby river.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death at Cottonwood Creek
programme.desc: Frederick Mueller says while he and his wife were out for a walk near their vacation home, she fell off a cliff while he stopped to take a photo of her. Was it murder or an accident?

programme.title: 48 Hours: Loved to Death
programme.desc: An investigation into the rise of violence surrounding relationship breakups among adolescents, as detailed in the story of Wayland, Massachusetts teen Lauren Astley, whose last encounter with her football player ex-boyfriend proved to be fatal

programme.title: 48 Hours: Last Chance
programme.desc: Attorneys work to get a death row inmate who confessed to a crime he didn't commit out of prison.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 1
programme.sub-title: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 1
programme.desc: When a celebrity dog trainer is murdered, an heiress fears for her life and a bodyguard vows to be a hero.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 2
programme.sub-title: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 2
programme.desc: When a celebrity dog trainer is murdered, an heiress fears for her life and a bodyguard vows to be a hero.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death in the Parsonage
programme.desc: An apparent suicide in a Pennsylvania church exposes a pastor's secret.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: One Last Hug
programme.sub-title: Live to Tell: One Last Hug
programme.desc: An updated report on growing dangers of dating and breakup violence, focusing on Melissa Dohme, who agreed to meet a former boyfriend, Robert Burton, for one last hug before they broke up forever. The decision nearly cost her her life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder at Sea?
programme.desc: The disappearance of newlywed George Smith, who vanished from a cruise in the Mediterranean. This report uncovers the questionable alibis, failed polygraphs and a provocative video that involves the three men who last saw Smith alive.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Daughter, A Mortgage, and Two Murders
programme.sub-title: A Daughter, A Mortgage, and Two Murders
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the murders of Greg and Bernadette Ohlemacher in 2005. The Albuquerque, New Mexico couple had been shot dead in their home

channel.desc: Pluto TV 48 Hours brings viewers behind the scenes of the most intriguing murders. Follow the investigators, meet the accused, and review the evidence in the original true crime docuseries, with stories of obsession, revenge, and crimes of passion.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is surprised to learn that “The Land of Mother Goose” truly exists. Baby Bop catches Barney, BJ, and Riff wrapping a mysterious present in the caboose, she just can’t wait to see what it is.

programme.desc: Baby Bop's friend Monty the butterfly passes through the park with a flock of friends on their way to Mexico. When Monty gets left behind by his insect friends and family, Barney takes everyone on a visit to Mexico.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: That Makes Me Mad!
programme.desc: Barney helps his young friends find good ways to express and deal with angry emotions.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Imagine That!
programme.desc: While Baby Bop and BJ are pretending to be pirates, Barney creates a magical island for their fantastic adventure. Together they discover ways to have fun while playing dress up, pretending, and being silly.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ and Baby Bop decide to get Halloween celebrations underway with a costume party. When Ramon loses his trick-or-treat candy, BJ shares his treats with Ramon.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Picture of Friendship
programme.desc: After a brief misunderstanding, BJ realizes he has many friends. He enjoys a day playing with Barney and the children.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: On Again, Off Again
programme.desc: Barney, Baby Bop and the kids learn all about "on" and "off" by playing games together.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Seeing - Beethoven's Hear!
programme.desc: An ordinary game of "hide and seek" takes a not-so-ordinary turn when Baby Bop claims that an elephant is hiding in the park! Barney and Riff are happy to play along, but BJ thinks that his sister may be "seeing things."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The New Kid - The Princess And The Frog
programme.sub-title: The New Kid - The Princess And The Frog
programme.desc: When Riff meets a new friend in the park, BJ feels a little left out. BJ goes to great lengths to try to find a new friend for himself. Barney helps BJ see that we don't have to forget old friends when we make new ones.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Ryan tries to be just like Barney but soon learns that he is special when he's being himself! Barney explains to Baby Bop that the word "no" can help you avoid making mistakes or getting hurt.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop has trouble following the rules and taking turns while playing games. BJ hurts his toe while pretending to be Captain Pickles.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop wants Barney, BJ and the Park Kids to play with her instead of working in a garden. RIFF plays detective to track down the source of a mysterious sound in the Park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Perfectly Purple Day
programme.desc: When Sarah accidentally spills red paint into the blue paint, a mess turns into a perfectly purple day. The children paint pictures, make purple flowers and plan a purple party for their friend Colleen.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Easy as ABC
programme.desc: When Baby Bop uses the caboose mailbox to deliver a special invitation to her tea party, she discovers that no one can read her handwriting. Barney and his friends find creative ways to help her learn her ABCs!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Mother Goose - Fun With Reading
programme.desc: While playing in the caboose, BJ is surprised to learn that "The Land of Mother Goose" truly exists. Several Mother Goose characters have come to ask for help! Parts of their rhymes are missing! When Mother Goose arrives, she fixes the problem.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Bird of a Different Feather
programme.sub-title: A Bird of a Different Feather
programme.desc: Barney takes the kids to Hawaii on a quest for a bird of paradise. While there, they meet some friends, learn new Hawaiian words, make a Hawaiian lei and dance a hula! Eventually, Barney and his friends find a bird of paradise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ, Baby Bop and Riff can hardly wait for the petting zoo that is coming to the park. Riff feels terrible when he accidentally wrecks BJ’s beloved scooter.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Blame Game - Airplanes
programme.desc: Marcos accidentally breaks an art show project that Melanie has made. Afraid that she will be angry, he doesn't say anything, but then feels guilty. Barney helps him see that honesty and taking responsibility for what we do is always best. together.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Pistachio - BJ Snack Attack
programme.desc: Barney is snacking on pistachios...and just can't seem to stop! His young friends try to help by hiding them from Barney. When that doesn't work, they tell him a story to help him stop eating pistachios.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ sings that he wants to be a rock and roll star. Baby Bop sings that she wants to be a country music star. BJ gets mistaken for the artist who painted a portrait of Barney.

channel.desc: Join Barney & Friends for adventures, songs, dancing and lots of fun every day on Pluto TV. In Barney's world, sharing and caring are key!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rodeo Ton
programme.desc: 1970s El Toro mechanical bull used to train bull riders; silver WWII era banjo; a collection of 1800s handcrafted hunting duck decoys.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Jersey Score
programme.desc: Ton & Allen attend a silent auction in NJ, but that doesn't stop the local buyers from letting them know they're not welcome! They uncover a skeet throwing machine from the 1960's & a vintage vehicle with some real horsepower!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!

channel.desc: Finding everything from vintage vending machines to rare guitars to antique firearms, expert storage locker buyers Allen and Ton travel to auctions across Southern California, bidding on abandoned units they can quickly flip for a tidy profit.

programme.sub-title: Series Finale Special: Check Up With Dr. Drew Part 2

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Leah has to take a court-ordered drug test. Chelsea joins forces with Adam's ex to fight his custody request. Kailyn & Javi's issues boil over when she spends a night away with friends.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jenelle and Nathan's explosive arguing threatens her chance of gaining custody of Jace. Corey presses for more time with the girls, while Leah and Jeremy's marriage crumbles.

channel.desc: `Teen Mom' chronicles the challenges teenagers Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting a job, beginning college and moving out on their own.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Megan
programme.desc: While her dad's in Afghanistan, Megan gets pregnant. But with little money and a video game playing boyfriend not necessarily in for the long haul, she'll have to grow up fast.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Ashley

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Unseen Moments 2
programme.desc: Unseen moments from the episodes Brooke, Felicia, Emily, Markai, Aubrey, Christinna, Kayla, Megan, and Ashley.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Reunion
programme.desc: Dr. Drew hosts an emotional finale as the teen mothers from the latest series share a stage, coming together with their boyfriends & parents to talk about the issues they face.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Jordan
programme.desc: Jordan and her sister were models and best friends until Jordan's pregnancy put all that on hold. Now her boyfriend and her sister are competing to be her number one.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Jennifer
programme.desc: After abandoning sports and losing her friends, Jennifer has to battle with her over-protective parents to accept her boyfriend before she gives birth to twin boys.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Jamie
programme.desc: Raised by a single mum, Jamie is a straight A student with big plans for the future. But after getting pregnant she struggles to mould her immature boyfriend into the father she never had.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Danielle
programme.desc: After following her mum's footsteps by becoming a teen mum, Danielle strives to prove she can do things differently. But she soon learns she needs help managing school, a job and a baby.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Cleondra
programme.desc: Regarded as the most likely to succeed in her family, Cleondra shocks everyone by getting pregnant so young. Now she faces the tough decision to leave home and move in with her boyfriend.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Kayla
programme.desc: Kayla's anorexia comes back full-force when she is pregnant. While struggling to put looks aside, Kayla realizes that the person she has always relied on, her mother, refuses to support her.

programme.desc: After hiding her pregnancy for eight months, Izabella is forced to reconsider who her true friends are. She then risks her family ties when her boyfriend betrays their trust.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Kianna
programme.desc: With an immature boyfriend and a distant mum, Kianna wants more stability for her baby and considers adoption. When no one supports her decision, she must figure out how to be a good parent.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Taylor
programme.desc: Taylor's mum wants her to choose adoption, but Taylor and her boyfriend Nathan feel that they can overcome the challenges of being teen parents.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Allie
programme.desc: A Jersey girl is stuck in Texas after moving in with her boyfriend's dysfunctional family, Allie needs to decide whether to raise her baby in an unstable environment or without a dad.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Reunion
programme.desc: Dr Drew hosts an emotional finale as ten teen mothers share a stage to come together with their boyfriends and parents and talk about the issues they face.

channel.desc: Young women share their personal journeys as they cope with the challenges and mounting responsibilities of unexpected motherhood.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Prey
programme.desc: A murder victim turns out to be a violent stalker, and the killer may be one of his stalking victims who learned to cover her tracks by attending one of Bonasera's college seminars.

programme.title: CSI: New York: The Past, Present and Murder
programme.desc: A man is killed when he falls out a window in media mogul Robert Dunbrook's building, but did Dunbrook throw him? During the investigation, Mac discovers that the case is connected to an earlier case involving a missing flash drive.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Greater Good
programme.desc: As Lindsay goes into labor, Mac suspects that a man who served a prison sentence in a manslaughter case is protecting the actual culprit.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Pay Up
programme.desc: A group of violent kidnappers capture Robert Dunbrook's son just before he is scheduled to testify to a grand jury against his father, and the CSI team is rocked by a tragedy.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Blacklist (Featuring Gravedigger)
programme.desc: The case of a cyber killer, who appears to be targeting medical health-care workers, turns personal when the suspect invokes the name of Mac's father who had died nearly two decades earlier.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: While investigating the DNA from a murder scene, Hawkes discovers that the DNA is connected to more than a dozen cases over a three-state area. But does the city really have a serial killer on their hands, or is there another explanation?

programme.title: CSI: New York: Battle Scars
programme.desc: CSI investigates the homicide of a competitive street dancer, which leads the team to an unlikely killer who has a shocking motive.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: After a body falls from the 59th Street Bridge, the CSI team finds a compass near the body pointing east, and realizes it's the third victim of the Compass Killer. Meanwhile, detective Flack, still dealing with Angell's death, goes AWOL.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Manhattanhenge
programme.desc: Mac and the team lose the Compass Killer at the World's Fair site, and they soon discover through the use of astronomy and sunrises that it's only a matter of time before he targets the next victim.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Enough
programme.desc: When three defendants are gunned down on the eve of their trial, Mac is forced to make good on a promise he made to a reluctant witness.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Dead Inside
programme.desc: Investigation of a floating crime scene leads the team into the world of SecretU an art-house world of true confessionals.

programme.title: CSI: NY: My Name Is Mac Taylor
programme.desc: When two men who share the same name as detective Mac Taylor are killed, detective Taylor rounds up all the other Mac Taylors in New York and tries to figure out who will be the next victim.

programme.title: CSI: NY: The Box
programme.desc: The remains of a pregnant 17-year-old are found in the trunk of a crashed car, but the baby is missing. During the investigation, Danny finds out some shocking news about Lindsay.

programme.title: CSI: NY: The Triangle
programme.desc: The CSIs are forced to investigate two crimes at once with a mysterious energy field near The Empire State Building at the center of both.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Forbidden Fruit
programme.desc: The CSIs appear to have an open and shut case after a murder suspect is impaled during a police pursuit, but it turns out to only be beginning.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Help
programme.desc: Young brides-to-be fight over a killer dress at the biggest wedding gown sale of the year and one of the shoppers winds up dead.

channel.desc: Forensic scientists and investigators of the New York City Police Department unveil the circumstances behind mysterious and unusual deaths.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: High Octane
programme.desc: The investigation into a beheading during a stunt at an automobile "sideshow" could ultimately expose a larger cover-up involving stolen cars and jet fuel.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Darkroom
programme.desc: CSI steps up the search for potential serial killer who may be connected to a professional photographer after it discovers that Natalia's sister may be the next victim.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Come As You Are
programme.desc: The death of a Marine recruiter ultimately leads Horatio to open an investigation into the death of a soldier in Iraq. The soldier's brother claims responsibility, but Horatio suspects a cover-up.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Internal Affairs
programme.desc: When Natalia's ex is found dead at his home, Horatio must step into the investigation to keep his team safe from an overeager investigator.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: No Man's Land
programme.desc: The robbery of a police truck containing confiscated weapons is connected to a plot to spring Clavo Cruz from prison, and one of the guns stolen in the robbery is used in the shooting of a young boy.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Man Down
programme.desc: While the manhunt for Clavo Cruz continues, Delko fights for his life after the shooting.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Triple Threat
programme.desc: A real estate developer is murdered, and the investigation uncovers a complex web of deceit involving his wife her two identical triplet sisters. But the apparently-murdered developer may have had a surprise of his own.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Rush
programme.desc: An actor is found dead in the trunk of a stunt car, but the investigation reveals that he actually died in his room at a high-profile celebrity rehab facility.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Just Murdered
programme.desc: A far from amicable divorce comes to a bigger crisis when bodies start piling up, and Delko falls afoul of a former nemesis when he misses a payment.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: Horatio and the team race against time to find out who is trying to frame Horatio for the murder of a woman he’s been dating.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Three-Way
programme.desc: When a "wives weekend" ends in murder, the CSI team is faced with three women whose separate trysts with the victim make them prime suspects

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Felony Flight
programme.desc: The team works in tandem with NY CSI chief Mac Taylor to apprehend a serial killer before he kills the young girl he has just taken hostage

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Nailed
programme.desc: Ryan Wolfe is attacked and seriously injured while investigating the murder of a distraught soon-to-be ex-wife, and there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Urban Hellraisers
programme.desc: Horatio and the CSI team must rely on a video game for their next clue as to where a group of young gunmen will strike next.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Shattered
programme.desc: The CSI team is hard-pressed to find the killer of an infamous drug lord, and a member of the team is investigated for drugs by Internal Affairs.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Payback
programme.desc: A rapist is brutally murdered after his identity is exposed. Horatio and the CSI team are called in to investigate the murder.

channel.desc: Follow Horatio Caine, a former homicide detective, and his team of Miami-Dade Police Department forensic scientists as they try to unveil the conditions behind the mysterious deaths and crimes.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood Sisters
programme.desc: The bullet-ridden bodies of two sisters are found in a suburban house that’s littered with mysterious clues. Joe Kenda learns that the two unassuming young mothers shared an explosive secret.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Raise the Dead
programme.desc: When a tip comes in suggesting foul play on a 71yr old man, Lt. Joe Kenda is left with only one way to reveal the truth: exhume the body from its grave.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Line Goes Dead
programme.desc: When the severed head of a wife and mother is found, Lt. Joe Kenda uses forensics and interrogation to find both her body and her killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Snitch
programme.desc: When officers respond to a shooting , they discover the body of a young man they know all to well -- police informant Jimmie Stevenson. it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Justified
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down, leading Lt. Joe Kenda to delve into his troubled past and his connection to the world of rare coins.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My Worst Fear

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Poker Face
programme.desc: A group of friends discover the corpse of entrepreneur Jamie Foster hidden under a blanket. Kenda e discovers that Foster’s business put him in close quarters with a host of unsavory characters.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: After School Special
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes when a beloved teacher is poisoned in her classroom. As doctors fight to save Barbara Lewis’ life, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team delve into her personal affairs.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Shattered Dreams

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Winter Blaze
programme.desc: After a house fire lights up a Wisconsin night, firefighters find the bodies of a woman and two kids, with evidence they’d been bound. Police learn the victim’s infant son is missing as well.

programme.sub-title: Zodiac Killer: I Am the Zodiac (Part 1)

programme.desc: He terrorized Northern California in the late 1960s, killing young couples at secluded lover’s lanes. He also taunted the public with cryptic clues and ciphers. Can DNA unmask this murderer?

programme.title: Very Scary People: Aileen Wuornos: Monster Made (Part 2)
programme.desc: In 1990, Florida police were on a search for a killer. Seven men were dead, their bodies scattered along state highways. Misfit Aileen Wuornos frequented truck stops to find her victims.

programme.desc: When Felix substitute teaches a yoga class, his teaching style rubs everyone, including Emily, the wrong way. Weird Al Yankovic and Regis Philbin guest star.

programme.desc: Oscar becomes obsessed with living up to Murph's (Geoff Stults) standards when he finds out the girl he is seeing used to date the handsome ex-baseball player.

programme.desc: When the IRS decides to audit Oscar and his ex-wife Gaby, Felix offers to mediate between the contentious exes when he realizes that he might be the reason Oscar was audited in the first place.

programme.desc: After Oscar and Felix become obsessed with eavesdropping on their bickering neighbors, they try to subtly intervene and help them save their marriage.

programme.desc: Oscar faces a personal dilemma when he dates a young nanny, Allyson (Brianne Howey) who works for his neighbor, Charlotte (Teri Hatcher).

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Madison & Son
programme.desc: Oscar's dream comes true when he is asked to throw out the first pitch at a New York Mets game.

programme.desc: Oscar attempts to impress Charlotte (Teri Hatcher) by purchasing a table for a fundraiser to benefit The New York Philharmonic.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: An Oscar Named Desire
programme.desc: Oscar and Charlotte hit a speed bump when they hesitate to take their relationship to the next level.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: A Dinner Engagement
programme.desc: Felix attempts to reverse Emily's birthday curse and plans a nice dinner to celebrate with friends.

programme.desc: Oscar learns that Felix was a nationally ranked chess player as a child and convinces him to return to the game to make money.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Road Scholar
programme.desc: In an attempt to surprise Emily, Felix gets his learner's permit and enlists his friends to help him learn how to drive.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: All The Residents' Men
programme.desc: Oscar and Felix run a heated campaign for President of their building's tenants' association, but Oscar doesn't fully realize everything the position entails.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: The Ex-Factor
programme.desc: When Murph persuades Oscar to try online dating, Oscar finds himself on a blind date with Felix's ex-wife, Ashley (Christine Woods).

programme.desc: Oscar is forced to choose between his romantic plans with Charlotte (Teri Hatcher) and helping to save Felix's relationship as Emily decides to extend her stay in London.

programme.desc: When Oscar learns that his favorite hangout, Langford's, is in financial trouble, he impulsively asks Felix to help save it, without considering the disastrous consequences.

programme.desc: When Nathan pitches a children's show to his boss, Ed Dolan, based on Tom's imaginary comic book, Tom has an adverse reaction to the tweaks made to his cherished world. Jeffrey Tambor guest stars.

programme.desc: Nathan's excitement at scoring a ticket for himself and a guest to a dinner with President Obama turns to dread when he has to pick one of his family members to be his "plus one."

programme.desc: Nathan tries to date his mother's dentist in secret after Carol adds her to the Miller Family Blacklist for charging her a $75 cancellation fee for being late to her appointment.

programme.title: The Millers: 72
programme.desc: When Tom proudly tells the family he's dating a much younger woman, Nathan goes undercover to spy on him and make sure his father isn't being scammed by a gold digger.

programme.desc: Nathan introduces his boss, Ed Dolan, to Tom in hopes they'll hit it off and hang out together, but surprisingly, Dolan only has eyes for Carol. Jeffrey Tambor guest stars.

programme.desc: Carol has the worst Mother's Day ever when Nathan forgets to get her a present.

programme.title: The Millers: Movin' Out (Carol's Song)

programme.desc: Nathan is assigned to cover a Sci-Fi Fest for his workplace and runs into a famous book author who has hated him since grade school.

programme.sub-title: Reunited and It Feels So Bad
programme.desc: Tom and Carol decide to formally end their marriage but are surprised when they both hesitate to finalize the divorce, sending Nathan and Debbie into a panic at the thought of their parents reconciling.

programme.desc: A business woman with a thriving eyelash clientel claims her cousin has used her like a private ATM; Judge Rhonda probes both parties to see who will blink first.

programme.desc: Department protocol is violated when Catherine investigates her ex-husband's rape accusation.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Anonymous
programme.desc: A man is found dead in his bathtub with a tape recording saying he has committed suicide. Grisson, Catherine and Sara investigate the case that becomes more complicated when Grisson's fingerprint is found at the scene crime.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Unfriendly Skies
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a passenger aboard a commercial airliner. They soon realize that the forensic evidence and passenger statements don't quite add up.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Sex, Lies And Larvae
programme.desc: Sara and Grissom investigate the death of a woman, Kaye Shelton, found wrapped in a blanket in the mountains. With no way to confirm the time of death, Grissom relies on the insects found on her body to establish a timeline.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Gentle, Gentle
programme.desc: The entire team investigates the abduction of the infant child of a well-to-do family. Suspicion immediately falls on the child's parents.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Sounds Of Silence
programme.desc: Two teenage girls run over a deaf man with their car, but they didn't kill him - he was already dead.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Justice Is Served
programme.desc: Grissom, Nick, and Warrick take the case of a jogger who was killed by a wild animal in the park. It gets complicated when they discover that the jogger had his liver removed after he was killed.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Evaluation Day
programme.desc: On the day Grissom has to evaluate his team, a head is found in the trunk of a car. While Gil and Catherine work on the head, Sara and Nick investigate a body in the desert that's missing its head.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: The Strip Strangler
programme.desc: The team is investigating the ongoing murders by a signature killer. The killer has some knowledge of forensics and has left little evidence behind.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Burked
programme.desc: Grissom and crew are called in after high roller Tony Braun, a known drug addict, is found dead in his house by a gardener.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Chaos Theory
programme.desc: The entire CSI team investigates a disappearance at a local university.

channel.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, the series that reinvented the procedural drama, is now streaming 24/7 on Pluto TV. Follow the original cast as they uncover the clues, interrogate the suspects, and shine a UV light on the sins of Sin City.

programme.title: Forensics
programme.desc: Investigators follow multiple leads as they look into the disappearance of a woman from an Auckland motel. They discover the woman's dangerous, criminal world as they attempt to substantiate their case.

programme.title: Forensics
programme.desc: A team of forensic experts tackle a missing persons case. They attempt to figure out what happened to a deaf woman from Christchurch named Emma Agnew.

programme.title: Forensics
programme.desc: The science of pathology and mechanical engineering help reveal the true story of a man who claims he accidentally killed his ex-girlfriend in a suicide attempt.

programme.title: Forensics
programme.desc: A middle-aged woman goes into her backyard to unlock the self-contained unit where her 23-year-old daughter lives alone. She finds her daughter on the floor and her throat has been cut.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young mother is found unresponsive in bed, and her cause of death is determined to be an accidental heroin overdose, but her family has more questions than answers and launches their own investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: Searching for answers from her own troubled past, one woman sets out on a journey to uncover the identities of four unidentified bodies found inside barrels in the woods, a mystery that had plagued law enforcement for years.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man leaves home for the corner store but dies on a rainy pavement just down the street. While bystanders claim that he fell off his bike, his mum and sister do not buy it and hit the streets to find answers.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: When a college student was found dead in rural Quebec, police refused to call it a murder, but years later, her brother continues his own investigation into her death. On the eve of a trip to return to the scene of the crime, tragedy strikes again.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young girl's life was thrown into chaos when her single mother died by a gunshot wound in their remote mountain home. The journey for the truth will be long and arduous and it'll be thirty years until justice will finally be served.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man whose childhood is marked by tragedy learns of a relatively unknown serial killer and finds himself thinking about unidentified victims. It isn't long before that the pursuit becomes a full-time job and identifying victims an obsession.

programme.title: The Real Prime Suspect
programme.desc: Former DCI Jackie Malton interviews experts, learning how they joined forces to identify the skeleton of a woman no-one even knew was missing, and how her killer was brought to justice.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Simon Toyne travels north to investigate one of the most chilling partnerships of all time, the crimes committed by Ian Brady and Myra Hindley.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Simon travels to West London, where he explores the abduction and murder of seven-year-old Mark Tildesley, the inspiration behind the book 'The Bone Field' by Simon Kernick.

programme.title: Inside Crime
programme.desc: The story of Arthur Greer, a violent man with sexual abuse convictions; the abduction and murder of three-year-old Cheryl Grimmer.

programme.title: Inside Crime
programme.desc: Featuring a focus on two female scammers, revealing the crazy lies that were told, the lengths they went to for money and the lives they destroyed in the process.

programme.title: A Life in Crime: Jackie Malton
programme.desc: Retired DCI Jackie Malton tells the story of her rise to become one of the most respected police detectives of her generation and the inspiration for the hit TV drama 'Prime Suspect'.

channel.desc: TRUE CRIME UK dissects authentic criminal cases through expert-led documentaries and series. Through first-hand interviews, key evidence, cutting-edge forensic technologies and investigative tools.
