programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Good to the Last Bite
programme.desc: As the final week of tuna fishing begins, the Hard Merchandise, the Bounty Hunter, the Tuna.Com and the Odysea steam out together, each captain vowing to catch the biggest tuna before the season ends.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: The Bite is On
programme.desc: Meet the fleet, as peak season begins and the adrenaline rush of \\"monstah\\" hunting hits Gloucester.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Payback's a Fish
programme.desc: After going bust on his last trip and coming home empty-handed, Marciano of Hard Merchandise now wrestles with the trials of being a husband and father who has to be away from home so often.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Weekend Warriors
programme.desc: Tuna.com continues its winning streak, catching two fish in one day while the rest of the fleet struggles to even find a spot to fish in between the weekend recreational boaters.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Size Matters
programme.desc: Meet Kevin and the Christina, a boat that gets its own real-life fish story when it snags an 1,100-pound \\"monstah\\" right out of the gate.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Greed, Ego & Jealousy
programme.desc: After watching the Christina catch the biggest tuna of the season, the uber-competitive Captain Dave of the Tuna.com is obsessed with beating the record, and catching a fish bigger than 1,075 lbs!

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Mann gegen Sturm
programme.desc: Marciano, captain of Hard Merchandise, risks the elements to hook a giant bluefin and finds himself with boat trouble in the midst of the storm.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Mutiny at Sea
programme.desc: A mixture of bad luck and mutiny brews in this tumultuous episode of Wicked Tuna. Tensions erupt on New England's top tuna boat, Tuna.Com, when Captain Dave and Paul get into a heated confrontation that causes Paul to quit!

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Grudge Match
programme.desc: With just two weeks left until the end of tuna fishing season, Bounty Hunter gains a new deckhand.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Captain Ralph in Not
programme.desc: A hard season with little money to show has taken its toll on the crew of the Odysea, leading Captain Ralph to lash out at his first mate Pirate.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Good to the Last Bite
programme.desc: As the final week of tuna fishing begins, the Hard Merchandise, the Bounty Hunter, the Tuna.Com and the Odysea steam out together, each captain vowing to catch the biggest tuna before the season ends.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Back In The Hunt

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Go Fish!
programme.desc: The fishermen of Gloucester, Massachusetts, battle for the elusive and lucrative giant Bluefin tuna, with harpooners going up against rod-and-reelers.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: The Numbers War
programme.desc: The fishermen of Gloucester battle for prime fishing spots in their quest to catch the elusive and lucrative Bluefin Tuna.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Fish Fight
programme.desc: For the tuna fishermen of Gloucester, Massachusetts, it's tournament time, and, with a big cash prize up for grabs, the fight is on to catch the biggest bluefin.

channel.desc: Teams of salty fishermen battle the elements, and each other, to land the biggest bluefine tuna in this gripping reality series.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Northside Rapist
programme.desc: A string of rapes spanning two decades goes unsolved in Jacksonville, Florida, until Detective Diana Clarke finds a link among the crimes and discovers that a serial rapist is terrorizing the community.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Fatal Error
programme.desc: When a family outing in the mountains of picturesque Oregon ended with Joyce Boyd’s fatal fall off a 75-foot cliff, authorities called it an accident; that is, until they delved deeper into their investigation.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Defenseless Victim
programme.desc: The disappearance of seven-year-old Amanda Brown from her Florida home sparks a massive search effort by dozens of law enforcement agencies and hundreds of concerned citizens.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Every Parent's Nightmare
programme.desc: This episode recounts a heinous crime that is every parent's nightmare, the death of a child. On an autumn evening in November 1998, a man randomly killed a 9-year-old boy in a public bathroom in southern California.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: A Question of Sanity
programme.desc: A shoot-out in a church in Northern Virginia leads authorities to the home of an ex-FBI agent out for revenge. Investigators begin to understand the scope and complexity of the man’s scheme to get back at his estranged wife.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Fallen Friend
programme.desc: An evening of pick-up basketball in Houston turns tragic when prosecutor Gil Epstein is murdered in a community center parking lot. Investigators depend on anonymous tips and hazy eyewitness accounts to track down a killer.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Deadly Revenge
programme.desc: In the early ‘80s in southern Florida, a major war was declared on illegal drugs. One of the champions of that war was Assistant State Attorney Gene Berry.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Lone Witness

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Wounded
programme.desc: A teen is eating breakfast when his dad starts stabbing himself. As the investigation unfolds, police begin to doubt the story. Dr. G must determine if this was a suicide or a murder.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Life Interrupted

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: On The Run
programme.desc: Teenagers stumble across a horrifying car fire on the side of a desolate stretch of roadway. When the police arrive, they pull severely burned human remains from the driver’s seat.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Crossing The Line
programme.desc: A teacher excuses himself for a nap after dinner, but he never wakes up. The man has a complex medical history that leads Dr. G on a hunt for an explanation for his mysterious death.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Death on the Road
programme.desc: A man is found dead in a motel room due to multiple shotgun wounds. Dr. G proves the scene isn’t what it seems.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Poison Control

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Dying to Be Young

channel.desc: Get deep into the world's most shocking crimes 24/7 on Pluto TV Investigation.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Destructive Power
programme.desc: Galvatron is growing and tethered to Cybertron by strands of Superenergon. Kicker and some Omnicons cut the strands. Ironhide and Scorponok battle, and Galvatron heads into space, but not towards Alpha Q's planet.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Spark
programme.desc: Big Galvatron vs. Big Optimus Prime. Lots of little battles with all the others too. Kicker gets sappy with Misha before going to destroy Unicron's “puny” remains, but something's not quite right…

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: The Sun
programme.desc: Unicron is the “force that drives the universe” and Primus uses the super energon, the autobots band together and give their combination sparks to Optimus, Galvatron wakes/becomes Unicron again.

programme.title: Transformers: Prime: Operation: Breakdown

channel.desc: WELCOME TO THE INCREDIBLE UNIVERSE OF TRANSFORMERS. It is a universe of constant change, where nothing is as it seems. A universe where incredible, shape-shifting, sentient, living robots hide in plain sight, disguised as vehicles and beasts, and battle

programme.title: Survivorman: Northern Ontario
programme.desc: Temagami is home of some of the oldest rocks on the face of the planet, old growth pine forests, clear deep lakes, and boasts artifacts and stone drawings dating as far back as 6000 B.C.

programme.title: Survivorman: Fighting To Survive
programme.desc: Les Stroud, TV's Survivorman, will teach Elias the ways of survival. However, he won't teach him everything he needs to know.

programme.title: Survivorman: Grenada Jungle
programme.desc: Les pits his jungle survival skills against the incredibly diverse mountain jungle terrain of Grenada's largest active mountain, Mt. St. Catherine.

programme.title: Survivorman: Tonga
programme.desc: Les strands himself on a deserted island in the archipelago of Tonga with a long-time friend to relive the story of marooned sailors.

programme.title: Survivorman: Utah Canyonlands
programme.desc: Stroud will cannibalize the mountain-bike he has ridden into the middle of nowhere. He also has a multi-tool, a magnesium flint stick and an old energy bar that he uses for a purpose other than eating

programme.title: Survivorman: Tonga
programme.desc: Les strands himself on purpose, accompanied by his long-time survival buddy Bob Wilson, on a deserted island in the Kingdom of Tonga.

programme.title: Survivorman: Argentina

programme.title: Survivorman: Survivorman & Son Tofino
programme.desc: Les and his 16-year-old son Logan find themselves trapped without supplies and without a way home while sea kayaking along the coastline of British Columbia.

programme.title: Survivorman: Temagami Forest
programme.desc: Les returns to the oldest mountain ranges in North America, The forests of Ontario's Temagami, to survive for ten days with no food, no water, no shelter, no safety and no camera crew. Facing the dangers of packs of wolves and vigilant moose.

programme.title: Survivorman: Indonesia Mentawai

programme.title: Survivorman: Papua New Guinea

programme.title: Survivorman: Legend of Klemtu Hill

programme.title: Survivorman: Tierra del Fuego

programme.title: Survivorman: Kalahari

channel.desc: Outdoorsman and survival expert Les Stroud permits himself to be stranded for a week in a remote location with no equipment or supplies apart from his one-man camera rig, documenting his experience and providing insight into how to manage the wilderness.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Phillip Rouss Jr had it all family, friends and a thriving business. Until his health began to deteriorate. Tests revealed he was being poisoned, but by whom?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a six year old disappeared, her father was the prime suspect. He failed a polygraph test, and even confessed, but ten years on the investigation was turned on its head.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The discovery of a woman's naked body, covered with bruises, leaves no doubt that she was the victim of foul play. Investigators erect a makeshift tent around the body and use Super Glue fumes to lift the killer's palm print from the victim's skin.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a Texas man's mail order bride disappeared, it was suspicious. When it was revealed his two previous wives both died in mysterious circumstances, it was murder.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: An elderly couple were bludgeoned to death in their home, with no suspects found. Years later, a pawn shop owner made a chance discovery that led directly to the killer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a nine year old girl was taken from her home and murdered, forensic scientists uncovered a trail to a suspect who was the same man who anonymously called 911.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The disappearance of a young woman leads police to a man with a criminal history, but with no body, there can be no arrest until they discover a charred tooth.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A wealthy woman died suddenly, but investigators were stumped, with evidence of foul play. Until the ex-wife of the bereaved husband called to make suspicious claims.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A rich elderly woman is murdered, her home ransacked. A trail of blood is left on the stairs. Investigators life prints, but only hunt the killer down 16 years later.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In Miami, a sniper opened fire from the roof of a factory. When police found the gun, the serial number had been scratched off. How did they trace the killer?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a serial killer was terrorising the city of St Louis, the FBI didn't need lab tests, fingerprints of any of the usual methods. All they needed was a computer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Using geographical profiling, investigators close in on a serial rapist, and a cleverly obtained DNA sample confirms their suspicions.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a mother becomes ill while travelling in an airplane, the toxic substance specialist seated next to her suspects her home might be making her and her family sick.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The murder of a respected surgeon in a waterfront apartment community left police in St Petersburg, Florida baffled. Who would have wanted the doctor dead?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Bob Dorotik's body was found on a mountain road near his ranch. His wife told police that Bob had gone jogging and never returned, but investigators had their doubts.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Sheila Bryan was convicted of killing her own mother in a car fire, and sentenced to life in prison. Uncover the story of her appeal for freedom.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When Shari Faye Smith was abducted by her murderer, her family received a letter he'd forced her to write, entitled last will and testament. Could the police catch her killer?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a Massachusetts man dropped dead of an apparent heart attack, the case pitted teams of toxicologists against each other, trying to find out if it was murder.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a hairdresser is murdered in her salon, evidence fails to convict a suspect. The case goes cold for ten years, until a mysterious witness finally speaks up.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police investigate the possibility of a hate crime when two women go missing and are later found murdered.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: An 18-month-old skeleton found on marshland puts forensics to the ultimate test. But with no name and no face, how much can computer construction help a case?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Having bagged-up the evidence and thrown it into a river, a multi-murderer is shocked to hear police have recovered it. But is there enough in the bag for them to convict a killer?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In a tragic twist of fate, a woman is found dead just days after she sold her home and moved out. Find out if she anticipated an attack, and who had wanted her dead.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Real crimes are solved using medical techniques. When a security guard disappeared it took a year to find his body.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When three students are brutally murdered close to campus, investigators must determine what the women had in common before their serial killer strikes again.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police get a big break when Mother Nature aids their investigation into the murder of a woman at her business.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: An eyewitness to a real estate agent's murder is put under forensic hypnosis in an attempt to help him recall the killer's face.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police launch a search for a killer after a teenager returns home to find his father's body in a pool of blood. Footprints in the snow outside may be crucial to the case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A pathologist examining the death of a politician who was running for re-election finds tiny puncture wounds at the autopsy.

channel.desc: This long-running iconic true crime series examines the extraordinary forensic techniques used to catch some of America’s most infamous murderers, featuring expert testimony and reconstructions to reveal how science helps resolve criminal convictions.

programme.title: Giant Constructions: Road Bridges
programme.desc: Road bridges: gigantic constructions of modern road traffic. Europa and Ganter Bridge, Öresund bridge, Sunshine Skyway and Viaduct de Millau.

programme.title: Giant Constructions: Moving Bridges
programme.desc: Moving Bridges: Exotic milestones on moveable infrastructure. Historically significant: the Kaiser Wilhelm Bridge and the Michigan Avenue bridge. Mechanically unique: the Pont Jacques, the Gateshead Millennium Bridge or the Scale Lane Bridge.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Spanning the Saigon River
programme.desc: In Ho Chi Minh City (formerly known as Saigon), engineers are on a mission to modernize. Construction is underway to raise Phu My Bridge, a brand-new $100 million cable-stayed bridge.

programme.title: Mega Builders: World's Biggest Wave Machine
programme.desc: On the resort island of Tenerife, just off the coast of North Africa, a small army of designers and labourers are building what will be the largest man-made surfing wave in history - and one of the most ambitious waterparks ever conceived.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Floating Bridge
programme.desc: Engineers had no choice. They had to build a "floating bridge" in Kelowna, British Columbia. Lake Okanagan was too deep and too muddy to sink columns to support a standard bridge.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Glitz City
programme.desc: In Las Vegas -- the quintessential city of razzle-dazzle and bling -- MGM is going for the ultimate one-upmanship.

programme.title: Mega Builders: The Big Rig
programme.desc: The Aker H6e is the biggest oil rig on the planet – built for the extreme conditions of the Barents Sea. Marine operations chief Knut Engebretsen and his team have tight deadlines for some major moves to put this monster together.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Big Bosphorus Dig
programme.desc: Weary commuters in Istanbul, Turkey must tough it out after the Marmaray Project is delayed four years by the discovery of the city's fourth century port with thirty-four ancient shipwrecks.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Extreme Elevation
programme.desc: An international team of the best construction engineers on the planet are building the world's tallest skyscraper in the United Arab Emirate city of Dubai.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Hard Rock Park
programme.desc: In Myrtle Beach, South Carolina a team of engineers have just one year to build the world’s first Rock and Roll theme park, Hard Rock Park.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: Which was the invention that propelled the construction of higher and higher buildings? Concrete? Iron? It's the elevator. From the Tower of Babel to the Kingdom Tower in Saudi Arabia, humankind has always searched to build bigger and higher.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: 70% of the earth's surface is covered by water and much of the history of man's discovery of the earth is linked to oceans. From the fragile boats which sailed along the Mediterranean coasts to the majestic ships which sailed off to the New World.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: How are gravity defying bridges designed? For centuries there have been countless and huge advances in the field of civil engineering. Thanks to the explanations of leading, the viewer plunges into a world of inventions.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: For centuries there have been countless and huge advances in the field of civil engineering. Thanks to the explanations of leading experts in physics, maths and other hard sciences. In this film we look at the masters of rail.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: To fly... A dream that has shaped the history of humanity. A story of crazy flyers - inventors, scientists - pursuing their dream, often risking their lives doing so. Matthieu Barreau went in search of these intrepid pioneers.

channel.desc: Join us on Pluto TV Big Builds as we celebrate the world's most gigantic marvels of engineering! Get ready for a massive line-up of shows that delve into the biggest, most complex and most dangerous building projects in the world.

channel.desc: A factual documentary channel following police units as they serve and protect within their communities.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bullet Proof
programme.desc: Andy’s romance with Det. Luke Callaghan gets complicated when he chooses her for a special assignment -serving a search warrant for a bullet lodged in the head of a witness to murder.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Hot & Bothered
programme.desc: A severe heat wave wreaks havoc on the city, forcing the rookies to work around the clock to keep the peace. In the midst of the chaos, Andy discovers that a serial rapist may have resurfaced to prey on vulnerable teenage girls.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Honour Roll
programme.desc: After their High School Outreach assignment goes awry, Andy and Chris stumble on the victim of avicious beating behind a nightclub.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girlfriend of the Year
programme.desc: After a routine speed trap leads to a messy accident on a city highway, Chris and Gail find one of the cars mysteriously empty and quickly realize that itslicense plate matches the one being broadcast in a citywide “Amber Alert”

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Big Nickel
programme.desc: Andy’s attempt to avoid Swarek is thwarted whenbothare assigned to a prisoner transport. When things go awry and theinmate breaks loose, the two officers are led on a cat-and-mouse foot chase through the meandering woods.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: To Serve or Protect
programme.desc: What was to be a routine day for Andy is abruptly put on holdwhen herex-copper father, Tommy, confesses that he might have committed a serious crime during one of his alcohol-induced blackouts

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Judgment Day
programme.desc: There’s a nervous tension in the air on Judgment Day for all therookies at 15 Division who will have to undergo make-or-break assessments by Staff Sergeant Frank.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Takedown
programme.desc: Andy and Chris accidentally screw up one of the biggest drug busts of the decade when they arrest one of the players. In an effort to save the operation, Swarek and Andy go undercover to make the drug buy.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Butterflies
programme.desc: Andy's world explodes when a fresh-faced university student is killed in a random shooting, and a bullet hits Andy, lodging in her vest.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Might Have Been
programme.desc: Everyone's living their “might-have-beens.” Andy and Gail go undercover as cocktail waitresses to clean up a drug-infested club, but get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bad Moon
programme.desc: As a full moon hangs over the city, the rookies are unnerved by a series of strange occurrences. While investigating the theft of three severed heads, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a mentally unstable man who has stopped taking his medication

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart & Sparks
programme.desc: As 15 Division recovers from the shooting of Det. Luke Callaghan, a series of arsons culminates in the torching of a laundromat – and the rookies are forced to confront their own burning issues.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Stung
programme.desc: Using a local car dealership, 15 Division runs a sting operation to crack down on suspects with outstanding warrants. One of the criminals they capture tries to bargain for a lighter sentence

programme.title: Rookie Blue: In Plain View
programme.desc: When a police informant is found murdered, 15 Division sets its sights on finding a weak link in the notoriously brutal East Jameson gang. Andy has to work closely with Detective Jo Rosati, a woman who seems far too interested in Andy’s fiancé, Luke.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: When a woman gets brutally attacked in the same manner as deceased rookie cop Zoe Martinelli. Det. Luke Callaghan is convinced that it’s the same suspect.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Monster
programme.desc: After a seemingly drunken man collapses in the barn, 15 Division is put under quarantine. Andy and Swarek work together to find the accomplice of a dyed blue bank robber

channel.desc: Serve. Protect. Don’t screw up. At the police academy they trained, fought, drank and slept together. Now they’re on the job together. They’re ready to brave anything on the job; it’s only their personal lives that could use the back-up.

programme.title: Good Night, and Good Luck.
programme.desc: CBS newsman Edward R. Murrow (David Strathairn) criticizes Sen. Joseph McCarthy's tactics in the 1950s, with the backing of producer Fred Friendly (George Clooney).

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: British Prime Minister Winston Churchill clashes with his political opponents as D-Day nears in June 1944. Clementine, his devoted wife, tries to prevent his physical, mental and spiritual collapse while inspiring him to achieve greatness.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Washington, D.C., journalist Stephen Glass (Hayden Christensen) swiftly falls from grace when the news breaks that many of his stories were fabricated.

programme.title: The Cat's Meow
programme.desc: Movie producer Thomas Ince (Cary Elwes) dies after yachting with William Randolph Hearst (Edward Herrmann), Charlie Chaplin and Marion Davies (Kirsten Dunst).

programme.title: Winchester
programme.desc: To an outsider, Sarah Winchester's 7-story home looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah's actually building a prison -- an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts that have a score to settle with her family.

programme.title: American Psycho 2
programme.desc: Obsessed with serial killers, a college student (Mila Kunis) resorts to murder in order to become a professor's teaching assistant.

programme.title: Winchester
programme.desc: To an outsider, Sarah Winchester's 7-story home looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah's actually building a prison -- an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts that have a score to settle with her family.

programme.title: The Cat's Meow
programme.desc: Movie producer Thomas Ince (Cary Elwes) dies after yachting with William Randolph Hearst (Edward Herrmann), Charlie Chaplin and Marion Davies (Kirsten Dunst).

channel.desc: The MovieSphere Channel is serving up an endless stream of top-quality movies, from blockbuster hits to cult classics and everything in between.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Apparition
programme.desc: Liam investigates the suspicious death of a banker, which he saw in a dream. It seems to be an exiled Taelon spirit that is contacting him. Da'an berates Zo'or for his money and power hungry attitude.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: One Taelon Avenue
programme.desc: Joshua Doors is running his own technology development company and Renee goes undercover to find out what is going on. An artificial intelligence program of the Taelons that controls human minds seems to be acting on its own.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Abduction
programme.desc: A volunteer who was working to interpret an ancient message from Ma'el assaults Da'an and escapes through a portal. Sandoval helps Da'an avoid interrogation from Zo'or while they try to locate her.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Arrival
programme.desc: A Taelon shuttle is shot down over Antarctica. There are Jiridians aboard, but two of the passengers escape. When Augur discovers Lili's blood on the ship, he is convinced that she is not dead.

programme.title: The Lost World: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: Malone is pierced by a poison dart from a Keeran blowdart. Under the influence of the hallucinogenic poison, Malone relives his nightmarish experience as a battlefield correspondent in WWI.

programme.title: The Lost World: Ice Age
programme.desc: A new Ice Age threatens the ecosystem. The explorers investigate the site of a meteor crash and try to help a woman. Not knowing who she is, they are targeted by her cold-blooded subjects.

programme.title: The Lost World: The End Game
programme.desc: The intractable Death comes to settle her score with Lord Roxton. In a series of games, Roxton plays Death in an attempt to keep his life, as well as the lives of his friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: Phantoms
programme.desc: Veronica is led by the sound of piano music into the arms of a lover from a bygone era. Ignoring Challenger's warnings about her involvement with him, she falls quickly for her new beau.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Secret
programme.desc: An assassin threatens the explorers, and Marguerite fears that he may be linked to her past and come to settle old scores. The secret she tries to bury creates a rift between herself and Roxton.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Revelations Pt 2
programme.desc: In the season finale of Sanctuary, The Five, led by Magnus, attempt to find the secret labyrinth in the decimated city of Bhalasaam. Once located, they must complete a series of cryptic tests that can only be achieved using the powers of The Five.

programme.title: Sanctuary: End of Nights Pt 1
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus continues her desperate search for her daughter, Ashley, who is still held prisoner by the Cabal. Together, Magnus and John Druitt interrogate their most elusive contacts.

programme.title: Sanctuary: End of Nights Pt 2
programme.desc: Still reeling from their violent encounter with the transformed Ashley, Helen Magnus is determined to find answers about the Cabal and their plans for her daughter

programme.title: Sanctuary: Eulogy
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus and the team are still recuperating from the Cabal attacks that devastatingly took down so many Sanctuaries around the world.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Hero
programme.desc: An unlikely superhero with unprecedented strength and the amazing ability to fly, is thwarting crime - and Sanctuary missions - throughout the city.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Pavor Nocturnus
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus wakes up on the floor of the Sanctuary with no recollection of why or how she got there.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fragments
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus fights to save the life of one of the Sanctuary’s research scientists who was viciously attacked by a seemingly docile Abnormal.

channel.desc: More TV Sci-fi brings you even more aliens, spaceships and downright weirdness to satisfy your sci-fi cravings!

programme.title: Hopkinsville: The Alien Goblins
programme.desc: A family fights off goblin-aliens in a mysterious encounter, sparking debates and investigations. Fear drives their actions.

programme.title: Close Encounters: Proof of Alien Contact
programme.desc: This documentary examines whether UFOs are real. It studies over 250 amateur video clips, evaluates several recent revelations about Roswell, and examines footage of the removal of an alien implant.

programme.title: Aliens in the USSR
programme.desc: Unsolved Soviet Union Alien Mysteries: Dyatlov Pass incident, Petrozavodsk miracle, Voronezh case. Amaze and frighten, but doubt of alien involvement.

programme.title: Deep Sea Aliens
programme.desc: Explore the mysteries of the deep sea: underwater anomalies, alien abductions, USOs, and unexplained cases that defy our understanding.

programme.title: Authentic Photographs of an Alien: The Caponi Case
programme.desc: Caponi's encounters with aliens from 1993. Real photos showcase extraterrestrial life.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens : Origin of Humanity
programme.desc: Increasing evidence and sightings of UFOs suggest contact with extraterrestrial beings who may have influenced the origins of human life.

programme.title: Aliens Among Us: The Michael Wolf Theory
programme.sub-title: Aliens Among Us : The Michael Wolf Theory
programme.desc: Michael K. Wolf shares 30 years of insights on UFOs, aliens, government projects, and crop circles.

programme.title: The UFO Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: 1942 LA: A mysterious UFO causes blackout & artillery fire. Remains unexplained.

programme.title: Ancient Alien America
programme.desc: Native cultures have handed down shocking accounts for generations of Aliens from other worlds visiting Earth in the ancient past and their involvement with them.

programme.title: 27 Alien Encounters
programme.desc: Strange and bizarre UFO encounters abound, but recent Alien encounters by highly credible eyewitnesses are so unusual and perplexing that they challenge our understanding of physics and the Universe as we know it.

programme.title: Confessions Of An Alien Abductee
programme.desc: Chantelle, Marie and Simon are all alien abductees. These ordinary people share their extraordinary stories as they seek help through the curiously named Anomalous Mind Management Abductee Contactee Helpline, or AMMACH.

channel.desc: Learn the shocking truth about extraterrestrial beings on planet Earth and join 'Ancient Aliens' star Philip Coppens, top scientists and military strategists who dramatize what would happen if and when aliens attack. Watch now on Pluto TV Alien Invasion!

programme.title: 1 vs. 100 UK: Episode 3
programme.desc: On the last show David missed out on a golden chance to take home over £14000 after choosing not to bail. Will this be the week when someone manages to go all the way and win big?

programme.title: 1 vs. 100 UK: Episode 8
programme.desc: Will the new one have what it takes to beat the 100 and win big money?

programme.title: 1 vs. 100 UK: Episode 4
programme.desc: Dermot O'Leary is back in the first of a new series of this popular quiz show in which one hopeful contestant takes on 100 opponents in a bid to win serious cash.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Transformation
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Derek Lloyd go to the Peruvian jungle to look for the Paracelsus scrolls which contain the formula for turning lead into gold.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Flag Day
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Larivee, California to find the Pioneer's Bear Flag.

programme.title: Renegade: South of 98
programme.desc: Reno searches for a fugitive gang member in a violent African-American neighborhood. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Hostage
programme.desc: When Reno locates Hound Adams, the man who can prove his innocence, the two become hostages threatened by a pair of psychotic robbers at a bar. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Rabbit Redux
programme.desc: Reno's romantic vacation with Leeza Bendetti is disrupted when their mountain cabin is targeted by a gang of vengeful drug suppliers. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: The Posse
programme.desc: Reno, Bobby and Cheyenne protect a fugitive bank robber falsely accused of murdering a sheriff's wife. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Once Burned, Twice Chey
programme.desc: Influenced by her romantic attraction to a former teacher accused of murdering his wife, Cheyenne asks Reno and Bobby to help prove his innocence. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Sheriff Reno
programme.desc: Despite the risk of exposing his true identity, Reno accepts a temporary job as the sheriff of a small town besieged by a pair of vengeful brothers. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: Renegade: Murderer's Row
programme.desc: Reno and Bobby compete against the best bounty hunters in the country when a wealthy entrepreneur offers a million dollars for the return of a microprocessor stolen by a traitorous executive. Starring: Lorenzo Lamas, Kathleen Kinmont

programme.title: The Shooter
programme.desc: A CIA agent gets caught up in political intrigue after he gets brought in to solve the murder of a Cuban ambassador.

programme.title: Reprisal
programme.desc: A veteran looks to raise money for his son's healthcare by teaming up with another vet to track down criminals.

programme.title: Mercenary: Absolution
programme.desc: John is a man who does bad things to bad people. Chi is his partner – the only man ever allowed to leave the Triads. When John and Chi accept a job in Eastern Europe, they unearth a Human Trafficking ring run by The Boss, and an explosive battle results.

programme.title: Kill Zone
programme.desc: The shadow of war follows a troubled Iraq War vet as he is forced to pursue one of his own into the Pacific Northwest wilderness to finally confront a war crime that has haunted them both.

channel.desc: It’s time to go into overdrive by jumping off buildings, flying a burning plane, driving in a car chase and saving the world. Pluto TV Action brings you blockbusters, stars, and a strong dose of high-octane excitement.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Pad'ar
programme.desc: Pad'ar is a fierce battle game where spectators can connect via a "jack patch" that Liam suspects is causing neurological damage to users. When a Pad'ar warrior dies, it raises even more questions about the safety.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: In Memory
programme.desc: Lili wakes up, supposedly on Earth after a coma, and is told the Jaridians have come and conquered the Taelons. She remembers Sandoval telling her she no longer has and Earth-based physiology and believes things are not as they seem.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Cloister
programme.desc: Zo'or and Da'an travel to a cloister for an energy sharing ceremony, but one of the sisters is killed and everyone is a suspect.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Interview
programme.desc: Zo'or agrees to do a live television interview to try to endear himself to humans, but the show's producer has an ulterior motive in getting him in front of a camera.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keep Your Enemies Closer
programme.desc: The shuttle Liam and Zo'or are in crashes over wilderness, but survive in safety bubbles. The people they meet live off the earth and know nothing of the Taelons. However, Zo'or is injured and missing a Synod meeting on the mother ship.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Subterfuge
programme.desc: Sandoval has a mole attempting to gain information about Liam - particularly concerning his commitment to the Taelons. When a Taelon and protector are killed in a portal that malfunctions, Liam is suspicious that it was intentional.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Bombings begin at embassies and Liam believes they may reignite the SI (Sino-Indian) War, which ended with an armistice several years before. An old intelligence agency friend of Renee's has interesting holographic technology.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Liam Kincaid races against the clock to find Zo'or, who disappears after contracting an ancient Taelon virus that has the potential to cause a devastating plague.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Through Your Eyes
programme.desc: Zo'or kidnaps a comatose policeman in order to use the man's body as a 'vessel' in a consciousness transfer experiment that will allow him to 'test' the human survival instinct and cause havoc on Earth.

programme.title: Magical Adventures in the Forbidden City
programme.desc: In another world Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed years ago because of a disease. She takes us on a magical adventure, rising against the forces in command and shows how being brave and following your heart can show anything is possible.

programme.title: The Survivor
programme.desc: After mankind moves into space, the old planet Earth is forgotten, a polluted wasteland where only expelled prisoners still survive. Starring: Xavier Declie, Richard Moll, Lisa Robin Kelly, Vito LoGrasso, Richard Herd

programme.title: Antiviral
programme.desc: Syd works for a company that sells viruses harvested from sick celebrities but after becoming infected by the virus that killed a superstar, he must unravel the mystery to save his life.

programme.title: A.I. Rising
programme.desc: The relationship between a human and android spirals out of control with shocking consequences.

channel.desc: Explore the farthest reaches of space, battle evil robots, and travel through time on Pluto TV Sci-Fi, the mothership for the best science fiction and fantasy movies in the galaxy, beaming up to you 24 hours a day.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 1
programme.desc: Tonight’s celebrity adventurers are Steve Jones, Scarlett Moffatt, David Coulthard, Jodie Kidd & Joey Essex.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 9
programme.desc: This week the Hauxwell tackle the maze with remarkable results. How bad can it get in the maze? You’re about to find out…

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 14
programme.desc: This week it’s the turn of a team of midwives to face the maze. These five feisty females prove how important communication is, by demonstrating the consequences of not listening to each other.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 4
programme.desc: Tonight's team, Let's Get Medical, are a group of medical students. Your lives may soon be in their hands. You may have concerns after witnessing this lot attempt to tackle the mighty maze.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 11
programme.desc: This week’s team are Black Ice, an AC/DC tribute band from Newcastle. Will they rock the maze or will the physical, mystery, skill and mental challenges prove to be a highway to hell?

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 3
programme.desc: Maze Master Richard Ayoade leads The Holmes Family around the maze as they attempt to win precious crystals and not have a major falling out.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 5
programme.desc: Tonight's team are called The Vikings because they spend most of their spare time living like Vikings. As they travel through the zones they'll be answering the question, 'can you ever have too much testosterone in a room'?

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 5
programme.desc: In tonight’s show a team called The Cheerleaders, five disproportionately excitable young ladies, hope enthusiasm will help them in their quest through the maze.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 15
programme.desc: The Ali Family are arguably the strongest team on paper ever to face the maze. Will they score a perfect ten in the zones?

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 2
programme.desc: The Air Cadets bring a bravado bonanza to the maze this week. They begin the night predicting big things, but will they deliver?

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 13
programme.desc: In tonight’s show we see a team of police officers hoping to lay down the law in the maze…but will they end up locked behind bars?

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 3
programme.desc: This week Team features a player who took part in the original series twenty six years ago. She won both her games back then…will her 100% record remain intact?

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 8
programme.desc: This week’s team of Welsh hopefuls met working at Pizza Hut. How will they cope with the maze when some of their team appear to have no concept of urgency?

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 4
programme.desc: Tonight’s team are huge fans of the original series and have engaged in intensive research on how to tackle the challenges ahead. Sometimes all the preparation in the world can be utterly pointless.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 6
programme.desc: In tonight’s show Team Well Read and Underfed, a group of plucky students, attempt to take on the maze. Will they graduate with honours?

programme.title: The Crystal Maze: Episode 10
programme.desc: Tonight’s team met on jury service and are looking to deliver justice in the dome. They may have high hopes, but the maze is a law unto itself.

channel.desc: Maze Master guides a team of five intrepid adventurers on an epic gameshow adventure through four fantastical zones.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Mob Knives
programme.desc: The Staten Island spouses return. Renee receives a letter from Junior and fears she and AJ are being targeted, and Drita and Big Ang attempt to settle an on-going feud.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Joe's newest girlfriend is introduced to Carla, and the duo explain their serious relationship. Drita is unsure whether to take her kids to visit their father in prison.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Threats And Thongs
programme.desc: Renee is in shock after she opens a malicious letter from Junior. Ramona is scared about her boy-friend's upcoming court appearance.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Of Vice And Men
programme.desc: Drita decides that it's time to go visit Lee in prison with their daughters. Carla goes on with her life while Joe is preparing to terminate his marriage with Carla.

programme.title: Mob Wives: The Gathering Storm
programme.desc: Ramona is forced to finally confront Drita over a birthday party invitation. Renee tries to turn a corner at rehab but has a hard time letting go of her anger.

programme.title: Mob Wives: After The Storm
programme.desc: The aftermath of Hurricane Sandy lands on the Mob wives' doorstep. Overwhelmed by the storm's devastation, they make efforts to help each other and their neighbours.

programme.title: Mob Wives: No Love Lost
programme.desc: Drita discusses Lee's surprise release from prison, and Karen and Ramona get wind of Lee's return to town. Meanwhile, Renee returns from her spell at rehab.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Time And Punishment
programme.desc: Ramona reveals her secret engagement to Karen. Meanwhile, Drita celebrates her newfound romance, and sparks fly between Karen and her slick studio partner.

channel.desc: Welcome to Staten Island, the land of fierce women who never admit to being allegedly "connected" - until now. Left alone to pick up the pieces, these women face the harsh realities of "life" after informants have turned their families' lives upside down.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The story of the tragic murder of Brett Wentworth, how police tracked his killer down and how advanced forensic technology was key to solving the case.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: When Wendy Speakes was found dead wearing a strangers' shoes, police launched an investigation into who could have murdered a well-loved member of a quiet community.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.sub-title: The Murders of Sharon, Zarah and Nadia Whelan
programme.desc: Sharon Whelan and her two daughters were murdered in their home on Christmas eve by a cold and calculating killer. Multi-discipline forensics uncovered his horrific actions and brought him to justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.sub-title: The Murder of Imette St Guillen
programme.desc: The Murder of Imette St Guillen explores the hours and events leading up to her horrific death and the large-scale police investigation that identified her killer.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: In February 2012, a man got into a pick-up truck at a mall close to his home and was never seen alive again. Nine months later, after a huge search was launched, police discovered his human remains.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: December 2000: 19-year-old Rachel Manning was murdered in Milton Keynes. Two men were wrongfully convicted, but new advances in forensics proved that evil always leaves a trace.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: When the body of a child is found, Boston State Police have no leads, but with the help of the National Centre for Missing and Exploited Children, a trace is found.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Edinburgh, October 1977: Christine Eadie and Helen Scott vanish without a trace. The police never stopped hunting for justice, even changing the law to bring justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Tracie Andrews purportedly witnessed the murder of her boyfriend, Lee Harvey, in a country lane on the night of 1st December 1996; but all was not what it seemed.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: In late 1992, an attack led to an investigation which would last nearly a quarter of a century. Over time, DNA profiling helped to close a case which detectives feared would never be solved.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: By September 1973, with three murders in just three months, South Wales Police realised they were looking for Wales' first documented serial killer.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: After body parts were found in a Dublin city canal, a broad forensic investigation was needed to identify the victim, and lead police to those responsible.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The murder investigation surrounding the death of a young, defenceless woman led police to another case, where the science of DNA profiling helped to unravel the truth.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Beverly Therrien and her two lodgers were found beaten to death and despite the killer's careful planning, investigators identified and linked him to the crime.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The tragic murder of Brenda Dupont went unsolved for 28 years until the determined officers involved in the case brought the perpetrator to justice using advanced forensic techniques.

channel.desc: The series relives some landmark criminal cases of recent times where these new and innovative investigative techniques have changed the course of the investigations and dramatically assisted detectives in bringing the guilty to justice.

programme.desc: Free Hat: Kyle, Stan, Cartman & Tweek get angry about Steven Spielberg and George Lucas' habit of altering their films with each "re-re-re-release". They go on a mission to steal the movies.(S6, E09)

programme.title: South Park: Bebe's B**bs Destroy Society
programme.desc: Bebe's B**bs Destroy Society: Returning from school break, all the boys notice something different about Bebe... out comes the primitive man as they fight to see who'll play with her! (S6, E10)

programme.title: South Park: A Ladder to Heaven
programme.desc: A Ladder To Heaven: The boys break into the McKormick house to try and find a winning ticket. Whilst there Cartman mistakenly drinks Kenny's ashes and starts to have some strange visions... (S6, E12)

programme.title: South Park: The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers
programme.desc: The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers: The boys are dressed up in full 'Middle Earth' gear, and are sent on a quest by Randy to deliver a video to Butter's parents. (S6, E13)

programme.title: South Park: The Death Camp of Tolerance
programme.desc: The Death Camp of Tolerance: Mr. Garrison does what he can to get fired for being gay so he can sue the school for millions of dollars. (S6, E14)

programme.title: South Park: The Biggest Douche in the...
programme.desc: The Biggest Douche in the Universe: Cartman is rushed to hospital after again being possessed by Kenny. Chef believes a TV psychic can help but Stan isn't so sure... (S6, E15)

programme.title: South Park: My Future Self n' Me
programme.desc: My Future Self 'n' Me: After meeting his failed self from the future, Stan decides to avoid drink and drugs - but why does Butters also have a good-for-nothing future self staying with him? (S6, E16)

programme.title: South Park: Red Sleigh Down
programme.desc: Red Sleigh Down: Cartman's 'naughty or nice' accountant informs him that he has been too bad to earn his Christmas gift. All aboard Mr Hankey's Poo-Choo train for a trip to the North Pole! (S6, E17)

programme.title: South Park: Freak Strike
programme.desc: Freak Strike: The boys decide to create a freak in order to win a prize on a TV show - will Butters' case of "Chinballalitis" be enough to win? And will he be discovered by the freaks union? (S6, E03)

programme.title: South Park: Asspen
programme.desc: Asspen: When the boys go on a ski vacation, it's '80s-teen-movie central as Stan is challenged to a ski race by a professional skier named Tad. Only a "montage" can help Stan now! (S6, E02)

programme.title: South Park: The New Terrance and Phillip Move Trailer
programme.sub-title: The New Terrance and Phillip Move Trailer
programme.desc: The Terrance and Phillip Movie Trailer: The gang are desperate to see the Terrance and Phillip trailer (featuring during 'The Russell Crowe Show') but events conspire against them. (S6, E05)

programme.title: South Park: Fun with Veal
programme.desc: Fun With Veal: When the boys discover that veal is made from baby cows they are horrified. Time for a "terrorist" mission to rescue the poor little blighters from their deathly fate! (S6, E04)

programme.title: South Park: Krazy Kripples
programme.desc: Krazy K******s: Christopher Reeve arrives in town and Jimmy and Timmy aren't happy with the attention he gets. They form a club called "The Crips" - unaware of the gang that shares the name! (S7, E02)

channel.desc: Relive the dawn of the South Park era, with legendary episodes of the groundbreaking, Emmy® Award-winning animated classic. Follow everyone's favorite troublemakers—Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny--from the very beginning of their unforgettable adventures.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Former holiday camp bluecoats enter the competition with their `launcher' Apollo. Father and-son-team Kan-Opener have a robot with huge piercing claws. A team of engineering students have created a future tech machine called Sweeney Todd.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Featuring one of the most bizarre, but certainly the tallest robot ever seen on `Robot Wars', Gabriel, built by Mensa member Craig and his three sons. It has wheels as tall as a washing machine and a huge samurai sword.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Winner robots from rounds one through five battle it out in the arena, a wild card from the runners up throws a spanner in the works as it tries to overthrow attempts at glory.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Battle of the Stars
programme.desc: Olympic athletes' the Brownlee brothers, DJ Scott Mills, space scientist Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock and sport's presenter Suzi Perry help design their own fighting robots to battle it out in the bulletproof Robot Wars arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Battle of the Stars
programme.desc: Paralympic gold medallist Kadeena Cox, international football legend Robbie Savage, presenter Neil Oliver and popstar Jordan from Rizzle Kicks help design their very own fighting robot to battle it out in the bulletproof Robot Wars arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A new spinner has something to prove and a family team pour blood, sweat and tears into keeping their robot wars dream alive. The robots compete through brutal group battles and fierce head to heads for a place in the heat final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The challenge for competitors is even tougher as the infamous House Robots have been let off the leash in a new twist. This is the second heat, and only one of the eight teams can go through to the series grand final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Four teams progress into a mini league going head to head in a bid for points. The top two teams will face each other in the heat final for the chance to secure their place in this series' grand final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This fourth heat is an explosive display of spinners as old favourites take on new hopefuls. They must dodge the arena hazards and the menacing new twist as house robots are unleashed to attack competitors and inflict maximum damage.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The reigning champions Apollo mount their defence of the title. They face stiff competition from Ms Nightshade, Coyote, Rusty, Crackers'N'Smash, Meggamouse, Trolley Rage and Carbide.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: It is the grand final and the teams must dodge the arena hazards and, in a menacing new twist, they can also hit the Arena Tyre to unleash the dreaded House Robots, allowing them to inflict maximum damage anywhere in the arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Featuring behind-the-scenes footage of Heat F of `Robot Wars: The Second Wars', including video diaries of the Ron and Panic Attack teams preparing their robots for the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The undercover secrets and un-muzzled action of `Robot Wars', see how competitors prepare their robots for victory, or defeat.

channel.desc: Mech+ is the home of Robot Wars, remastered in HD for the first time! Mech+ features every series of Robot Wars UK, both classics and the revival seasons, and also includes never before seen episodes considered ‘lost media’.

programme.title: A Haunting: Fear House
programme.desc: Steven LaChance begins to experience strange things inside his house.

programme.title: A Haunting: Angels And Demons
programme.desc: Maryland single Mom Kathie Sheats hopes life will change for the better when she marries her boyfriend Brian. But "something" inside her house has other ideas. Spiritual warfare literally breaks out...taking over Kathie's mind, body and soul.

programme.title: A Haunting: Stalked by Evil
programme.desc: A shadowy presence manifests from the darkened corners of Judy McCarthy’s Texas home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Haunted Victorian
programme.desc: After moving in their dream home, Edwin Gonzalez and Lillian Otero begin to experience strange occurrences; mysterious footsteps and unexplained noises. Lillian is physically attacked while sleeping and the couple tries to escape, but is it too late?

programme.title: A Haunting: Monster in the Apartment
programme.desc: A ghost attacks Morgan Knudsen in order to drive her out and get to her friend Bob.

programme.title: A Haunting: Trapped In Terror
programme.desc: Soon after moving into an older home in a quaint suburb of Cincinnati, OH, Taylor Jones catches her mother practicing black magic in her daughter Isabelle’s bedroom. Her fears become reality when Taylor notices Isabelle playing with an invisible friend.

programme.title: A Haunting
programme.desc: Romie moves into a new home but begins to have nightmares and see shadowy spirits pacing.

programme.title: A Haunting: Fear Feeders
programme.desc: Soon after Al Gonzalez purchases a home outside Fort Wayne, Indiana, he begins to hear strange noises and sees unexplainable shadows. Paranormal investigators determine the entities in Al's home are dangerous and that he is not their first victim.

programme.title: A Haunting: Demons Never Die
programme.desc: Shortly after starting a new job and moving his family to the suburbs, Bill Toler suspects his house is haunted. Paranormal investigators uncover a portal in their home and discover a demon followed Bill home from his job at the state penitentiary.

programme.title: A Haunting: Heartland Horror
programme.desc: Teenager Nolan Lydolph has seen ghosts his entire life. But after he and his parents return home from a ghost tour in Missouri, strange spirits creep through their home. Nolan undertakes a life-threatening struggle to rid his family of an undaunted evil.

programme.title: A Haunting: Sallie’s House
programme.desc: Deb and Tony’s son is born and his toys take on a life of their own.

programme.title: A Haunting: Haunted Past
programme.desc: As Deborah Utley begins experiencing paranormal events in her home, she turns to her faith for protection. But when her children are targeted by the entity she seeks the aid of paranormal investigators to end the cycle of terror.

programme.title: A Haunting: Nightmare In Bridgeport
programme.desc: Connecticut child safety specialist Bob Baker has devoted his life to protecting children from natural and supernatural harm. When his mother starts hearing voices in his childhood home, Bob is faced with a demon that evolves from his own nightmares.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Diabolical
programme.desc: A session with a Ouija board transforms Marie’s home into a portal for the diabolical.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ashes To Evil
programme.desc: Soon after moving in a large apartment in Hampton, Tennessee, Amelia’s family can’t shake the feeling that they are not alone. An evil entity lurks in their dream home and is targeting family members. They turn to paranormal investigators for help.

programme.title: A Haunting: Evil Rises
programme.desc: After a major surgery forces Jacinda Rearick to recuperate at home, she discovers orbs in family photos. At first, Jacinda believes that they are her deceased parents watching over her. But something much more sinister is invading her home.

channel.desc: The terrifying 'true' stories of the paranormal told by the people who experienced them. Watch, as the mystery and origin of each haunting unravels. By the end, you will be left with the sense that life and death are far stranger than you ever imagined.

programme.title: Medium: Joe Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Upon waking, Allison and Ariel share an uneasy feeling about the day to come, but both are caught by surprise when Joe's disgruntled co-worker Bruce Rossiter arrives at the office.

programme.title: Medium: 1-900-Lucky
programme.desc: Allison's brother, a phone-hotline psychic, helps a person whose husband was killed.

programme.title: Medium: No One To Watch Over Me
programme.sub-title: No One To Watch Over Me
programme.desc: Allison keeps awaking from a confusing dream where she is out in the snow and discovers a young woman’s body.

programme.title: Medium: Head Games
programme.desc: Allison is involved in a murder trial, but things go terribly wrong when another body is found, Joe begins seeing a therapist, and a young woman asks Allison for confidence.

programme.title: Medium: Heads Will Roll
programme.desc: Devalos deals with the aftermath of the case, Joe is approached by a lawyer, and Allison makes the decision to confide in Debra.

programme.title: Medium: Everything Comes To A Head
programme.desc: Allison’s life is turned upside down when her psychic powers are revealed to the public.

programme.title: Medium: And Then
programme.desc: Now that Allison's special abilities have been revealed to the public, everyone's lives have been turned upside down.

programme.title: Medium: But For The Grace of God
programme.sub-title: But For The Grace of God
programme.desc: Allison tries to help investigator Cynthia Keener find a missing teenage girl. Meanwhile, Ariel dreams of Allison's high school days from the '80s.

programme.title: Medium: To Have And To Hold
programme.desc: Joe brings a reluctant Allison with him to a party at a prospective employer's house. Later on, the employer's daughter disappears, leading Allison to connect her recent dreams about Paris to the disappearance.

programme.title: Medium: Do You Hear What I Hear
programme.sub-title: Do You Hear What I Hear
programme.desc: A young deaf girl is kidnapped, causing Allison to completely lose her hearing. With Allison at a loss, Joe decides to help her and Cynthia Keener investigate the kidnapping.

programme.title: Medium: Girls Ain't Nothing But Trouble
programme.desc: Larry Watt, a defense attorney who has caused trouble in Allison's past, asks Allison to be a consultant for him. Low on money, Allison accepts his offer.

programme.title: Medium: Aftertaste
programme.desc: Devalos tries to reclaim the D.A.'s office. Allison's support of Devalos is tested when she has visions of Devalos' strongest political supporter involved in a horrible conspiracy.

programme.title: Medium: Burn, Baby Burn - Part 1
programme.desc: Joe's mother pays a surprise visit, which worries Allison because she hasn't seen her since her psychic abilities became public knowledge.

programme.title: Medium: Burn, Baby Burn - Part 2
programme.desc: Allison tries to find the link between Ariel's prediction of a classmate's mother's death, dreams related to her case with Cynthia, and Devalos' murder case.

programme.title: Medium: Wicked Game - Part 1
programme.desc: While working to locate a missing local girl, Allison learns about secrets from Cynthia Keener's past.

programme.title: Medium: Wicked Game - Part 2
programme.desc: A shocking and brutal conclusion awaits Allison and Cynthia as they delve into the decade-old case of the kidnapping and murder of Cynthia's daughter.

programme.title: Medium: Lady Killer
programme.desc: As Allison teams up with Scanlon to track down the dangerous cougar they believe is responsible for the murders of young men, she also has visions that Devalos' campaign is in jeopardy.

channel.desc: Suburban mum Allison DuBois attempts to balance family life with solving mysteries using her special gift: the dead send her visions of their deaths or other crimes while she sleeps.
