programme.desc: Two trucks need rescuing when one got stuck trying to pull out the other.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 11
programme.desc: A slide bed loses two wheels and a lorry gets stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 12
programme.desc: A 44-tonne artic verges off a country lane and gets tuck in the mud.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 13
programme.desc: A lorry rolls over on the edge of a roundabout and a truck with blown suspension.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 14
programme.desc: A serious blaze leaves a sewerage tanker stricken in a layby on the busy A1 motorway.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 15
programme.desc: A mail lorry crashes on a London street and a bashed-up Audi is wedged in a ditch.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 16
programme.desc: An overnight frost makes a road sweeper slide into a ditch.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 17
programme.desc: A trailer catches fire and a lorry smashes into a tree.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 18
programme.desc: A lorry grounded; a trucked wedged in mud; a truck crashes into a low bridge.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 19
programme.desc: A tractor topples into a ditch; a lorry is trapped in mud; a unit loses its grip on ice.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 20
programme.desc: A recovery officer struggles after a truck ends up in a ditch in difficult conditions.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 1
programme.desc: In Corby a 16-metre lorry loaded with waste flips over near a busy roundabout.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 2
programme.desc: A team rescues an overturned mixer full of cement. A driver faces hydraulic problems.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 3
programme.desc: A lorry fire poses endless problems for recovery, with burning ash complicating matters.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 4
programme.desc: A tipped-over shipment of A4 paper ends up being a tough task to take on.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 5
programme.desc: A crew trying to take care of a burned-out trailer struggles due to its missing wheels.

channel.desc: A documentary series following rescue drivers working for two of the UK's leading heavy rescue specialists. We follow the work of the drivers as they endeavor to solve the problems caused by large and heavy vehicles.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 18
programme.desc: The kids reach the Northern Water tribe, and Aang and Katara look for a Waterbending Master as Sokka falls for a princess. Zuko must find a way to continue his quest for the Avatar.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 19
programme.desc: The Northern Water Tribe braces itself for an attack by Admiral Zhao's Fire Navy fleet. Aang struggles to defend the city. He wonders if there isn't a better way to use his Avatar abilities.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 20
programme.desc: Zhao's invasion breaks through the outer wall of the Northern Water Tribe's defenses, and he reveals a sinister plan. Aang goes to the spirit world for help.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 1
programme.desc: Aang and the group meet an Earth Kingdom general who wants to use Aang's powerful `Avatar State' as a weapon to defeat the Fire Nation. But it's more difficult than Aang thinks.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 2
programme.desc: On the way to Omashu, the kids meet some nomads who show them a shortcut through the `cave of two lovers'. When they get lost in the caves, they must trust in love to escape.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 3
programme.desc: The kids return to Omashu so that Aang can learn Earthbending from King Bumi; however, when they get there, they are shocked to find the city is now in Fire Nation hands.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 4
programme.desc: When the kids end up in a mysterious and strange swamp, their fears are exposed. And Aang learns about being `connected to the Earth' from an unlikely teacher.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 5
programme.desc: Aang and the gang discover an Earth town that celebrates `Avatar Day'. They learn that it is not a celebration of the Avatar, but a festival of anger for something Aang did in his past.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 6
programme.desc: In search for an Earthbending teacher for Aang, the kids go to an underground Earthbending tournament where they encounter Toph, a blind, but powerful Earthbender.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 7
programme.desc: Travelling without Uncle now, Zuko wanders alone into an Earth Kingdom town where he bonds with a local boy. Meanwhile, Zuko is haunted by memories of his own youth.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 8
programme.desc: As the kids are pursued relentlessly by a mysterious machine, their exhaustion puts them at each other's throats.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 9
programme.desc: When Aang struggles with a block while trying to learn Earthbending from Toph, he wonders if the problem is with him or his teacher. Meanwhile, Sokka gets himself in a jam.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 10
programme.desc: A professor leads the kids to a spirit library in the middle of the desert, where Sokka hopes to discover powerful secrets to use against the Fire Nation.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 11
programme.desc: Aang searches for Appa, while Katara struggles to keep everyone together so they can survive in the vast desert. Meanwhile, Uncle and Zuko seek help from an ancient secret society.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 12
programme.desc: When the kids can't take the easy way into Ba Sing Se, they must escort a family of refugees there the hard way, through the deadly Serpent's Pass.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 13
programme.desc: Aang discovers a colossal Fire Nation invention heading for Ba Sing Se, and the kids must stop it before it destroys the great wall that protects the city.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 14
programme.desc: Aang and the kids finally arrive in Ba Sing Se to see the Earth King, only to find mysterious forces within the city conspiring to stop them.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 15
programme.desc: A series of short stories that explore the individual adventures of Katara and Toph, Uncle, Sokka, Aang, Zuko, and Momo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 16
programme.desc: In this special episode, we go back in time to the moment Appa was stolen.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 17
programme.desc: While searching for Appa, the kids run into Jet but are torn about whether to trust him or not. Meanwhile, Zuko also hunts for Appa.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 18
programme.desc: The kids battle Long Feng when they try to show the Earth King the conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has odd dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 19
programme.desc: A guru at the Eastern Air Temple helps Aang take the next step in his Avatar journey. Plus, Sokka meets his long-lost father, Azula hatches a diabolical plan, and Uncle and Zuko open a tea shop.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 20
programme.desc: Everyone races against time to stop Azula's sinister conquest of Ba Sing Se. Zuko and Katara spend time together, while Aang's destiny hangs in the balance, as does Zuko's.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 1
programme.desc: After sustaining serious injuries, Aang awakens to find himself aboard a Fire Nation ship. Meanwhile, Zuko journeys home.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 2
programme.desc: To better camouflage themselves as real Fire Nation citizens, the kids check out a Fire Nation school. Also, Zuko confronts Uncle.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 3
programme.desc: The gang arrive at a suffering Fire Nation fishing village, and a mysterious spirit appears to help the villagers.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 4
programme.desc: Sokka feels that he is not contributing enough to the group, and searches for a mysterious master to teach him the ways of the sword.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 5
programme.desc: Zuko, Azula, Mai, and Ty Lee go on vacation at Lo and Li's beach house, where they learn a lot about themselves and each other. Meanwhile, the kids face a new enemy.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 6
programme.desc: Aang and Zuko are taken on parallel adventures that give them insight into their forefathers' pasts, but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 7
programme.desc: When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

channel.desc: The world is divided into four elemental nations. The Avatar upholds the balance, but when the Fire Nation invaded, he vanishes. A hundred years later, Katara and Sokka discover the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Raphael Meets His Match
programme.desc: Billionaire McDonald Crump makes the smallest pizzas in the world, and gives the biggest parties.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Slash - The Evil Turtles from Dimension X
programme.sub-title: Slash - The Evil Turtles from Dimension X
programme.desc: Using some of Shredder's and Krang's supercharged mutagen, Bebop and Rocksteady turn pet turtle Slash into an evil super mutant.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Leonardo Lightens Up
programme.desc: Tired of constant nagging about discipline, Raphael, Michelangelo and Donatello use a Personality Modifier on Leonardo to get him to lighten up.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Were-Rats of Channel Six
programme.desc: Finding a canister of unstable mutagen, the Rat King turns April and Vernon of Channel Six News into giant were-rats. As the transformed newshounds terrorize the city, Bebop and Rocksteady arrive to collect some explosives for Shredder and Krang.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Funny-They Shrunk Michelangelo
programme.desc: Talbot Breech is short, fussy and the insane inventor of a shrinking ray. His hobby is to miniaturize the biggest ships afloat; only today, he's caught Michelangelo in his diabolical ray.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Big Zipp Attack!
programme.desc: Intent on stealing the Lofty Tower's rigidium spire, Shredder lets a dreaded Zipp loose on the city as a tactical diversion.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Donatello Makes Time
programme.desc: Donatello's newest invention, the Time Stopper, has fallen into the hands of unconventional scientist Lloyd Cycloyd.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Farewell, Lotus Blossom
programme.desc: Using a devious deception, Shredder tricks Lotus Blossom into fighting the Turtles for possession of the burial urn of Chakahachi, an ancient Japanese magician.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Fin
programme.desc: In a dark plot to rule the world, Dr. Polidorius has created a man-fish using an evolution accelerator.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Rhino-Man
programme.desc: When multi-billionaire J. Gordon Hungerdunger sponsors a superhero competition, the city goes crazy with good guys.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Michelangelo Meets Bugman
programme.desc: Meet Bugman: he's Michelangelo's favourite comic book mutant superhero of all time. And today, he's real and in trouble.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Poor Little Rich Turtle
programme.desc: Desperate for the formula to Shellhammer Chemical's super rocket fuel, Krang and Shredder send Rocksteady and Bebop to kidnap poor little rich brat Buffy Shellhammer.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): What's Michelangelo Good For?
programme.desc: Dr. Lesseau is stealing animals from the city zoo to use for experiments.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Dimension X Story
programme.desc: April and Vernon of Channel Six News each need a big story, and Shredder's challenge to the Turtles of a fight to the finish sounds like just the ticket.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Donatello's Degree
programme.desc: To pick up a correspondence course degree addressed to "Miss Donna Tello," Donatello talks Irma into playing genius-for-a-day.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Big Cufflink Caper
programme.desc: When Shredder hires gonzo gangster Big Louie to find the explosive Cufflinks of Cathay, the Turtles go undercover with the mob to get to the bottom of the plot. Gunfights galore lead to a final shootout at the taffy factory at high midnight.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Leonardo Versus Tempestra
programme.desc: Tempestra's Revenge, the toughest game in video arcade, has got Leonardo hooked. Just as he's finally about to beat the machine, lightening strikes, and an electrical overload brings the wicked Tempestra to life.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Splinter Vanishes!
programme.desc: First Master Splinter vanishes, leaving behind instructions that the Ninja Turtles must now disband and go their separate ways.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Raphael Drives Em' Wild
programme.desc: Raphael's brain inadvertently gets switched with that of Oscar the cab driver.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Beyond the Donatello Nebula
programme.desc: Donatello's efforts to contact life in the Turtle Nebula succeed only too well: he accidently transports a space-traveling lizard named Algy down to Earth.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Big Bug Blunder
programme.desc: After Bebop and Rocksteady ruin an experimental batch of mutagen, Krang discovers that this new goo grows giant-sized insects. Shredder immediately sends some of the humongous bugs to Earth.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Foot Soldiers are Revolting
programme.desc: Desperate for decent henchmen, Shredder decides to make some minions he can rely on, and uses Krang's brain wave enhancer on a robotic foot soldier.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Unidentified Flying Leonardo
programme.desc: Investigating reports of UFOs in the country town of High Falls, April uncovers a real scheme.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Turtles and the Hare
programme.desc: In Krang's latest scheme, Rocksteady and Bebop, dressed as Easter bunnies, are blasting people with a Docilizer Ray and turning them into timid, rabbit-like people.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Once Upon a Time Machine
programme.desc: Hokum Hare discovers that Shredder has a time train to travel to the future, where he can become crimelord of a crime-free era.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Michelangelo Meets Mondo Gecko
programme.desc: Michelangelo is turtle-napped by mutant lizard Mondo Gecko, who was mutated at the same time and place as the Turtles.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Enter: Mutagen Man
programme.desc: Krang plans to use a large rocket's vapour trail to rain mutagen over the city when nerdy delivery boy Seymour Guts falls into Shredder's mutagen vat.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Donatello's Badd Time
programme.desc: Hillybilly crooks Bedelia Badd and sons Bufrod and Bubbaheist the Turtles new improved van, using it to steal the diamond in Dr. Kepple's Powercizer, which drains the city's power and could destroy it.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Michelangelo Meets Bugman - Again!
programme.desc: The Swatter threatens to destroy the city with a stolen swarm of super termites unless the Turtles meet him atop The Entire State Building.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Muckman Messes Up!
programme.desc: Krang sends Shredder, Rocksteady and Bebop after new mutagen Compound X-7, which Krang thinks will un-mutate Turtles. At lab, garbagemen are doused with the stuff and change into mutants Muckman and Joe Eyeball, blaming Turtles.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Napoleon Bullfrog: Colossus of the Swamps
programme.sub-title: Napoleon Bullfrog: Colossus of the Swamps
programme.desc: Krang uses Big Louie to steal anti-freeze to try to start the Technodrome, now stuck in the Arctic. Shredder zaps Turtle pal Napoleon Bullfrog, with mutagen, who mutates into a giant monster and escapes into the city.

channel.desc: Cowabunga! Straight from the sewers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are here and ready to take on alien and mutant enemies alike. Grab some pizza and get ready for maximum Turtle Power! This is TOTALLY TURTLES on Pluto TV!

programme.title: Riptide: Curse Of The Mary Aberdeen
programme.desc: A man who is supposed to be dead for eighteen years, hires the Riptide boys to find the Mary Aberdeen "before it kills again".

programme.title: Riptide: Boz Busters
programme.desc: When Murray is offered a dream job in computer research he leaves the agency and then goes missing. Nick and Cody set out to find him.

programme.title: Riptide: Oil Bets Are Off
programme.desc: When an oil magnet is murdered and the police aren't doing much about it, the Riptide agency is off to get some answers for the daughter of the deceased.

programme.title: Riptide: Girls Night Out
programme.desc: Two suburban women who owe money to a lone shark are forced to become burglars to pay him back.

programme.title: Riptide: Polly Want An Explanation
programme.desc: The Riptide agency, a wannabe-FBI agent, trouble prone con man Mack McPherson and his parrot all get in trouble with organized crime.

programme.title: Riptide: The Twisted Cross
programme.desc: A woman hires the guys to help her see her son whom her ex husband refuses to let her. They learn that the father is teaching his son to be a Nazi.

programme.title: Riptide: Fuzzy Vision
programme.desc: After the Riptide breaks down, the boys end up in a weird little town where a woman who can see into the future is suspected of murder.

programme.title: Riptide: Arrivederci, Baby
programme.desc: Nick "the pilot, Cody " the mustache" and Bozo "the docter" help Murray's Italian friend Angelo Guirilini, when his son is badly wounded.

programme.title: Riptide: Harmony And Grits
programme.desc: A seminar about harmony and communucation leads -apart from a fistfight and a bunch of arguments- to a concerned wife who's afraid her husband is having an affair.

programme.title: Riptide: Wipe Out
programme.desc: A so-called accident that took the life of a young surfer in 1964, causes repercussions today.

programme.title: Riptide: Thirty-Six Hours Till Dawn
programme.desc: Luitenant Quinlan and his superiors hire the Riptide Agency to pick up a female witness, ready to testify against her crooked husband.

programme.title: Riptide: Does Not Compute
programme.desc: When somebody is using computers to destroy the reputation of a congressman with controversial ideas, our private investigators decide to help out.

programme.title: Riptide: The Bargain Department
programme.desc: Following the notice from their insurance agent that the agency's bond has been canceled, a high-profile security company offers to buy the Riptide Detective Agency.

programme.title: Riptide: Who Really Watches The Sunset?
programme.desc: A reporter who only has six months to live, hires the Riptide Agency to find out who killed her.

programme.title: Riptide: Still Goin' Steady
programme.desc: Murray has been appearing on a game show, 'Brain Basher'.

channel.desc: The cases of a private investigations agency run by two Vietnam War veterans and their computer geek friend from high school, armed with toughness, their own helicopter, and the third's technical ability.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Long and lanky, 22-year-old Alex Law from Stockport hits the scales at just over ten stone because he barely eats a meal. Tired and exhausted he lives on a diet of caffeine pills supplemented.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: 39 year old Tracey from Tonbridge in Kent spent 22 years trying to get pregnant and the emotional anxiety led to her weight ballooning to over 18 stone.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: 41 year old Trudy from Bedfordshire runs her own business and is a mum of three. Kim is a fitness fanatic who runs 45 miles a week but eats like a sparrow.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Phillipa is a 48 year old ‘foodie’ from Sheffield who just can’t say no. Gillian is a 24 year old student nurse from Inverness and single mum of two.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: 37-year-old Martin works on the night shift as a Fire Engineer for London Underground. Christine is a 21 year old student who lives at home in Manchester with her mum and younger sister.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: 27 year old Marketing Consultant Ameer is looking for love and has never been in a relationship. 18 year old Georgetta has been modelling and dancing since she was a baby.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Football fan Wayne works as a Customer Services Advisor. He is desperate to lose weight so he can play his favourite sport. Martin is a 32 year works as a photographer, PR manager and model.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Keith is a 33 year old dance floor DJ who is desperate for a date. 25 year old BT Manager Tiffany despises ‘bad’ foods. She has a strong desire to be healthy but has a very small appetite.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Since leaving home 26 year old Kevin Calladine hasn't had a decent meal. Short on time and money his weight has plummeted to just 8 stone 7lbs and he's two stones underweight.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Twist & Shout
programme.desc: A newlywed's hand gets stuck in a kitchen appliance and a college student is tormented by an injury down under; a heavy drinker is now sober and experiencing life-threatening complications; and a woman appears to only have blood flow to half of her brain.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Officer Down
programme.desc: A police man is struck by a speeding driver seeking revenge, which may leave him with no legs. A team of doctors try and save the officer's life.

programme.title: Hit By A Train
programme.desc: A mountain biker has multiple injuries and her boyfriend has multiple fainting spells; a man's legs are severed when he's run over by a train; a drunken bachelor helps reveal the secret of a mystery nurse that has been working in the ER.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Toilet Paper Eating Patient
programme.desc: A woman complains of stomach pains after eating toilet paper; an inmate has a 108-degree fever.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: REAR ENDED
programme.desc: Two car crash victims – a man and a woman - arrive separately & nearly naked, but gradually their tale of passion and infidelity is revealed; a boy suffering from nausea is found to have heart block that requires a pacemaker.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Code Grenn In The ER
programme.desc: Doctors perform a chest incision while awaiting surgeons; an iguana is brought in following a car accident.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Red Blanket
programme.desc: A patient who comes in after his hand has been chopped off by a lawnmower.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Right Choice
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Big City Home
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: City Dreams
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Cottage Getaways
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Perfect Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Classic Homes Are Timeless
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Agents of Million Dollar Homes
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Glass House (Part 1)
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Glass House (Part 2)
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Palace Fit for a Princess (Part 1)
programme.sub-title: A Palace Fit for a Princess (Part 1)
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: A Palace Fit for a Princess (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Infinite View (Part 1)
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Infinite View (Part 2)
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sunset on the Patio (Part 1)
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sunset on the Patio (Part 2)
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sweet Home Belize (Part 1)
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sweet Home Belize (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Nice Family Home (Part 1)
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Nice Family Home (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Clever Income (Part 1)
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Clever Income (Part 2)
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Open Concept (Part 1)
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Open Concept (Part 2)
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Big Investment (Part 1)
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Big Investment (Part 2)
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Magical Home (Part 1)
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Magical Home (Part 2)
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Income for a Rainy Day (Part 1)
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Income for a Rainy Day (Part 2)
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Tricky Choice (Part 1)
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature.

channel.desc: From first-time homebuyers to experienced investors, TMDA has something for everyone, affording a peek into the sumptuous world of international luxury homeownership.

programme.title: COPS starts at 9pm
programme.desc: Cops gives viewers access into the daily lives and work of the men and women of law enforcement. Filmed on location, the groundbreaking series follows real officers on patrol as they conduct high-speed pursuits, wild arrests and dangerous police business.

programme.title: COPS: Family Therapy
programme.desc: Officers are flagged down and alerted to a group of armed men assaulting people at a nearby home. A fight between a father and his adult son takes a dark turn.

programme.title: COPS: Crawling to Vegas
programme.desc: A driver leads police on a slow speed chase towards Las Vegas. Three people are suspected of using contraband. A multi-neighbor dispute devolves into a fight involving guns and bats.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Funny Money
programme.desc: Cops pursue a man skipping bail, an impaired driver is surprisingly cooperative, and officers struggle to remove a violent offender from a crime scene.

programme.title: COPS: She Needed a Nap
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a man involved in a carjacking. Deputies are called to an altercation between a father and son. Officers respond to an unresponsive woman lying in a roadway.

programme.title: COPS: Candlelight Burglar
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a fight between a daughter's boyfriend and her mother. A woman lights candles after an attempted break-in. Police respond when an evicted tenant tries to reenter his old apartment.

programme.title: COPS: Dangerous Toppings
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no id bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: COPS: Settled with a Pipe
programme.desc: A man attacking a woman is tackled by an officer. A vehicle is pulled over for a drug deal in progress. A woman smashes a car window with a pipe in a fit of road rage.

programme.title: COPS: Poolwatch
programme.desc: Deputies taser a man who almost ran over a deputy with his truck. A man gives police false information after saving a boy who fell into a pool. A woman tries to buy drugs from an undercover officer.

programme.title: COPS: Donut Pursuit
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck after a donut shop robbery. Deputies are dispatched when a wife attacks her husband with an unknown object. Deputies respond to a mother and son knife fight.

programme.title: COPS: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Deputies prevent the delivery of a pillow stuffed with drugs. A disabled woman calls the law when a father and son get into a fist fight. Deputies confront an intoxicated man riding a bike.

programme.title: COPS: No Respect these Days
programme.desc: A combative man at a fast food restaurant claims his phone was stolen. Multiple illegal items are found on a man parked on the side of the road. An intoxicated man throws an 83-year-old's walker.

programme.title: COPS: Two Too Many
programme.desc: A man fights with his wife over a haircut, then leads police on a car chase. A woman gets violent with her boyfriend and then calls the police on him.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Second Time Around
programme.desc: Deputies are led on a chase by a driver they pursued just weeks earlier, and a man caught with drugs tries to pin the blame on his girlfriend.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Dishonest Dudes
programme.desc: Torrential rain hampers the pursuit of a fleeing vehicle, a man on a moped is carrying more than he lets on, and a persistent police officer unravels a sketchy man's story.

programme.title: COPS: Follow Me to the River
programme.desc: A deputy jumps into a waterway to arrest a fleeing suspect. Officers respond to roommates in an argument. Officers are called when two crossdressers attack a group of women.

channel.desc: Cops gives viewers access into the daily lives and work of the men and women of law enforcement. Filmed on location, the groundbreaking series follows real officers on patrol as they conduct high-speed pursuits, wild arrests and dangerous police business.
